episode.title: Take to the Sky! Ride the Knockup Stream!
episode.english: Take to the Sky! Ride the Knockup Stream!
episode.japanese: Fune wa sora o yuku! Tsukiageru kairyū ni nore
episode.transliteration: 船は空をゆく!突き上げる海流に乗れ
episode.summary: The Going Merry is refitted by Masira and Shōjo to be more flight capable, and the Straw Hats catch a ride on the Knock-Up Stream for Skypeia.

episode.title: Sail the White Sea! The Sky Knight and the Gate in the Clouds!
episode.english: Sail the White Sea! The Sky Knight and the Gate in the Clouds!
episode.japanese: Koko wa sora no umi! Sora no kishi to tengoku no mon
episode.transliteration: ここは空の海!空の騎士と天国の門
episode.summary: The Straw Hats arrive in an ocean above the clouds. Usopp almost falls out of the sky island but is saved at the last minute. The crew is also attacked by a mysterious looking warrior, but is saved by the Knight of the Sky. Finally, they arrive at the border which transports them to the upper realm, Skypiea.

episode.title: Godland, Skypiea! Angels on a Beach of Clouds!
episode.english: Godland, Skypiea! Angels on a Beach of Clouds!
episode.japanese: Kami no kuni Sukaipia! Kumo no nagisa no tenshitachi
episode.transliteration: 神の国スカイピア!雲の渚の天使たち
episode.summary: As the crew arrives in Skypiea, they're greeted by Conis and her pet Suu. Both she and her father start explaining how the life in Skypiea is and how the different Dials work.

episode.title: The Forbidden Sacred Ground! The Island Where God Lives and Heaven's Judgement!
episode.english: The Forbidden Sacred Ground! The Island Where God Lives and Heaven's Judgement!
episode.japanese: Kindan no seichi! Kami no sumi shima to ten no sabaki!
episode.transliteration: 禁断の聖地!神の住む島と天の裁き!
episode.summary: Nami finds out what should happen to anyone who enters the forest. Meanwhile, the rest of the gang are waiting for the wind to change but are rudely assaulted by Skypiea's police who are going to carry out Heaven's Judgement.

episode.title: Already Criminals?! Skypiea's Upholder of the Law!
episode.english: Already Criminals?! Skypiea's Upholder of the Law!
episode.japanese: Hayaku mo hanzaisha!? Sukaipia no hō no banjin
episode.transliteration: 早くも犯罪者!?スカイピアの法の番人
episode.summary: The Straw Hats have some problems with the local justice enforcer force called "The White Berets."

episode.title: Is Escape Possible?!? God's Challenge is Set in Motion
episode.english: Is Escape Possible?!? God's Challenge is Set in Motion
episode.japanese: Dasshutsu naru ka!? Ugokihajimeta kami no shiren!
episode.transliteration: 脱出なるか!?動きはじめた神の試練!
episode.summary: Before they can leave Chopper, Robin, Nami and Zoro are abducted by a giant shrimp. Luffy, Sanji and Usopp go after them to the upper yard.

episode.title: A Trap on Lovely Street! The Almighty Eneru
episode.english: A Trap on Lovely Street! The Almighty Eneru
episode.japanese: Raburī dōri no wana! Zennō naru Goddo Eneru
episode.transliteration: ラブリー通りの罠!全能なる神エネル
episode.summary: Conis leads Luffy, Usopp, and Sanji to a boat to get to Upper Yard, but she tells them it is a trap and almost gets hit by "Heaven's Judgment".

episode.title: Onward Crow! To the Sacrificial Altar!
episode.english: Onward Crow! To the Sacrificial Altar!
episode.japanese: Susume Karasumaru! Ikenie no saidan o mezase
episode.transliteration: すすめカラス丸!生贄の祭壇を目指せ
episode.summary: Luffy, Usopp and Sanji finally enter Upper Yard, only to find out that the whole road is trapped heavily, but at last they arrive at the Ordeal Gates. Meanwhile Robin, Zoro, and Nami go out to explore Upper Yard while Chopper stays behind to guard the ship.

episode.title: 10% Survival Rate! Satori, the Mantra Master!
episode.english: 10% Survival Rate! Satori, the Mantra Master!
episode.japanese: Seizonritsu 10%! Mantora tsukai no shinkan Satori
episode.transliteration: 生存率10%!心綱使いの神官サトリ!
episode.summary: Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp enter the Ordeal of Balls gate and encounter the Priest Satori.

episode.title: The Ordeal of Spheres! Desperate Struggle in the Lost Forest!
episode.english: The Ordeal of Spheres! Desperate Struggle in the Lost Forest!
episode.japanese: 'Tama no shiren' no kyōi! Mayoi no mori no shitō
episode.transliteration: 「玉の試練」の脅威!迷いの森の死闘
episode.summary: Usopp, Sanji, and Luffy fight Satori, but the power of Mantra seems to be too strong.

episode.title: Chopper in Danger! Former God vs. Priest Shura!
episode.english: Chopper in Danger! Former God vs. Priest Shura!
episode.japanese: Choppā ayaushi! Moto kami VS Shinkan Shura
episode.transliteration: チョッパー危うし!元神VS神官シュラ
episode.summary: Chopper, threatened by priest Shura, blows the whistle for Gan Fall to come, but before he can arrive, Priest Shura assaults Chopper and begins destroying the Going Merry.

episode.title: Profound Mystery! Ordeal of String and Ordeal of Love?!?
episode.english: Profound Mystery! Ordeal of String and Ordeal of Love?!?
episode.japanese: Makafushigi! Himo no shiren to koi no shiren!?
episode.transliteration: 摩訶不思議!紐の試練と恋の試練!?
episode.summary: Satori is defeated by Luffy and Sanji. Meanwhile Gan Fall has been defeated and Chopper jumps in the water to rescue him.

episode.title: Light the Fire of Shandora! Wyper the Warrior!
episode.english: Light the Fire of Shandora! Wyper the Warrior!
episode.japanese: Shandora no tō o nobose! Senshi Waipā
episode.transliteration: シャンドラの灯を燈せ!戦士ワイパー
episode.summary: Chopper is saved by a bunch of giant Southbirds, who tell him that Gan Fall was actually God. Nami, Zoro and Robin discover the reason why Upper Yard is a soil island: It was once part of Jaya, and this is the part that Liar Norland saw. Meanwhile the Shandians attack Upper Yard.

episode.title: Jaya, City of Gold in the Sky! Head for God's Shrine!
episode.english: Jaya, City of Gold in the Sky! Head for God's Shrine!
episode.japanese: Tenkū no ōgonkyō Jaya! Mezase kami no yashiro
episode.transliteration: 天空の黄金卿ジャヤ!目指せ神の社!
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Junichi FujiseStoryboarded by : Kenji Yokoyama
episode.summary: The Shandians' attack on Upper Yard has started. The crew is finally reunited, and everyone speaks up about what has happened. Chopper takes care of Gan Fall, and the pirates plan to steal the gold on the island.

episode.title: Festival on the Night Before Gold-Hunting! Feelings for "Vearth!"
episode.english: Festival on the Night Before Gold-Hunting! Feelings for "Vearth!"
episode.japanese: ōgon zenya matsuri! Vāsu e no omoi!
episode.transliteration: 黄金前夜祭!「ヴァース」への想い!
episode.summary: After befriending a wolf pack, Gan Fall tells the crew a little more about the history of Upper Yard.

episode.title: Enter God Eneru! Farewell to the Survivors!
episode.english: Enter God Eneru! Farewell to the Survivors!
episode.japanese: Goddo Eneru tōjō!! Ikinokori e no ōpādo
episode.transliteration: 神·エネル登場!!生き残りへの夜明曲
episode.summary:
Eneru takes away the limitations of the priests. Also, Usopp witnesses a mysterious person fixing the ship; the next day Merry is found to be back to her original form. After getting her off the altar, the pirates plan out their course of action.
Note: This was the last episode to air on Toonami during its original run. The show returned to Toonami on May 18, 2013, continuing from episode 207.

episode.title: A Giant Snake Bares Its Fangs! The Survival Game Begins!
episode.english: A Giant Snake Bares Its Fangs! The Survival Game Begins!
episode.japanese: Kiba muku ōhebi! Tsui ni hajimaru sabaibaru gēmu
episode.transliteration: 牙むく大蛇!遂に始まる生き残り合戦
episode.summary: A giant python makes Luffy, Robin, Chopper and Zoro split while going to the ruins at the south.

episode.title: The Deadly Reject! War Demon Wyper's Resolve!
episode.english: The Deadly Reject! War Demon Wyper's Resolve!
episode.japanese: Sutemi no haigeki! Senki Waipā no kakugo
episode.transliteration: 捨身の排撃!!「戦鬼」ワイパーの覚悟
episode.summary: Wyper takes out Shura and tells his goal to the Shandians, and Eneru speaks up about how many people will be alive by the end of his plan.

episode.title: Fierce Mid-Air Battle! Pirate Zoro vs. Warrior Braham!
episode.english: Fierce Mid-Air Battle! Pirate Zoro vs. Warrior Braham!
episode.japanese: Kūchū no gekisen! Kaizoku Zoro VS Senshi Burahamu
episode.transliteration: 空中の激戦!海賊ゾロVS戦士ブラハム
episode.summary: Zoro fights the Shandian warrior Braham, and defeats him with One Sword Style: 36 Caliber Phoenix technique. ("36-Pound Cannon" In Japanese)

episode.title: The Roaring Burn Bazooka!! Pirate Luffy vs. War Demon Wyper!
episode.english: The Roaring Burn Bazooka!! Pirate Luffy vs. War Demon Wyper!
episode.japanese: Unaru nenshōhō!! Rufi vs senki Waipā
episode.transliteration: 唸る燃焼砲!!ルフィVS戦鬼ワイパー闘
episode.summary: Luffy fights Wyper, but after some time, he falls into some underground ruins. Meanwhile, Eneru appears on the Going Merry and after telling that his true goal was the City of Gold, he takes out both Usopp and Sanji; He then vanishes and leaves Satori's brothers, Hotori and Kotori, to avenge their brother.

episode.title: The Ordeal of Swamp! Chopper vs Priest Gedatsu!
episode.english: The Ordeal of Swamp! Chopper vs Priest Gedatsu!
episode.japanese: Numa no shiren! Choppā VS Shinkan Gedatsu!!
episode.transliteration: 沼の試練!チョッパーVS神官ゲダツ!!
episode.summary: Chopper is attacked by Gedatsu, who turns out to be a complete moron, and eventually defeats him, sending him plummeting to the Blue Sea. Conis and Pagaya help Aisa, and head to Upper Yard.

episode.title: Unbeatable Powers! Eneru's True Form is Revealed!
episode.english: Unbeatable Powers! Eneru's True Form is Revealed!
episode.japanese: Muteki no nōryoku! Akasareru Eneru no shōtai
episode.transliteration: 無敵の能力!明かされるエネルの正体
episode.summary: Eneru defeats several members of the Shandian Tribe. Meanwhile, Gan Fall and Nami start and finish their fight with Kotori and Hotori. Hotori is defeated by Nami while Kotori is defeated by Gan Fall. It is also revealed that Eneru is made of lightning.

episode.title: A Mystical City! The Grand Ruins of Shandora!
episode.english: A Mystical City! The Grand Ruins of Shandora!
episode.japanese: Maboroshi no to! Yūdai naru Shandora no iseki!!
episode.transliteration: 幻の都!雄大なるシャンドラの遺跡!!
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Yoko IkedaStoryboarded by : Kenji Yokoyama
episode.summary: While Robin is looking at some ruins she found, Yama, The Chief Enforcer, attacks her. Yama is easily defeated by Robin. Later, she discovers the legendary city, Shandora.

episode.title: 0% Survival Rate! Chopper vs. Ohm, the Sword Wielding Priest!
episode.english: 0% Survival Rate! Chopper vs. Ohm, the Sword Wielding Priest!
episode.japanese: Seisonritsu 0%!! Choppā VS shinkan Ōmu
episode.transliteration: 生存率0%!!チョッパーVS神官オーム
episode.summary: Priest Ohm appears and starts fighting everyone.

episode.title: Climb Giant Jack! Deadly Combat in the Upper Ruins!
episode.english: Climb Giant Jack! Deadly Combat in the Upper Ruins!
episode.japanese: Kyodai mame tsuru o nobore!! Jōsō iseki no shitō
episode.transliteration: 巨大豆蔓"を登れ!!上層遺跡の死闘
episode.summary: At the Upper Ruins, the fight between Ohm, Zoro, Gan Fall and Wyper begins. When Nami appears, she is swallowed by the giant python, along with Gan Fall and Aisa.

episode.title: The Ordeal of Iron! White Barbed Death Match!
episode.english: The Ordeal of Iron! White Barbed Death Match!
episode.japanese: Tetsu no shiren no shinkocchō! Shiroibara Desumacchi!!
episode.transliteration: 鉄の試練の真骨頂!白荊デスマッチ!!
episode.summary: Ohm makes matters worse, creating a barbed wire cage around the area. Raki is knocked out by Eneru, and Nami, Aisa, and Gan Fall find out why the python was rampaging so much.

episode.title: Bursting Slash! Zoro vs Ohm!
episode.english: Bursting Slash! Zoro vs Ohm!
episode.japanese: Hotobashiru Zangeki! Zoro VS shinkan Ōmu!!
episode.transliteration: ほとばしる斬撃!ゾロVS神官オーム!!
episode.summary: Zoro finally defeats Priest Ohm with his 108 Caliber Phoenix technique. Meanwhile Pagaya and Conis hear the terrible truth about the goal of Eneru: to eradicate every person in the sky.

episode.title: Collapsing Upper Ruins! The Quintet for the Finale!
episode.english: Collapsing Upper Ruins! The Quintet for the Finale!
episode.japanese: Kuzure yuku jōsō iseki! Fināre e no kuintetto
episode.transliteration: 崩れゆく上層遺跡!終曲への五重奏!!
episode.summary: Eneru appears only to reduce the group as close to his prediction as he can.To do that, Eneru destroys the Upper Ruins with one of his attacks, causing everyone to fall onto Shandorians ancestors city.

episode.title: Showdown in the Ancient Ruins! Sky God Eneru's Goal!
episode.english: Showdown in the Ancient Ruins! Sky God Eneru's Goal!
episode.japanese: Kodai iseki no taiketsu! Goddo Eneru no mokuteki
episode.transliteration: 古代遺跡の対決!神·エネルの目的
episode.summary: Eneru counterattacks Gan Fall and lands a finishing hit. He then knocks out Robin as she tries to manipulate him. Zoro impresses Eneru with his power but is easily beaten, while trying to make him pay for what he did to Robin; but it takes Wyper with a secret weapon to take Eneru down.

episode.title: Ambition Towards the Endless Vearth! The Ark Maxim!
episode.english: Ambition Towards the Endless Vearth! The Ark Maxim!
episode.japanese: Kagirinai daichi e no yabō hakobune Makushimu
episode.transliteration: 限りない大地への野望方舟マクシム!!
episode.summary: Eneru defeats Zoro and Wyper. Upon seeing this, Nami follows him to a cave where his ark, Maxim, is. Luffy finally gets out of the snake, along with Aisa, only to find out the outcome of the fight against Eneru. When Aisa tells him that she knows where he is, he asks her to take him there.

episode.title: They Finally Clash! Pirate Luffy vs God Eneru!
episode.english: They Finally Clash! Pirate Luffy vs God Eneru!
episode.japanese: Tsui ni gekitotsu! Kaizoku Rufi VS Goddo Eneru!!
episode.transliteration: 遂に激突!海賊ルフィVS神·エネル!!
episode.summary: Luffy and Eneru start fighting. Conis tells the dangers of staying in Sky Island to the other Skypieans.

episode.title: Maxim Surfaces! Deathpiea is Activated!
episode.english: Maxim Surfaces! Deathpiea is Activated!
episode.japanese: Makushimu ujō! Ugokihajimeta Desupia!!
episode.transliteration: マクシム浮上!動き始めたデスピア!!
episode.summary: Eneru starts a machine that would bring the death of Sky Island: Deathpiea.

episode.title: Luffy Falls! Eneru's Judgement and Nami's Wish!
episode.english: Luffy Falls! Eneru's Judgement and Nami's Wish!
episode.japanese: Rufi rakuka! Kami no sabaki to Nami no nozomi!!
episode.transliteration: ルフィ落下!神の裁きとナミの望み!!
episode.summary: Luffy falls from the ark. Nami starts fighting Eneru while Sanji and Usopp try to rescue her.

episode.title: The Two Awaken! On the Front Lines of the Burning Love Rescue!
episode.english: The Two Awaken! On the Front Lines of the Burning Love Rescue!
episode.japanese: Mesameta futari! Moeru koi no kyūshutsu zensen!!
episode.transliteration: 目覚めた二人!燃える恋の救出前線!!
episode.summary: Usopp and Sanji split up to rescue Nami, but the first one to get on deck is Usopp.

episode.title: Capriccio for Despair! The Impending Doom of Sky Island!
episode.english: Capriccio for Despair! The Impending Doom of Sky Island!
episode.japanese: Zetsubō e no kyōsōkyoku hakari kuru sorajima no shōmetsu!!
episode.transliteration: 絶望への狂想曲迫り来る空島の消滅!!
episode.summary: Eneru's thunderclouds are coming down to Sky Island while the evacuation is half complete.

episode.title: Lead by a Bell's Sound! Tale of the Great Warrior and the Explorer!
episode.english: Lead by a Bell's Sound! Tale of the Great Warrior and the Explorer!
episode.japanese: Kane no oto no michibiki! Daisenshi to shinkenka no monogatari
episode.transliteration: 鐘の音の導き!大戦士と探検家の物語
episode.summary: The history of Noland and Calgara is told, as a flashback from Wyper.

episode.title: Free From the Spell! The Great Warrior Sheds Tears!
episode.english: Free From the Spell! The Great Warrior Sheds Tears!
episode.japanese: Jubaku kara no kaihō! Daisenshi ga nagashita namida!!
episode.transliteration: 呪縛からの解放!大戦士が流した涙!!
episode.summary: Noland and Calgara are enjoying themselves, as well as the villagers and Noland's crew, but that changes one day, as the villagers start hating their new friends.

episode.title: Eternal Friends! The Vowed Bell Echoes Across the Mighty Seas!
episode.english: Eternal Friends! The Vowed Bell Echoes Across the Mighty Seas!
episode.japanese: Eien no shinyū! Daikaigen ni hibiku chikai no kane
episode.transliteration: 永遠の親友!大海原に響く誓いの鐘
episode.summary: The cause of the hatred is discovered and explained. Meanwhile, Calgara vows to meet Noland again.

episode.title: Angel Island, Obliterated! The Horror of The Raigo's Advent!!
episode.english: Angel Island, Obliterated! The Horror of The Raigo's Advent!!
episode.japanese: Enjerushima shōmetsu! Raigō kōrin no kyōfu!
episode.transliteration: エンジェル島消滅!雷迎降臨の恐怖!!
episode.summary: Angel Island is destroyed by Eneru's attacks. Luffy decides to go and ring the golden bell before Eneru takes it away.

episode.title: Knock Over Giant Jack! Last Hope for Escape!
episode.english: Knock Over Giant Jack! Last Hope for Escape!
episode.japanese: Kyodai mame tsuru o taose! Dasshutsu e no saigō no nozomi
episode.transliteration: 巨大豆蔓を倒せ!脱出への最後の望み
episode.summary: Nami finds out a way to get to Eneru and sends a message to the others for them to cut down Giant Jack. Zoro cuts down half of the stalk, but Eneru fires a bolt straight at Zoro, rendering him unconscious. As the others look on hopelessly, Wyper lets his pride get the better of him, saying that the descendants of Calgara should ring the bell. Usopp tries to help in a knowingly futile attempt by using his Exploding Star techniques. Robin tells Wyper that Cricket, Noland's descendant, is searching for the Gold City and Luffy wants to ring the bell for him. Reinvigorated, Wyper goes to Giant Jack and uses one final Reject, knocking down the rest of the stalk in the process. Nami and Luffy then charge up Giant Jack to face Eneru.

episode.title: Miracle on Skypiea! The Love Song Heard in the Clouds!
episode.english: Miracle on Skypiea! The Love Song Heard in the Clouds!
episode.japanese: Kami no kuni no kiseki! Tenshi ni todoita rabusongu
episode.transliteration: 神の国の奇跡!天使に届いた島の歌声
episode.summary: Luffy defeats Eneru by smashing him into the Golden Bell, ringing it in the process.

episode.title: The Battle Ends! Proud Fantasia Echoes Far!
episode.english: The Battle Ends! Proud Fantasia Echoes Far!
episode.japanese: Tatakai no shūen! Tōku hibiku hokori takaki gensōkyoku
episode.transliteration: 戦いの終焉!遠く響く誇り高き幻想曲
episode.summary: Luffy has won and the 400 year war on Sky Island is finally over. Montblanc Cricket and the Masira Brothers hear the Golden Bell ringing and realize that the Gold City was always in the sky. Eneru, who was thrown to the Blue Sea heads out to the Fairy Vearth (the Moon). The Sky People (both Skypieans and Shandorians) celebrate the end of the war with a great bonfire.

episode.title: I Made it Here! The Yarn the Poneglyphs Spin!
episode.english: I Made it Here! The Yarn the Poneglyphs Spin!
episode.japanese: Ware koko ni itaru! Rekishi no honbun ga tsumugu mono
episode.transliteration: 我ここに至る!歴史の本文が紡ぐもの
episode.summary: Robin deciphers the poneglyphs on the Golden Bell and realizes how to find the Rio Poneglyph. She also discovers that the poneglyphs on the Bell were written by Gol D. Roger, who could understand poneglyphs, who had discovered the Rio Poneglyph, and had once visited Skypiea. Soon afterwards, the Straw Hats steal a bunch of gold from the Giant Anaconda's belly and they begin to leave Skypiea.

episode.title: Off to the Blue Sea!! A Heartfelt Finale!
episode.english: Off to the Blue Sea!! A Heartfelt Finale!
episode.japanese: Iza seikai e!! Omoi ga shibarinasu saishū gakushō
episode.transliteration: いざ青海へ!!想いが織りなす最終楽章
episode.summary: The Golden Bell rings as the Straw Hats are going down to the sea, meaning that they are welcome and are deeply thankful for what they did. When the ship finally rests on the sea, problems appear, as the ship has landed in a Marine base.

episode.title: A State of Emergency is Issued! A Notorious Pirate Ship has Infiltrated!
episode.english: A State of Emergency is Issued! A Notorious Pirate Ship has Infiltrated!
episode.japanese: Hijō Jitai Hatsumei! Akumei Takaki Kaizokusen Sennyū
episode.transliteration: 非常事態発令!悪名高き海賊船潜入!
episode.summary: The Marines are convinced the Going Merry is a ghost ship after it crashes inside their fortress from above. The crew members are scattered around the premises.

episode.title: Sanji the Cook! Proving His Merit at the Marine Dining Hall!
episode.english: Sanji the Cook! Proving His Merit at the Marine Dining Hall!
episode.japanese: Ryōrinin Sanji! Kaigun Shokudō de Shinka Hakki!
episode.transliteration: 料理人サンジ!海軍食堂で真価発揮!
episode.summary: In disguise, Sanji shows the Marine chefs the proper way to prepare a meal.

episode.title: Captured Zoro! Chopper's Emergency Operations!
episode.english: Captured Zoro! Chopper's Emergency Operations!
episode.japanese: Towareta Zoro to Choppā Kinkyū Shittō
episode.transliteration: 囚われたゾロとチョッパー緊急執刀!
episode.summary: Zoro is taken prisoner as Chopper and Nami assist a nervous doctor in treating injured Marines.

episode.title: The Marines Dragnet Closes In! The Second Member Captured!
episode.english: The Marines Dragnet Closes In! The Second Member Captured!
episode.japanese: Hakaru Kaigun no Sōsamō! Towareta Futarime!
episode.transliteration: 迫る海軍の捜査網!囚われた二人目!
episode.summary: Robin and Usopp both disguise themselves as the same visiting inspector, and Usopp is thrown in the brig with Zoro. Luffy and Sanji are discovered by Jonathan after a slight mishap.

episode.title: Luffy and Sanji's Daring Rescue Mission!
episode.english: Luffy and Sanji's Daring Rescue Mission!
episode.japanese: Kesshi no Rufi to Sanji! Kūshutsu Daisakusen!
episode.transliteration: 決死のルフィとサンジ!救出大作戦!
episode.summary: The real Inspector is thrown in the brig with Zoro and Usopp, while Sanji and Luffy race to rescue the two while avoiding detection.

episode.title: Enter the Hot-Blooded Special Forces! Battle on the Bridge!
episode.english: Enter the Hot-Blooded Special Forces! Battle on the Bridge!
episode.japanese: Netsuketsu Tokubetsu Butai Sansen! Burijji Kōbōsen!
episode.transliteration: 熱血特別部隊参戦!ブリッジ攻防戦!
episode.summary: Sanji and Luffy, after freeing Usopp and Zoro, try to escape Navarone. As the Burning Soul combat unit is deployed, Dr. Kobato leads Nami and Chopper to the docks.

episode.title: Breaking Through the Siege! The Going Merry is Recovered!
episode.english: Breaking Through the Siege! The Going Merry is Recovered!
episode.japanese: Hōimō Toppa! Dakkan Gōingu Merī-gō
episode.transliteration: 包囲網突破!奪還ゴーイングメリー号
episode.summary: The crew meets at the docks and are surrounded by Marines. Using Nami as their fake hostage, they trick the Marines into letting them back on the Going Merry.

episode.title: The Pirate Ship Disappears! Fortress Battle, Round #2!
episode.english: The Pirate Ship Disappears! Fortress Battle, Round #2!
episode.japanese: Kieta Kaizokusen! Yōsai Kōbō Dai 2 Raundo
episode.transliteration: 消えた海賊船!要塞攻防第2ラウンド
episode.summary: The crew disguises the Going Merry as a Marine ship so they can get their treasure back. With the gold, they decide they’ll hire a shipwright.

episode.title: The Gold and Waver Recovery Operations!
episode.english: The Gold and Waver Recovery Operations!
episode.japanese: Ōgon Dakkan Sakusen to Ueibā Kaishū Sakusen!
episode.transliteration: 黄金奪還作戦とウエイバー回収作戦!
episode.summary: Usopp splits up the crew into two teams: the gold retrieval team and the waver retrieval team. Inspector Shepherd decides to catch Luffy on his own.

episode.title: The One Fell Swoop Plan! Jonathan's Surefire Secret Tactic!
episode.english: The One Fell Swoop Plan! Jonathan's Surefire Secret Tactic!
episode.japanese: Ichimōdajin Keikaku! Jonasan Jishin no Hisaku!
episode.transliteration: 一網打尽計画!ジョナサン自信の秘策
episode.summary: Luffy, Zoro, Usopp, and Robin continue to search for their treasure. Luffy leads Nami to the captain’s quarters where they retrieve their gold.

episode.title: Farewell, Marine Fortress! The Last Battle for Escape!
episode.english: Farewell, Marine Fortress! The Last Battle for Escape!
episode.japanese: Saraba Kaigun Yōsai! Dasshutsu e no Saigō no Kōbō
episode.transliteration: さらば海軍要塞!脱出への最後の攻防
episode.summary: The Going Merry is grounded during a period of low tide and Jonathan believes they’ve reached “checkmate”. They cleverly use the impact dial to boost the ship and the breath and flame dials to inflate the octopus balloon again so they can escape.

episode.title: Great Adventure in Long Ring Long Land!
episode.english: Great Adventure in Long Ring Long Land!
episode.japanese: Rongu Ringu Rongu Rando no Daibōken!
episode.transliteration: ロングリングロングランドの大冒険!
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Junichi FujiseStoryboarded by : Kenji Yokoyama
episode.summary: Luffy and company come across a mysterious pirate ship after trying to escape a giant wave. Soon, they arrive on an island inhabited by strange animals. Going Merry is captured by the Foxy Pirate crew.

episode.title: A Davy Back with the Foxy Pirates!
episode.english: A Davy Back with the Foxy Pirates!
episode.japanese: Fokushī Kaizokudan to Dēbī Bakku!
episode.transliteration: フォクシー海賊団とデービーバック!
episode.summary: After Tonjit re-unites with his horse, they are soon attacked by Captain Foxy and his subordinates, who challenge Luffy in a Davy Back Fight, a contest of pirates where the stakes are members of the crew.

episode.title: Round 1! One Lap of the Donut Race!
episode.english: Round 1! One Lap of the Donut Race!
episode.japanese: Dai Ikkaisen! Gururi Ishū Dōnatsu Rēsu
episode.transliteration: 第一回戦!ぐるり一周ドーナツレース
episode.summary: The first round of Davy Back Fight involves a race around the island with tiny boats. Zoro's and Chopper's boat is eliminated.

episode.title: Silver Fox Foxy! The Merciless Interference!
episode.english: Silver Fox Foxy! The Merciless Interference!
episode.japanese: Gin Gitsune no Fokushī! Mōretsu Bōgai Kōsei!
episode.transliteration: 銀ギツネのフォクシー!猛烈妨害攻勢
episode.summary: With only Luffy, Nami, and Porche's boat remaining, it's an all out war to the goal, but after Foxy exposes his Devil Fruit powers, Porche wins and takes Tony Tony Chopper from Luffy. The second round prepares to start.

episode.title: Round 2! Shoot It into the Groggy Ring!
episode.english: Round 2! Shoot It into the Groggy Ring!
episode.japanese: Dai Ni Kaisen! Buchikome Gurokkī Ringu!
episode.transliteration: 第二回戦!ブチ込めグロッキーリング
episode.summary: Without Chopper, Sanji and Zoro must face the Foxy Pirates in a ball game, but are hampered by their blatant cheating and the crooked referee.

episode.title: A Barrage of Red Cards in Groggy Ring!
episode.english: A Barrage of Red Cards in Groggy Ring!
episode.japanese: Reddo Kādo Renpatsu! Gurokkī Ringu
episode.transliteration: レッドカード連発!グロッキーリング
episode.summary: The bickering rivals Sanji and Zoro manage to overcome the opposing team by working together. Luffy chooses Tonjit's horse, Sherry over Chopper.

episode.title: Round 3! The Round-and-Round Roller Race!
episode.english: Round 3! The Round-and-Round Roller Race!
episode.japanese: Daisan Kaisen! Guruguru Rōrā Rēsu!
episode.transliteration: 第三回戦!ぐるぐるローラーレース!
episode.summary: The Straw Hats face Foxy in a race around a giant ring on roller skates.

episode.title: A Seriously Heated Race! Into the Final Round!
episode.english: A Seriously Heated Race! Into the Final Round!
episode.japanese: Hakunetsu Bakusō Rēsu! Saishū Raundo Totsunyū
episode.transliteration: 白熱爆走レース!最終ラウンド突入!
episode.summary: Thanks to some quick planning, the Straw Hats win the race.

episode.title: Screaming-Hot Bombardment! Pirate Dodgeball!
episode.english: Screaming-Hot Bombardment! Pirate Dodgeball!
episode.japanese: Unaru Netsukyū Gōkyu! Kaizoku Dojjibōru!
episode.transliteration: うなる熱球剛球! 海賊ドッジボール!
episode.summary: With Luffy's victory, he takes Chopper back, but foolishly accepts another challenge by Foxy.

episode.title: Showdown on the Cliff! Red Light, Green Light!
episode.english: Showdown on the Cliff! Red Light, Green Light!
episode.japanese: Dangai no Kessen! Daruma-san ga Koronda!
episode.transliteration: 断崖の決戦!だるまさんがころんだ!
episode.summary: Foxy decides to take Robin from Luffy this time because of her Devil Fruit ability. The next match is a race to the top of the island.

episode.title: The Captains Square Off! The Final Combat Round!
episode.english: The Captains Square Off! The Final Combat Round!
episode.japanese: Kyaputen Taiketsu! Saishūsen Konbatto!
episode.transliteration: キャプテン対決!最終戦コンバット!
episode.summary: With Chopper gone again from Luffy's crew, Luffy and Foxy face off in the final game: a battle of brawn aboard Foxy's ship.

episode.title: Full-Blast Slow-Slow Onslaught Vs. Invulnerable Luffy!
episode.english: Full-Blast Slow-Slow Onslaught Vs. Invulnerable Luffy!
episode.japanese: Zenkai Noro Noro Kōgeki vs Fujimi no Rufi
episode.transliteration: 全開ノロノロ攻撃VS不死身のルフィ
episode.summary: Luffy continues to battle Foxy with the odds not in his favor, and the fight continues inside Foxy's ship.

episode.title: Epic, Heated Combat! The Fateful Final Conclusion!
episode.english: Epic, Heated Combat! The Fateful Final Conclusion!
episode.japanese: Sōzetsu Nettō Konbatto! Unmei no Saishū Ketchaku!
episode.transliteration: 壮絶熱闘コンバット!運命の最終決着
episode.summary: Luffy manages to finally defeat Foxy by using his ability against him. After dismissing his new crewmembers, the Straw Hats leave in search for a shipwright.

episode.title: Was It Lost? Stolen? Who Are You?
episode.english: Was It Lost? Stolen? Who Are You?
episode.japanese: Ushinatta? Ubawareta? Omae wa Dare da?
episode.transliteration: 失った?奪われた?おまえはだれだ?
episode.summary: A mysterious figure appears during the night and steals the memories of the crew. In the morning, Robin is the only one who remembers the Straw Hats adventures together. Her attempts to keep the crew together fail as Nami and Zoro go separate ways.

episode.title: A Mysterious Boy With a Horn and Robin's Deduction!
episode.english: A Mysterious Boy With a Horn and Robin's Deduction!
episode.japanese: Fude o Daita Nazo no Shōnen to Robin no Suiri!
episode.transliteration: 笛を抱いた謎の少年とロビンの推理!
episode.summary: Robin suggests that only those who were sleeping lost their memories. Luffy and the others then remember seeing the mysterious boy who played some kind of flute. Later that night, they discover the boy outside and Luffy tries to fight him. At the last second, he proclaims his memory has returned.

episode.title: Now, Let's Get Back Our Memories! The Pirate Crew Lands On the Island!
episode.english: Now, Let's Get Back Our Memories! The Pirate Crew Lands On the Island!
episode.japanese: Iza Kioku o Dakkan seyo! Kaizokudan Shima ni Jōriku
episode.transliteration: いざ記憶を奪還せよ!海賊団島に上陸
episode.summary: During the night, Usopp, Chopper, and Sanji question what brought them to the Going Merry. In the morning, Usopp builds them a raft and they sail to the island where they meet Nami again. Meanwhile, the boy sets his sights on Zoro.

episode.title: Zoro Bares His Fangs! A Savage Animal Stands in the Way!
episode.english: Zoro Bares His Fangs! A Savage Animal Stands in the Way!
episode.japanese: Kiba o Muku Zoro! Tachihadakatta Yajū
episode.transliteration: 牙をむくゾロ!立ちはだかった野獣!
episode.summary: On their way to "The Palace of the Sea God" Robin's group meets an entranced Zoro. It looks like Zoro wants to fight so Luffy urges the others to keep going without him. They apprehend the kid but the whistle was what was really stealing their memories. Zoro returns, still entranced, but Luffy's nowhere to be seen.

episode.title: The Last Counterattack by the Memory Thief Who Reveals His True Colors!
episode.english: The Last Counterattack by the Memory Thief Who Reveals His True Colors!
episode.japanese: Honsei o Arawashita Kioku Dorobō no Saigo no Gyakushū
episode.transliteration: 本性を現した記憶泥棒の最後の逆襲!
episode.summary: Luffy returns and knocks some sense into Zoro. Cornered, the sea horse spreads illusions of the people in their memories to distract them. It steals their complete memories and claims that it has become a Sennenryu. Luffy defeats it and returns all the memories but the townspeople are convinced they're the memory stealers.

episode.title: Proud Man! Silver Fox Foxy!
episode.english: Proud Man! Silver Fox Foxy!
episode.japanese: Hokori Takaki Otoko! Gin Gitsune no Fokushī
episode.transliteration: 誇り高き男!銀ギツネのフォクシー
episode.summary: Luffy rescues Foxy, Hamburg, and Porche from a storm at sea. When they reunite with the Sexy Foxy ship, they find it captained by somebody new. Foxy accepts a Davy Back Fight in order to regain his ship and crew. Donning the afro once again, Luffy vows to defeat the captain.

episode.title: The Guy Who’s the Closest to Invincible? And the Most Dangerous Man!
episode.english: The Guy Who’s the Closest to Invincible? And the Most Dangerous Man!
episode.japanese: Mottomo Muteki ni Chikai Yatsu? To Mottomo Kiken na Otoko!
episode.transliteration: 最も無敵に近い奴?と最も危険な男!
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Katsumi TokoroStoryboarded by : Eisaku Inoue
episode.summary: Once Foxy wins back his crew, he captures the Straw Hats. Nami and Luffy fight Foxy and although he's defeated, his crew accepts him back. Later, they sail to an island where they meet someone Robin knows; a Marine named Aokiji.

episode.title: Navy Headquarters Admiral Aokiji! The Ferocity of an Ultimate Powerhouse!
episode.english: Navy Headquarters Admiral Aokiji! The Ferocity of an Ultimate Powerhouse!
episode.japanese: Kaigun Hombu Taishō Aokiji! Saikō Senryoku no Kyōi
episode.transliteration: 海軍本部大将青キジ!最高戦力の脅威
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Hidehiko KadotaStoryboarded by : Kenji Yokoyama
episode.summary: The man they met, Marine High Admiral Aokiji, appears to be incredibly lazy. He first displays his Devil's Fruit ability by freezing the sea so some deserted people can get off the island. Unfortunately, he's determined to catch Robin. Luffy, Sanji, and Zoro attack but they seem to be no match.

episode.title: Duel Between Rubber and Ice! Luffy vs. Aokiji!
episode.english: Duel Between Rubber and Ice! Luffy vs. Aokiji!
episode.japanese: Gomu to Koori no Ikkiuchi! Rufi VS Aokiji!
episode.transliteration: ゴムと氷の一騎打ち!ルフィVS青キジ
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Yoko IkedaStoryboarded by : Eisaku Inoue
episode.summary: Robin is frozen by Aokiji and Luffy tells the others to escape with her. In the Going Merry, Usopp and Chopper try to thaw her in the shower. Luffy gets defeated, but his life is spared as Aokiji believes he must repay the debt the marines incurred from Crocodile's defeat at Luffy's hands. With the crew defrosted, they continue sailing as usual. Zoro spots the giant frog they heard about and they chase it to an island with a lighthouse, but it appears they'll sink before they get there.

episode.title: The Dashing Sea Train and the City of Water: Water Seven!
episode.english: The Dashing Sea Train and the City of Water: Water Seven!
episode.japanese: Shissō umi ressha to mizu no miyako Uōtā Seven
episode.transliteration: 疾走海列車と水の都ウォーターセブン
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Munehisa SakaiStoryboarded by : Kenji Yokoyama
episode.summary: After the Going Merry narrowly escapes being hit by a "sea train" which knocks away the giant frog attempting to derail it, the Straw Hats meet the stationmaster Kokoro along with her granddaughter Chimney and her bunny-like cat Gonbe. Kokoro assures the crew that the frog, Yokozuna, was perfectly fine and that it was always testing its strength against the Sea Train Puffing Tom, which connects several of the nearby islands. She also explains that the Log Pose would lead them to Water Seven, a canal city of shipwrights where they could fix their ship, providing Luffy with a map and letter of introduction to the shipwrights' leader Iceburg. The Straw Hats reach Water Seven, the group splits up with Luffy, Nami and Usopp leaving to exchange their gold and rent boats driven by fish-like sea monsters called Yagaras.

episode.title: Adventure in the City on the Water! Head to the Mammoth Shipbuilding Plant!
episode.english: Adventure in the City on the Water! Head to the Mammoth Shipbuilding Plant!
episode.japanese: Suijō toshi no bōken! Mezase kyodai sōsen kōjō
episode.transliteration: 水上都市の冒険!目指せ巨大造船工場
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Kōnosuke UdaStoryboarded by : Takahiro Imamura
episode.summary: Luffy, Nami, and Usopp get strange greetings from the residents and they get to experience the roller coaster-like channels of Water Seven. Luffy find out that some pirates had been beaten at the hands of some powerful craftsmen; the Galley La Company. Meanwhile, Chopper loses Robin when she is approached by a masked figure when Zoro encounters strange figures that came to the Going Merry.

episode.title: The Franky Family and Iceberg!
episode.english: The Franky Family and Iceberg!
episode.japanese: Furankī ikka to Aisubāgu-san
episode.transliteration: フランキー一家とアイスバーグさん
episode.summary: Zoro awakens and drives off the "Franky Family", a gang of hoodlum pirate hunters. Luffy's group gets the gold they acquired from Skypeia exchanged for 300,000,000 berries. They soon reach Dock No. 1 and meet a man who resembles Usopp, Galley La's carpenter foreman Kaku, who jumps off to inspect the Going Merry while they speak to Iceberg. Usopp loses the money in his care to the Franky Family.

episode.title: Galley-La Company! A Grand Sight: Dock #1!
episode.english: Galley-La Company! A Grand Sight: Dock #1!
episode.japanese: Garēra Kanpanī! Soukan ichiban Dokku
episode.transliteration: ガレーラカンパニー!壮観一番ドック
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Kōnosuke UdaStoryboarded by : Ken Koyama
episode.summary: The Franky Family nearly escape with the Straw Hats' money were it not for untimely intervention of Galley La's Paulie while he was evading debt collectors, with another member named Rob Lucci keeping him from running off with the money. Iceberg's aide Kalifa shows Luffy, Nami, and Usopp around Dock No. 1 and tells them how Iceberg founded the Galley La Company. Usopp and the 200,000,000 berries he was carrying go missing as Kaku returns from the Going Merry and tells them that their keel is irreparably damaged.

episode.title: Pirate Abduction Incident! A Pirate Ship That Can Only Await Her End!
episode.english: Pirate Abduction Incident! A Pirate Ship That Can Only Await Her End!
episode.japanese: Kaizoku yūkai jiken to shi o matsu dake no kaizokusen
episode.transliteration: 海賊誘拐事件と死を待つだけの海賊船
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Hiroaki MiyamotoStoryboarded by : Kenji Yokoyama
episode.summary: Luffy refuses to believe that Galley La cannot repair the Going Merry before he and Nami realize that not only is Usopp missing now, but the two brief cases that were returned to them are empty. Nami decides to head to Franky House and finds Usopp on the way in a pitiful state, heading back to the ship for help while Usopp goes to the Franky House himself.

episode.title: Rescuing Our Friend! Raid On the Franky House!
episode.english: Rescuing Our Friend! Raid On the Franky House!
episode.japanese: Nakama kyūshutsu! Nagarikomi Furankī Hausu
episode.transliteration: 仲間救出!殴りこみフランキーハウス
episode.summary: Luffy, Sanji, Zoro, and Chopper follow Usopp's bloody trail to the Franky House, where they find him passed out in front after being beaten up in an attempt to get the money back from the Franky Family's leader Franky, who left with the money. The four of them proceed to overpower the Franky Family and destroy the Franky House, deducing that the money is likely gone while Luffy accepts that the Going Merry is beyond repair.

episode.title: Big Fight Under the Moon! The Pirate Flag Flutters With Sorrow!
episode.english: Big Fight Under the Moon! The Pirate Flag Flutters With Sorrow!
episode.japanese: Gekka no dai kenka! Kanashimi ni hirugaeru kaizoku hata!
episode.transliteration: 月下の大喧嘩!哀しみに翻る海賊旗!
episode.summary: Once they're back on the ship, Luffy explains to a guilt-ridden Usopp that the Going Merry can no longer be repaired and has chosen to get a new ship instead. Usopp believes that Luffy has abandoned the dignity of their ship and says he's leaving the crew, challenging Luffy to a duel at nighttime.

episode.title: Luffy vs. Usopp! Collision of Two Men's Pride!
episode.english: Luffy vs. Usopp! Collision of Two Men's Pride!
episode.japanese: Rufi VS Usoppu! Butsukaru otoko no iji
episode.transliteration: ルフィvsウソップ!ぶつかる男の意地
episode.summary: Usopp fights Luffy in order to decide who keeps the Going Merry; going all out while keeping a hesitant Luffy on his toes as he and others remember their time with Usopp. Even after taking a harsh beating, Luffy defeats Usopp before he and the crew leave him and the ship behind.

episode.title: Severe Shock Hits the City of Water! Iceberg Targeted!
episode.english: Severe Shock Hits the City of Water! Iceberg Targeted!
episode.japanese: Gekishin mizu no miyako! Newareta Aisubāgu
episode.transliteration: 激震水の都!狙われたアイスバーグ
episode.summary: The Straw Hats get themselves a hotel room as Nami finds the crew on the roof and informs them that Iceberg has been shot. As the Galley La Company frantically search for answers, Nami and Luffy decide to check on his condition – only to be met by closed gates. At the same time, Franky returns to Water Seven and goes after Luffy to exact his revenge for destroying the Franky House – with style.

episode.title: Gum-Gum Human vs. Fire-Breathing Cyborg!
episode.english: Gum-Gum Human vs. Fire-Breathing Cyborg!
episode.japanese: Gomugomu ningen VS hi o fuku kaizō ningen
episode.transliteration: ゴムゴム人間VS火を吹く改造人間
episode.summary: In the streets outside of the hospital, Luffy fights Franky as the latter reveals himself to be a cyborg. Inside, Iceberg recalls seeing Nico Robin and another tall man before he was shot. The Galley La company run outside and stop Franky and Luffy and tell them that they suspect the Straw Hat Pirates of the crime.

episode.title: The Straw Hat Pirates Are the Culprits? The Protectors of the City of Water!
episode.english: The Straw Hat Pirates Are the Culprits? The Protectors of the City of Water!
episode.japanese: Hannin wa mugiwara kaizokudan? Mizu no miyako no yōjinbo
episode.transliteration: 犯人は麦わら海賊団?水の都の用心棒
episode.summary: The Galley La Company continues to fight Luffy with an enraged Franky attempting to take both sides out. An incredibly high tide called the "Aqua Laguna" is coming and Chopper and Sanji rush to warn Usopp. Luffy raises some chaos in order to meet with Iceberg and he demands to know what's happening. Iceberg says he wants to see Robin one more time.

episode.title: Eternal Farewell? Nico Robin: The Woman Who Draws Darkness!
episode.english: Eternal Farewell? Nico Robin: The Woman Who Draws Darkness!
episode.japanese: Eien no wakare? Yami o hiku onna Niko Robin
episode.transliteration: 永遠の別れ?闇を引く女ニコ·ロビン
episode.summary: In a bar, while recharging his soda reserves, Franky talks with Kokoro about her theory that Iceberg was shot by an agent of World Government's shadow organization CP9. The rumors she speaks of seem to have some truth as we see Robin meeting with CP9 members. While the crew hide from angry residents, Sanji and Chopper indirectly warn Usopp of Aqua Laguna before discover Robin are informed by her of what they've feared: she's responsible and she wants to part ways.

episode.title: Capture Robin! The Determination of the Straw Hats!
episode.english: Capture Robin! The Determination of the Straw Hats!
episode.japanese: Robin o tsukamaero! Mugiwara ichimi no ketsui
episode.transliteration: ロビンを捕まえろ!麦わら一味の決意
episode.summary: Chopper reunites with the others without Sanji and they discuss what's happened. Luffy decides that they need to catch Robin to know the full truth. Usopp attempts to repair the ship enough to withstand the Aqua Laguna and the Straw Hats make their way to the Galley La Company.

episode.title: Cannon Fire Is the Signal! CP9 Goes Into Action!
episode.english: Cannon Fire Is the Signal! CP9 Goes Into Action!
episode.japanese: Aizu wa hōgeki to tomo ni! Ugokidashita CP9
episode.transliteration: 合図は砲撃と共に!動き出したCP9
episode.summary: The Straw Hats rush to Galley La as three CP9 agents commence their raid. Robin and the mysterious man that shot Iceberg entering Iceberg's room due to the latter's Devil Fruit powers, masked-man informing him that CP9 framed the pirates and seeks blueprints he kept hidden and would've passed down to Paulie. Luffy separates from his group.

episode.title: CP9 Takes Off Their Masks! Their Shocking True Faces!
episode.english: CP9 Takes Off Their Masks! Their Shocking True Faces!
episode.japanese: Kamen o totta CP9! Sono odoroki no sugao
episode.transliteration: 仮面を取ったCP9!その驚きの素顔
episode.summary: Robin speaks with Iceberg while the masked man leaves to keep anyone from interfering, Robin learning that Iceberg possesses the blueprints to the ultimate warship, Pluton. Elsewhere, Luffy is tied up with Paulie after the latter reveales to masked CP9 agents that the blueprints are fake. This forces the CP9 agents to regroup in Iceberg's room to interrogate Iceberg while revealing their identities as Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa, and Bluno.

episode.title: Secret Bond! Iceberg and Franky!
episode.english: Secret Bond! Iceberg and Franky!
episode.japanese: Hisometa kizuna! Aisubāgu to Furankī
episode.transliteration: 秘めた絆!アイスバーグとフランキー
episode.summary: Lucci tells Iceberg their hypothesis from learning of the decoy blueprints and has Kaku check Iceberg's pulse to confirm that he gave the blueprints to another: a fellow apprentice of his mentor Tom named Cutty Flam, who now goes by Franky. The Straw Hat Pirates and Paulie break into the room where they find Iceberg and CP9. Meanwhile, Franky learns of Usopp working on the Going Merry and decides to capture him.

episode.title: Come Back, Robin! Showdown With CP9!
episode.english: Come Back, Robin! Showdown With CP9!
episode.japanese: Kaette koi Robin! CP9 to no taiketsu!
episode.transliteration: 帰って来いロビン!CP9との対決!
episode.summary: Luffy and the others request that Robin comes back to the crew. She refuses and tells them that she cannot accomplish her "wish" if she were to stay with them. Robin turns to leave and while CP9 hold the pirates back while intent silence them, Iceberg, and Paulie. Robin successfully escapes and Lucci decides to use the remaining time before the building goes up in flames to unveil his "transformation".

episode.title: The Straw Hat Pirates Annihilated? The Menace of the Leopard Model!
episode.english: The Straw Hat Pirates Annihilated? The Menace of the Leopard Model!
episode.japanese: Mugiwara kaizokudan zenmetsu? Moderu hyō no kyōi
episode.transliteration: 麦わら海賊団全滅?モデル豹の脅威!
episode.summary: Lucci explains he acquired the power of a Zoan Devil's Fruit; the Cat-Cat Fruit: Leopard-Type, before quickly disposes of Luffy and Zoro while CP9 tie up Paulie and Iceberg, leaving them alone as the building slowly burns down around them. In Franky's underground hideout, Usopp tells him his story and Franky is finally touched. In return, Franky tells him a little about Tom's contributions to Water Seven.

episode.title: The Man Who Is Loved Even by His Ship! Usopp's Tears!
episode.english: The Man Who Is Loved Even by His Ship! Usopp's Tears!
episode.japanese: Fune kara mo aisareta otoko! Usoppu no namida!
episode.transliteration: 船からも愛された男!ウソップの涙!
episode.summary: Usopp believes that the person who repaired the Going Merry in Skypeia was really the ship itself, explaining Franky explaining that the ship was inhabited by a spirit who manifests on ships who are dearly cared for and the Going Merry repaired itself so the Straw Hats can reach the next island. When attempting to stop Franky from destroying the Going Merry in an act of mercy for the ship's sake, Usopp admits he knows be cannot bring himself to abandon the ship. The doorbell rings from the sea side and the CP9 agents, after attacked Franky's men prior, enter.

episode.title: Franky's Past! The Day the Sea Train First Ran!
episode.english: Franky's Past! The Day the Sea Train First Ran!
episode.japanese: Furankī no kako! Umi ressha ga hashitta hi
episode.transliteration: フランキーの過去!海列車が走った日
episode.summary: The CP9 agents overpower Franky and discover a hidden room that they tear through to Franky's dismay of them trampling his memories. A long flashback ensues, covering Franky's past in Tom's Workers and how he and Iceberg helped create the Sea Train so Tom can save their city while not be held accountable for creating Gold Roger's ship.

episode.title: Spandam's Scheme! The Day the Sea Train Shook!
episode.english: Spandam's Scheme! The Day the Sea Train Shook!
episode.japanese: Supandamu no inbō! Umi ressha ga ureta hi
episode.transliteration: スパンダムの陰謀!海列車が揺れた日
episode.summary: Eight years prior to the Straw Hats reaching Water Seven, a CP5 agent named Spandam seeks to acquire the Pluton blueprints from Tom by any means to give the World Government an advantage against all pirates. As Franky walked into the town on the day that Tom would be a free man, Spandams flunkies stage an attack with the battleships that Franky personally constructed. Tom and Iceberg run to their shipyard where they're attacked by two ships which also destroy the others, they and Franky brought before the judge for trial. Franky denounces his ships with a provked Tom punching him, taking him to acknowledge every ship he ever made or he'll never forgive him.

episode.title: The End of the Legendary Man! The Day the Sea Train Cried!
episode.english: The End of the Legendary Man! The Day the Sea Train Cried!
episode.japanese: Densetsu no otoko no saigo! Umi ressha ga naita hi
episode.transliteration: 伝説の男の最期!海列車が泣いた日
episode.summary: After telling Franky to take pride in the ships he created, Tom takes a swing at Spandam before confessing to the attack while asking the judge to alter the arrangement to resolve him and his apprentices of the crime while taken to Enies Lobby and be executed for building Roger's ship. Franky, after disfisguring Spandam with the butt of a rifle, falses in his attempt to stop the train to Enies Lobby with his bare hands and was presumed dead by everyone. In the present, after being restrained, Franky learns that Spandam is now the leader of CP9.

episode.title: The Truth Behind Her Betrayal! Robin's Sorrowful Decision!
episode.english: The Truth Behind Her Betrayal! Robin's Sorrowful Decision!
episode.japanese: Uragiri no shinsō! Robin no kanashiki ketsui!
episode.transliteration: 裏切りの真相!ロビンの哀しき決意!
episode.summary: Chopper escapes the burning building with Paulie and Iceberg on his back and collapses outside. Iceberg tells Nami that CP9 threatened to destroy the Straw Hats if Robin didn't cooperate with them. Nami rushes to tell Chopper so they can go looking for the rest of the crew. Elsewhere, the CP9 agents let go of the Going Merry so she would be destroyed at sea.

episode.title: The Steam Whistle Forces Friends Apart! The Sea Train Starts to Run!
episode.english: The Steam Whistle Forces Friends Apart! The Sea Train Starts to Run!
episode.japanese: Nakama o hikihanasu kiteki! Hashiridasu umi ressha
episode.transliteration: 仲間を引き離す汽笛!走り出す海列車
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Yukihiko NakaoStoryboarded by : Kenji Yokoyama
episode.summary: Paulie helps clear the name of the Straw Hats but doesn't tell the mob everything he knows. He gets the mob to follow Chopper so they can search for the rest of the crew. Nami goes her own way so she can rush to the Sea Train. As Nami nears the station, Sanji, ahead of her, approaches the train.

episode.title: Sanji Barges In! Sea Train Battle in the Storm!
episode.english: Sanji Barges In! Sea Train Battle in the Storm!
episode.japanese: Sanji totsunyū! arashi no naka no umi ressha batoru!
episode.transliteration: サンジ突入!嵐の中の海列車バトル!
episode.summary: Nami and the conductors are rescued by Paulie when the Aqua Laguna floods the main station. A man hands Nami a letter he found from Sanji. It informs her that Usopp, Franky, and he are on board the train that had just departed. On board, he storms the cars. High up in the city, Nami speaks with Kokoro and spots Luffy, stuck in between two buildings, in the back streets where the Aqua Laguna will hit first.

episode.title: Nami's Soul Cries Out! Straw Hat Luffy Makes a Comeback!
episode.english: Nami's Soul Cries Out! Straw Hat Luffy Makes a Comeback!
episode.japanese: Nami tamashii no sakebi! Mugiwara no Rufi fukukatsu!
episode.transliteration: ナミ魂の叫び!麦わらのルフィ復活!
episode.summary: Nami finally reaches Luffy and tells him that he needs to hurry before Robin reaches Enies Lobby. Chopper finds Zoro and hands him the Sandai Kitetsu so he can escape the chimney. Luffy pushes apart the buildings he was stuck between and Paulie grabs them all so they can escape the Aqua Laguna's massive wave.

episode.title: Another Sea Train? Rocketman Charges Forth!
episode.english: Another Sea Train? Rocketman Charges Forth!
episode.japanese: Mō hitotsu no umi ressha? Rokettoman shutsugeki
episode.transliteration: もう一つの海列車?ロケットマン出撃
episode.summary: Sanji fights his way through another train car and finds Usopp and Franky. Seeing how determined Luffy is to save Robin, Kokoro and Iceberg lends the Straw Hat crew the use of another sea train, Rocket Man. The Franky Family shows up, pleading with Luffy to let them join them because they'll do anything for their leader.

episode.title: Rescue Our Friends! A Bond Among Foes Sworn with Fists!
episode.english: Rescue Our Friends! A Bond Among Foes Sworn with Fists!
episode.japanese: Nakama o sukue! Kobushi ni chikatta teki dōshi no kizuna!
episode.transliteration: 仲間を救え!拳に誓った敵同士の絆!
episode.summary: The Rocket Man finally makes it out to sea. As the train connects with the tracks, Luffy has to rescue Chimney before she's thrown off by the wind. In the meanwhile, Iceberg has a flashback about when he finally met Franky again in Water Seven. With Luffy and Chimney safe in the train, Paulie tells his fellow carpenters who the real culprits were. The Straw Hats, Franky Family, and Galley La Company form an alliance.

episode.title: Smash the Wave! Luffy and Zoro Use the Strongest Combo!
episode.english: Smash the Wave! Luffy and Zoro Use the Strongest Combo!
episode.japanese: Nami o sake! Rufi to Zoro no saikyō gattai waza
episode.transliteration: 波を砕け!ルフィとゾロの最強合体技
episode.summary: Luffy and Zoro perform a move that acts similar to a cannon and blasts a hole through the wall of the tidal wave ahead of them, opening up a channel for them to pass through. They miraculously pass through unscathed and the passengers rejoice. Sanji contacts the rest of the crew and fills them in on his current situation. Usopp separates from them but later, when Sanji and Franky are spotted, a man named Sogeking comes to their rescue.

episode.title: A Mysterious Man Appears?! His Name Is Sniperking!
episode.english: A Mysterious Man Appears?! His Name Is Sniperking!
episode.japanese: Nazo no otoko tōjō!? Sono na wa Sogekingu!
episode.transliteration: 謎の男登場!?その名はそげキング!
episode.summary: Sogeking makes his grand entrance. Franky and Sanji aren't fooled by his costume but they try to humor him. They devise a plan first, then detach the last two cars and fight their way through the rest. Back in the Rocket Man, Luffy, Zoro, Nami, and Chopper get an outfit change; Nami shows off the weapon Usopp upgraded for her while he was still with them.

episode.title: Showdown Between Cooks! Sanji vs. Ramen Kenpo
episode.english: Showdown Between Cooks! Sanji vs. Ramen Kenpo
episode.japanese: Kokku taiketsu! Sanji VS Rāmen kenpō
episode.transliteration: コック対決!サンジVSラーメン拳法
episode.summary: Kalifa updates the CP9 on the situation with Franky, Sanji, and Usopp. Sanji tells Franky and Usopp to go on without him so he can fight Wanze and his "Ramen Kenpo". Franky begins to fight Nero, CP9's "Weasel", and Sogeking meets with Robin.

episode.title: Rooftop Duel! Franky vs. Nero
episode.english: Rooftop Duel! Franky vs. Nero
episode.japanese: yane no ue no kettō! Furankī VS Nero
episode.transliteration: 屋根の上の決闘!フランキーVSネロ
episode.summary: Franky's fight with Nero continues. Nero discovers that Franky's weak spot is his back, so Franky lies down flat so he can't get to it. Nero demands that he fight seriously, so Franky gets up to perform his "Centaur" form. Sogeking talks with Robin and tells her that the crew knows about her reasons for leaving. Those on the Rocket Man encounter the discarded cars and Zoro slices them so they can pass.

episode.title: Clash! Demon-Slasher Zoro vs. Ship-Slasher T-Bone!
episode.english: Clash! Demon-Slasher Zoro vs. Ship-Slasher T-Bone!
episode.japanese: Gekitotsu! Onigiri Zoro VS funegiri T Bōn
episode.transliteration: 激突!鬼斬りゾロVS船斬りTボーン
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Morio HatanoStoryboarded by : Makiko Orimoto
episode.summary: Zoro clashes with "Ship Cutter" T-Bone. The fight is short and Zoro joins the crew again in the Rocket Man. On the Puffing Tom, Sanji beats Wanze beautiful, though Wanze thinks he's ruined his face. Franky finally gains the upper hand against Nero and defeats him. After beating their respective opponents, Franky and Sanji stand to fight against the other CP9.

episode.title: Scramble over Robin! A Cunning Plan by Sniperking!!
episode.english: Scramble over Robin! A Cunning Plan by Sniperking!!
episode.japanese: Robin sōdatsusen! Sogekingu no kisaku!!
episode.transliteration: ロビン争奪戦!そげキングの奇策!!
episode.summary: After hiding under Robin's cloak for a few episodes, Sogeking finally shows himself. They stumble into the room with the CP9 and meet with Sanji and Franky. Sogeking produces a smokescreen. The four head into another car, detach it, and escape. It's not long before Blueno pulls their car back, though. Franky knocks down the wall so they can escape but ends up on the enemy car. Blueno opens a door then back in the Straw Hat car.

episode.title: The Judicial Island! Full View of Enies Lobby!
episode.english: The Judicial Island! Full View of Enies Lobby!
episode.japanese: Shihō no shima! Eniesu Robī no zenbō
episode.transliteration: 司法の島!エニエス·ロビーの全貌!
episode.summary: Robin willingly follows Blueno into his improvised door and Sogeking and Sanji are left alone. For a while, Blueno explains a little of Robin's past involving the Buster Call. Back at the Rocket Man, Yokuzuna the frog jumps onto the front of the train, knocking them from the rails. After Kokoro speaks with him, he joins the group. The CP9, Franky, and Robin finally reach Enies Lobby and disembark.

episode.title: Landing Operations Start! Charge in, Straw Hats!
episode.english: Landing Operations Start! Charge in, Straw Hats!
episode.japanese: Jōriku Sakusen Shidō! Mugiwara Ichimi Totsunyū seyo!
episode.transliteration: 上陸作戦始動! 麦わら一味突入せよ!
episode.summary: As the Straw Hats and their allies are about to reach Enies Lobby, Paulie sketches the island's terrain and explains that, to save Robin, the crew must reach her before she passes through the Gates of Justice (正義の門, Seigi no Mon). Since the Straw Hats are the only ones with any chance of matching the CP9 in combat, the Franky Family and the Galley-La foremen intend to be the first wave so the pirates can rush in on Rocketman. As Enies Lobby draws near, the gigantic Gates of Justice appears in the sky behind it. While his crewmates and allies gaze in awe, Luffy ignores the plan and strides past the first of the gates. On the other side of the island, in the Tower of Law (司法の塔, Shihō no Tō), Chief Spandam and other CP9 agent await the arrival of Rob Lucci's group and their prisoners.

episode.title: Luffy Cuts Through! Big Showdown on the Judicial Island!
episode.english: Luffy Cuts Through! Big Showdown on the Judicial Island!
episode.japanese: Rufi Kai Shingeki! Shihō no Shima de Dai Kessen!
episode.transliteration: ルフィ快進撃! 司法の島で大決戦!!
episode.summary: Luffy easily gets past the second gate, while the Franky Family and the Galley-La foremen, following their initial plan, break the first gate's defenses. All goes smoothly at first, but by the time the Franky Family's main force reaches the second gate, the marines have the giants Oimo (オイモ) and Kashi (カーシー, Kāshī) to take up their posts. Overmatched in strength and size, the Franky Family send their largest fighters, the Kairiki Destroyers (怪力デストロイヤーズ, Kairiki Desutoroiyāzu). However, even these overly large humans can do little against the giants' power and are quickly defeated. On the other side of the gate, Luffy faces the collective might of Enies Lobby's 10,000 men.

episode.title: Battle Against Giants! Open the Second Gate!
episode.english: Battle Against Giants! Open the Second Gate!
episode.japanese: Kyojinzoku to no Kōbō! Dai Ni no Mon o Akero!
episode.transliteration: 巨人族との攻防! 第2の門を開けろ!
episode.summary: The Galley-La foremen and the leading members of the Franky Family arrive late at the second gate because they had to mount the Franky Family's king bulls (キングブル), sea dwelling animals that look like sea horses, on caterpillar tracks. Combining forces, they manage to pin down Kashi against a wall. Then, taunting Oimo, they goad him into accidentally knocking Kashi out. In the Tower of Law, Spandam receives an incomplete report about the number of people that Luffy took out, believing the enemy captain is not a threat. Lucci's party arrives and the CP9 celebrate their reunion with petty bickering and a contest of strength. Meanwhile, Luffy, defying resistance, makes his way towards the Courthouse Plaza.

episode.title: Find a Way Out! Rocketman Takes Flight!
episode.english: Find a Way Out! Rocketman Takes Flight!
episode.japanese: Katsuro o Hirake! Sora o Tobu Rokettoman!
episode.transliteration: 活路を開け! 空を飛ぶロケットマン!
episode.summary: Robin and Franky are brought before Spandam, while Luffy blasts through waves of marines. The Galley-La foremen and the Franky Family eventually slip by Oimo and open the second gate. However, their joy is short-lived, as a group of marines closes the first gate behind them. To overcome the unanticipated obstacle, Zoro changes the plan. Yokozuna bends the island's outside fence downward. Using it as a ramp, the sea train jumps over both of the gates and crash lands into Oimo's back, finishing him off, and concluding everyone's arrival at the main island. As the marines' elite Law's Watch Dog Unit enters the now escalating fight.

episode.title: Catch Up with Luffy! The Straw Hats’ All-Out Battle
episode.english: Catch Up with Luffy! The Straw Hats’ All-Out Battle
episode.japanese: Rufi ni Oitsuke! Mugiwara Ichimi Sōryokusen
episode.transliteration: ルフィに追いつけ! 麦わら一味総力戦
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Hiroaki MiyamotoStoryboarded by : Eisaku Inoue
episode.summary: The Straw Hats struggle to catch up with Luffy, but get caught up in impeding each other's efforts; Sanji and Zoro indulge themselves in petty bickering and Nami injures her crewmates by testing her newly improved weapon. The streets appear empty, abandoned by the men who were fighting Luffy. Just then, the Law's Watch Dog Unit and a large group of other men step into their way. A fight seems inevitable until their allies, riding the king bulls, arrive. Paulie uses his ropes to pull the crew onto the back of one of the large animals. Then the Galley-La foremen replace Straw Hats' in battle to allow the rest of the group to escape.

episode.title: Robin Betrayed! The Motive of the World Government!
episode.english: Robin Betrayed! The Motive of the World Government!
episode.japanese: Uragira re ta Robin! Sekai Seifu no Omowaku!
episode.transliteration: 裏切られたロビン! 世界政府の思惑!
episode.summary: Spandam tells Robin that her crew has come to save her and that he, despite the agreement between her and the CP9, plans on taking them prisoner. On the main road, the Straw Hats and the Franky Family proceed towards the Courthouse Plaza. Chopper talks with the king bull Sodom, who notes that Usopp did not make it onto his back. Meanwhile, frustrated with his inability to move forward, Luffy slingshots himself onto the courthouse. There, Blueno is awaiting his arrival.

episode.title: Give Robin Back! Luffy vs. Blueno!
episode.english: Give Robin Back! Luffy vs. Blueno!
episode.japanese: Robin o Kaese! Rufi vs. Burūno!
episode.transliteration: ロビンを返せ! ルフィvsブルーノ!
episode.summary: Oimo explains to Usopp about how he and Kāshī came to support the marines—the marines told them that they arrested their bosses: the giants Dorry and Broggy that Straw Hats met shortly after entering the Grand Line. Sodom the king bull incurs severe damage and urges the Straw Hats riding him to continue without him. Quickly, they board Sodom's brother Gomorrah and continue on. Atop of the courthouse, the fight between Blueno and Luffy begins with the latter's first punch appearing to give more effect compared to their previous encounter.

episode.title: Don't Stop! Hoist the Counterattack Signal!
episode.english: Don't Stop! Hoist the Counterattack Signal!
episode.japanese: Tachidomaru na! Hangeki no Noroshi o Agero!
episode.transliteration: 立ち止まるな! 反撃の狼煙を上げろ!
episode.summary: Kokoro and her granddaughter Chimeney contact the Straw Hats by means of Nami's portable transponder snail phone. They inform them of Luffy's location and instruct them on how to lower the courthouse's drawbridge. The Franky Family decides to lower it. Just then, the second of Enies Lobby's elite units enters the battle. One of the Guilty Jurymen throws his massive iron ball at Gomorrah, knocking him down. Luckily, Usopp turns the ties with Omoi and Kashi after revealing that truth of Dorry and Broggy have never been imprisoned. Gomorrah, arising again despite severe injury, tells those riding him to hold on as he plans to take them to their destination. Inside the Tower of Law, Kaku and Kalifa hesitatingly eat the devil fruits that Spandam has given them.

episode.title: Almost to Luffy! Gather at the Courthouse Plaza!
episode.english: Almost to Luffy! Gather at the Courthouse Plaza!
episode.japanese: Rufi Mokuzen! Saibanshomae Hiroba e Shūketsu se yo
episode.transliteration: ルフィ目前! 裁判所前広場へ集結せよ
episode.summary: Although Gomorrah was blinded, he continues on. Sanji and Zoro crush a building in the king bull's path and the party arrives at the courthouse. On the other side of the drawbridge, Spandam is brought a transponder snail phone with an urgent report. Confident that he will only be told of the Straw Hats' capture, he allows Robin and Franky to listen in, letting them know of their rescuers' success. In front of the courthouse, Zoro cuts open the building's immense stone door. The Franky Family split into three groups, two of which storm the drawbridge towers to reach the levelers at their tops. On the courthouse's roof, Luffy and Blueno fight on even terms until Luffy activates his newest technique, the Gear Second.

episode.title: Everything is to Protect My Friends! Second Gear Activated!
episode.english: Everything is to Protect My Friends! Second Gear Activated!
episode.japanese: Subete wa Nakama o Mamoru Tame ni! Gia Sekando Hatsudō
episode.transliteration: 全ては仲間を守る為に! ギア2発動!
episode.summary: The Straw Hats storm the courthouse, where the remaining members of the Franky Family fight the three-headed judge Baskerville, and, aided by Yokozuna, block the building's entrance to cut off reinforcements. Above them, Luffy's Gear Second is put into action against Blueno, while his crew fight their way upstairs. On the main road, the giants have defeated the Law's Watch Dog Unit, and with Usopp and the Galley-La foremen are heading for the plaza. Luffy defeats Blueno, steps past his unconscious body, and cries out for Robin to hear that he has arrived.

episode.title: Give us Your Answer, Robin! The Straw Hats' Outcry!
episode.english: Give us Your Answer, Robin! The Straw Hats' Outcry!
episode.japanese: Kotaero Robin! Mugiwara Ichimi no Sakebi!!
episode.transliteration: 答えろロビン! 麦わら一味の叫び!!
episode.summary: Franky cannot understand why Robin refuses to be saved after Spandam broke his promise. While Luffy yells in the background, Franky decides to make Robin face him. He uses his remaining cola to inflate his buttocks and with a giant fart shoots himself and Robin outside, onto the balcony, and into Luffy's sight, breaking his chains in the process. Luffy wants to slingshot himself over the waterfall to rescue Robin, but she tells him to stay and that only she wants to die. In front of the courthouse, Yokozuna succumbs to the jurymen's attacks. The marines are about to pour in as the giants arrive and assume control of the position. Kashi throws Usopp onto the courthouse where he joins the assembling Straw Hats. Gathering on the battlements, they face Robin and the CP9, while they wait for the drawbridge to be lowered.

episode.title: Robin's Past! The Girl Who was Called a Devil!
episode.english: Robin's Past! The Girl Who was Called a Devil!
episode.japanese: Robin no Kako! Akuma to Yoba re ta Shōjo!
episode.transliteration: ロビンの過去! 悪魔と呼ばれた少女!
episode.summary: Twenty years into the past, Robin is growing up on the island of Ohara. Her aunt, with whom she lives while her mother is away doing research, treats her poorly. Other children ostracize her. Studying in the world's greatest library, the Tree of Omniscience, in the hopes of being allowed to help the local archeologists in their forbidden research, Robin earns the rank of a scholar in archaeology at age eight. However, when she announces her intention to help, her request is denied because of her youth. Disappointed at being rejected again, she walks along the shore, where she stumbles on Jaguar D. Saul, a giant and deserted vice-admiral of the navy. The two become friends and Saul teaches her to laugh.

episode.title: Fated Mother and Daughter! The Mother's Name is Olvia!
episode.english: Fated Mother and Daughter! The Mother's Name is Olvia!
episode.japanese: Shukumei no Oyako! Sono Haha no Na wa Orubia!
episode.transliteration: 宿命の母娘! その母の名はオルビア!
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Toru YamadaStoryboarded by : Eisaku Inoue
episode.summary: Saul is shocked to learn that Robin is Nico Olvia's daughter and that he has been washed up on the shores of Ohara. Olvia, who returned to the island on a stolen navy ship, hurries to the Tree of Omniscience to warn her colleagues of a coming navy fleet. However, she is too late. The government ship that carried Spandam's father Spandaine and his men has already arrived. They frighten the island's population into boarding an evacuation ship, while the government soldiers arrest the scholars and search the library. Professor Clover, Robin's mentor, urges Robin to board the evacuation ship, but she refuses. As it becomes clear that the scholars will not be forgiven for their forbidden research, Clover asks to be allowed to speak to the heads of the government, known as the Five Elder Stars.

episode.title: The Tragedy of Ohara! The Terror of the Buster Call!
episode.english: The Tragedy of Ohara! The Terror of the Buster Call!
episode.japanese: Ohara no Higeki! Basutā Kōru no Kyōfu
episode.transliteration: オハラの悲劇! バスターコールの恐怖
episode.summary: Professor Clover is allowed to speak with one of the Elder Stars and reports of their research. He describes a civilization that existed hundreds of years ago and vanished at the time that the world government assumed power. He considers the collective evidence, which leads him to believe that the government tried to erase their former enemies from history. After stating that Ohara has learned too much, the Elder Star orders Spandaine to kill the professor and to give the order to destroy the island. Suddenly, the library is set aflame; while the scholars try to save the books, Robin admits to being an archeologist and unites with her mother. However, their union does not last long. Around them, cannon shots from the Buster Call's battleships start to hail down and Olvia sends her daughter off with Saul to flee the island, while she joins the effort to save the library's knowledge.

episode.title: Say You Want to Live! We Are Your Friends!!
episode.english: Say You Want to Live! We Are Your Friends!!
episode.japanese: Ikitai to Ie! Oretachi wa Nakama da!!
episode.transliteration: 生きたいと言え! オレ達は仲間だ!!
episode.summary: Saul fights the battleships, attempting to allow Robin to escape. She tries to board the evacuation ship, but per Spandaine's orders, she is denied access. Vize-Admiral Kuzan, later known as Admiral Aokiji, enters the scene to engage in battle with Saul. While they fight, the evacuation ship is sunk by the fanatical Vice-Admiral Sakazuki, later known as Admiral Akainu. Saul, on the verge of dying, instructs Robin to flee on his raft. Persuaded by Saul's argument and Sakazuki's action, Kuzan helps Robin escape. From then on, Robin lives a life on the run, not being able to trust even the kindest of people, in a world that believes that her existence alone is a sin. In the present, Robin admits her greatest fear: to be seen as a burden by her crewmates and cast away, because being with her means having the world as their enemy. Finally knowing what kept her away, Sogeking, on Luffy's order, burns the government's flag, declaring war against the World Government itself.

episode.title: Jump Towards the Falls! Luffy's Feelings!
episode.english: Jump Towards the Falls! Luffy's Feelings!
episode.japanese: Taki ni Mukatte Tobe! Rufi no Omoi!!
episode.transliteration: 滝に向かって飛べ! ルフィの想い!!
episode.summary: Luffy's backstory is shown.

episode.title: Straw Hat Theatre #1: Chopper Man
episode.english: Straw Hat Theatre #1: Chopper Man
episode.japanese: Mugiwara Gekijō Sono Ichi: Chopper Man
episode.transliteration: 麦わら劇場その1「Chopper Man」
episode.summary: The "ally of justice" (正義の味方, seigi no mikata) Chopper Man (チョッパーマン, Choppā Man) and his "lovely assistant" (可憐なる助手, karen naru joshu) Namifia (ナミフィア) battle against the "incarnation of evil" (悪の権化, aku no gonge) Dr. Usodabada (ウソダバダ), his henchmen "onigiri mystery-man" (おにぎり怪人, onigiri kaijin) Zorokiller (ゾロキラー, Zorokillā), "flower mystery-woman" (お花怪人, ohana kaijin) Robiflowan (ロビフラワン, Robifurawan), and the "perverted monster" (エロかいじゅう, ero kaijū) Sanjilops (サンジロプス, Sanjiropusu), as well as against his "secret weapon" (秘密兵器, himitsu heiki), the "giant robot" (巨大ロボ, kyodai robo) Giant Luffy Bomber (ジャイアント·ルフィボンバー, Jaianto Rufibonbā).

episode.title: The Ways of Men! Zoro's Techniques, Usopp's Dream!
episode.english: The Ways of Men! Zoro's Techniques, Usopp's Dream!
episode.japanese: Otoko no Ikisama! Zoro no Waza Usoppu no Yume
episode.transliteration: 男の生き様! ゾロの業·ウソップの夢
episode.summary: Zoro and Usopp's backstories are summarized.

episode.title: Straw Hat Theatre #2: Report Time
episode.english: Straw Hat Theatre #2: Report Time
episode.japanese: Mugiwara Gekijō Sono Ni: Report Time
episode.transliteration: 麦わら劇場その2「Report Time」
episode.summary: A reporter visits the Straw Hat crew to interview them about the food on the ship before Sanji joined.

episode.title: A Bond of Friendship Woven by Tears! Nami's World Map!
episode.english: A Bond of Friendship Woven by Tears! Nami's World Map!
episode.japanese: Namida ga Tsumui da Nakama no Kizuna! Nami no Sekai Chizu
episode.transliteration: 涙が紡いだ仲間の絆! ナミの世界地図
episode.summary: Nami's backstory is summarized.

episode.title: Straw Hat Theatre #3: Obahan Time
episode.english: Straw Hat Theatre #3: Obahan Time
episode.japanese: Mugiwara Gekijō Sono San: Obahan Time
episode.transliteration: 麦わら劇場その3「Obahan Time」
episode.summary: A simple question is answered: if the Straw Hat Pirates were all middle-aged women, who would be the strongest?

episode.title: Parting Builds a Man's Character! Sanji and Chopper!
episode.english: Parting Builds a Man's Character! Sanji and Chopper!
episode.japanese: Wakare ga Otoko o Migaku! Sanji to Choppā
episode.transliteration: 別れが男を磨く! サンジとチョッパー
episode.summary: The backstories of Sanji and Chopper are summarized.

episode.title: Straw Hat Theatre #4: No Respect Time
episode.english: Straw Hat Theatre #4: No Respect Time
episode.japanese: Mugiwara Gekijō Sono Yon: Jingi Nai Time
episode.transliteration: 麦わら劇場その4「仁義ないTime」
episode.summary: The three mafia leaders, Don Luffione (ドン·ルフィオーネ, Don Rufiōne), Don Zorocia (ドン·ゾロシア), and Don Sanjino (ドン·サンジーノ) meet. After an argument, Don Zoroscia declares war. The mafia heads dispatch the assassins Usotoūya (ウソトウーヤ), Choparīni (チョパリーニ), Namimore (ナミモーレ), and Robita (ロビータ) to kill their peers.[28]

episode.title: Everything is for Her Friends! Robin in the Darkness!
episode.english: Everything is for Her Friends! Robin in the Darkness!
episode.japanese: Subete wa Nakama no Tame ni! Yami no Naka no Robin!
episode.transliteration: 全ては仲間の為に! 闇の中のロビン!
episode.summary: The reasons for Nico Robin's recent actions as well as her backstory are summarized.

episode.title: Straw Hat Theatre #5: Monster Time
episode.english: Straw Hat Theatre #5: Monster Time
episode.japanese: Mugiwara Gekijō Sono Go Monster Time
episode.transliteration: 麦わら劇場その5「Monster Time」
episode.summary: In the town of Monsuton (モンストン), the gorgon Rojūsa (ロジューサ) has lost her favorite earrings. To cheer her up, her friends, the dragon Lugyao (ルギヤオ), the centaur Usoppaka (ウソッパカ), the kraken Chopāken (チョパーケン), the mermaid Sutoronamī (ストロナミー), the kappa Sanzarā (サンザラー), and the minotaur Zoromiruku (ゾロミルク), try to find her something better.[30]

episode.title: I'm Not Gonna Hand Over the Blueprints! Franky's Decision!
episode.english: I'm Not Gonna Hand Over the Blueprints! Franky's Decision!
episode.japanese: Sekkeizu wa Watasanai! Furankī no Ketsudan
episode.transliteration: 設計図は渡さない! フランキーの決断
episode.summary: Though initially intimidated when the Straw Hat Pirates declare war on the World Government, Spandam regains his composure when the bridge leading to the Tower of Law is disabled midway. CP9 are then about to take their leave for the Gates of Justice when Franky reveals the Pluton blueprints that he hid in his body. Franky proceeds to explain that he and the previous shipwrights only kept the blueprints in case a counter is needed against another ancient weapon revived by the World Government through Robin. But seeing Robin not to be the monster the rumors made her out to be, Franky decides to gamble the fate of the world on the Straw Hats' resolve to save their friend and burns the blueprints. But then emotionally touched to find his gang are also on Enies Lobby to save him, a distracted Franky finds himself shoved off the balcony by a furious Spandam. At that time, after contacting the Straw Hats via transponder snail phone to jump aboard, Kokoro runs Rocketman up the half-lowered drawbridge. The sea train hits Franky while jumping through the waterfall and on a crash course into the Tower of Law.

episode.title: Obtain the 5 Keys! The Straw Hat Pirates vs. CP9!
episode.english: Obtain the 5 Keys! The Straw Hat Pirates vs. CP9!
episode.japanese: Itsutsu no Kage o Ubae! Mugiwara Ichimi Tai CP9
episode.transliteration: 5つの鍵を奪え! 麦わら一味対CP9
episode.summary: After emerging from the rubble caused by Rocket Man crashing into the Tower of Law, the Straw Hats and Franky are greeted by the blabbermouth CP9 agent Fukurou as he reveals that Spandam has given CP9 orders to execute the intruders. Also explaining that Spandam and Lucci are taking Robin to the Gates of Justice, Fukurou adds that he and four other CP9 members each possess a key that may unlock the sea stone handcuffs on Robin. As Luffy chases after Robin, the Straw Hats and Franky pursue the keys and each encounter a CP9 member.
