After getting away from the chateau, Bege returns Caesar's heart to him and ends his alliance with the Straw Hats. As Bege makes his getaway with his crew, the Straw Hats head back to the Thousand Sunny while Brook and Chopper go retrieve the Shark Submerge III. The Big Mom Pirates organize to pursue their enemies, but Big Mom suffers a craving for wedding cake and goes on a rampage.

episode.title: The Spear of Elbaph! Onslaught! The Flying Big Mom!
episode.english: The Spear of Elbaph! Onslaught! The Flying Big Mom!
episode.japanese: Erubafu no Yari – Kyōshū! Sora Kakeru Biggu Mamu
episode.transliteration: 巨人の槍 強襲! 空翔るビッグ·マム
episode.summary: As a crazed Big Mom is causing destruction at Sweet City, Perospero tells her that the Straw Hats had a spare wedding cake in an attempt to stop her from damaging the city any further. After Big Mom leaves to pursue the Straw Hats, Pudding explains her plan to satisfy Big Mom's craving. Meanwhile at the Germa Kingdom, the Vinsmoke Family fights and defeats Nusstorte and his squad. As they run towards the Seducing Woods, the Straw Hats encounter King Baum and use him to carry them back to the Thousand Sunny. However, they soon find a squad of pursuers and Big Mom right behind them.

episode.title: Pudding's Determination! Ablaze! The Seducing Woods!
episode.english: Pudding's Determination! Ablaze! The Seducing Woods!
episode.japanese: Purin no Ketsui – Katsu Dai Enjō(Tai en-jō!) Yūwaku(Yūwaku) no Mori
episode.transliteration: プリンの決意 活大炎上(たいえんじょう! 誘惑(ゆうわく)の森
episode.summary: As Big Mom unleashes devastating attacks, the Sanji Retrieval Team urges King Baum to keep going as they head into the Seducing Woods. Nami manages to win Zeus to her side by feeding it thunderclouds, but Prometheus sets King Baum ablaze and the Big Mom Pirates lie in wait to ambush their enemies from every possible location. Meanwhile, Pudding catches up to Bege elsewhere and asks Chiffon for help, saying that she wants to stop Big Mom to save Sanji and his friends.

episode.title: A Lightning Counterattack! Nami and Zeus the Thundercloud!
episode.english: A Lightning Counterattack! Nami and Zeus the Thundercloud!
episode.japanese: Hangeki no Kaminari – Nami to Raiun Zeusu
episode.transliteration: 反撃の雷(かみなり) ナミと雷雲(らいうん)ゼウス
episode.summary: Chopper and Brook reach the Shark Submerge and travel back to the Thousand Sunny. At the Seducing Woods, Luffy's group continue fleeing from Big Mom on foot. As the tree homies shift the landscape, the Straw Hats clash with a pursuit squad and defeat them. With Big Mom closing in on them, Nami uses Zeus to bring a huge thunderbolt down on her.

episode.title: A Coincidental Reunion! Sanji and the Lovestruck Evil Pudding!
episode.english: A Coincidental Reunion! Sanji and the Lovestruck Evil Pudding!
episode.japanese: Gūzen (gūzen) no Saikai – Sanji to Koisuru Waru Purin
episode.transliteration: 偶然(ぐうぜん)の再会 サンジと恋する悪プリン
episode.summary: Chopper and Brook return to the Sunny to find the ship occupied by the Big Mom Pirates. To take back the ship, the two begin battling the enemy crew. Chiffon agrees to go with Pudding to help save the Straw Hats and part ways with Bege. Big Mom withstood Nami's attack and continues her pursuit. Pudding and Chiffon arrive at the Seducing Woods to recruit Sanji and he goes with them.

episode.title: Save the Sunny! Fighting Bravely! Chopper and Brook!
episode.english: Save the Sunny! Fighting Bravely! Chopper and Brook!
episode.japanese: Sanī o Mamore Funsen Choppā ando Burukku
episode.transliteration: サニーを守れ 奮戦！チョッパー&ブルック
episode.summary: After Sanji successfully got on Rabiyan, Pudding helps Luffy's group by preventing the tree homies from hindering them any longer. Sanji, Pudding, and Chiffon then leave Whole Cake Island and head for Cacao Island. Chopper and Brook continue fighting the Big Mom Pirates on the Thousand Sunny. Perospero steps in and subdues them, trapping them in candy. Shortly afterwards, Luffy's group reaches the coast.

episode.title: Before the Dawn! Pedro, the Captain of the Guardians!
episode.english: Before the Dawn! Pedro, the Captain of the Guardians!
episode.japanese: Yoake Mae Gādianzu Danchō Pedoro
episode.transliteration: 夜明け前 侠客団 (ガーディアンズ) 団長ペドロ
episode.summary: Luffy's group made it back to the Thousand Sunny. As Luffy battles Katakuri, the rest prepares the ship for escape. Perospero returns to the shore and traps the Sunny in candy, prompting Pedro to fight him. After Pedro is overpowered, he detonates sticks of dynamite strapped on him in hopes of taking down Perospero in a suicidal explosion.

episode.title: I'll Be Back! Luffy, Deadly Departure!
episode.english: I'll Be Back! Luffy, Deadly Departure!
episode.japanese: Kanarazu Modoru – Rufi Inochigake no Shukkō
episode.transliteration: 必ず戻る ルフィ命がけの出航！
episode.summary: Thanks to Pedro's explosion, Chopper, Brook, and the Thousand Sunny are freed from the candy entrapment. Angered at Pedro's self-sacrifice, Carrot attacks Katakuri only to be overpowered. Luffy clashes with the Sweet Commander and manages to grab him. As Big Mom and the Tarteships attack the Sunny, the Straw Hats manage to get away with Coup de Burst. Meanwhile, Luffy dragged Katakuri into the Mirro-World to battle him.

episode.title: The Man with a Bounty of Billion! The Strongest Sweet General, Katakuri!
episode.english: The Man with a Bounty of Billion! The Strongest Sweet General, Katakuri!
episode.japanese: Jyuuoku no Otoko Saikyou no San Shousei Katakuri
episode.transliteration: 十億の男 最強スイート将星カタクリ
episode.summary: In the Mirro-World, Luffy begins a fierce clash with Katakuri. After getting away from Whole Cake Island, the group on the Thousand Sunny mourns Pedro's self-sacrifice until Jinbe tells them to remain focused on escaping Totto Land. They are soon pursued by Big Mom and a small fleet. Meanwhile, Sanji, Pudding, and Chiffon approach Cacao Island.

episode.title: A Hard Battle Starts! Luffy vs. Katakuri!
episode.english: A Hard Battle Starts! Luffy vs. Katakuri!
episode.japanese: Gekitō Kaimaku Rufi tai Katakuri
episode.transliteration: 戦いの開始 ルフィVSカタクリ
episode.summary: Sanji, Pudding, and Chiffon arrive at Cacao Island and begin making a new wedding cake with the assistance of the WCI 31. Back in the Mirro-World, Katakuri continues to have the advantage over Luffy. With Brûlée awake again, the Big Mom Pirates prepare to attack the Thousand Sunny.

episode.title: The Green Room! An Invincible Helmsman, Jimbei!
episode.english: The Green Room! An Invincible Helmsman, Jimbei!
episode.japanese: Gurīn Rūmu Muteki no Sōdashu Jinbē
episode.transliteration: 波の部屋 無双操舵手ジンベエ
episode.summary: Mascarpone and Joscarpone aim and shoot fire arrows through a mirrors to the Sunny from the Mirro-World. Luffy orders his crewmates on the Sunny to break all the mirrors to prevent further assault as he is overwhelmed by Katakuri. Meanwhile, Luffy´s crew face a huge wave with Big Mom and Perospero on it.

episode.title: The Threat of the Mole! Luffy's Silent Fight!
episode.english: The Threat of the Mole! Luffy's Silent Fight!
episode.japanese: Mogura no Kyōi – Rufi Chinmoku no Tatakai
episode.transliteration: 土電(もぐら)の脅威(きょうい) ルフィ沈黙(ちんもく)の咄い
episode.summary: The Sunny crew shatters all of the mirrors on the ship, and they make plans with Luffy to reunite at Cacao Island at 1:00 AM. However, Brûlée overhears this conversation and discovers that the other Straw Hats are alive. She reports this to Perospero, but to his horror, Big Mom decides to go to Nuts Island instead. Meanwhile, the Big Mom Pirates have invaded the Germa Kingdom. Back in the Mirro-World, Katakuri brings out his trident Mogura to attack Luffy. Luffy struggles to avoid its devastating attacks, and Katakuri continues to have the advantage as Luffy cannot hit him.

episode.title: The End of the Deadly Battle?! Katakuri's Awakening in Anger!
episode.english: The End of the Deadly Battle?! Katakuri's Awakening in Anger!
episode.japanese: Shitō Kecchaku!? Katakuri Ikari no Kakusei
episode.transliteration: 死闘(しとう)決着!? カタクリ怒りの覚醒(かくせい)
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Yusuke SuzukiStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: On Whole Cake Island, Count Niwatori cautions Mont-d'Or about the potential of the Straw Hats. Capone Bege and the Fire Tank Pirates escape from Charlotte Custard's pursuit, and although they are pushed at first, Germa 66 decisively beats the forces sent to invade the Germa Kingdom. In the Mirro-World, despite not being able to touch him, Luffy is able to tire Katakuri by dodging his strikes. Luffy attempts to activate Gear Fourth, but Katakuri uses his awakened abilities to stop him. The Sweet Commander decides to end the battle because he is late for his merienda, and buries Luffy in a deep pile of mochi.

episode.title: The Forbidden Secret! Katakuri's Merienda!
episode.english: The Forbidden Secret! Katakuri's Merienda!
episode.japanese: Kindan no Himitsu Katakuri no Merienda
episode.transliteration: 禁断の秘密 カタクリのおやつの時間 (メリエンダ)
episode.summary: After burying Luffy under a mountain of mochi, Katakuri believes he won and calls his chefs, who bring snacks for him to feast on. Katakuri makes a shrine where he can eat in private. Luffy breaks out of the mochi he was buried under and shattered the shrine, exposing Katakuri's face. Katakuri then executes the chefs before resuming his attempts to kill Luffy. After managing to land a hit on Katakuri, Luffy says that he figures out how to beat him and activates Gear Fourth.

episode.title: Luffy Fights Back! The Invincible Katakuri's Weak Point!
episode.english: Luffy Fights Back! The Invincible Katakuri's Weak Point!
episode.japanese: Rufi Hangeki – Muteki Katakuri no Jakuten
episode.transliteration: ルフィ反撃 無敵カタクリの弱点
episode.summary: After activating Gear Fourth, Luffy manages to deal some damage to Katakuri. However, Luffy loses the upper hand when Katakuri regains his composure. Back at Cacao Island, Pound arrives at the Sweets Factory, wanting to see Chiffon, but when Oven arrives, he attacks Pound. Inside the factory, Brûlée speaks to Pudding through a Transponder Snail and informs her of the Straw Hats' plan to arrive at Cacao Island.

episode.title: Another Crisis! Gear Four vs. Unstoppable Donuts!
episode.english: Another Crisis! Gear Four vs. Unstoppable Donuts!
episode.japanese: Pinchi Futatabi! Gia Fōsu vs Musō Dōnatsu
episode.transliteration: 危機再び！ギア4（フォース）vs 無双（むそう）ドーナツ
episode.summary: With Luffy losing the advantage, Katakuri goes back on the offensive. Luffy retreats when he realizes his Gear Fourth is about to wear off. After his Gear Fourth wears off, Luffy flees and comes across Brûlée, whom he uses to escape the Mirro-World. They arrive at Nuts Island, where Big Mom is going on a rampage. Thanks to Praline, the Big Mom Pirates lose the Territorial Sea Slugs and the means to track their enemies. Nevertheless, the Big Mom Pirates assemble their fleet to hunt their enemies down. At Cacao Island, Sanji completes his special ingredient, Pudding finishes with the chocolate, and Chiffon finishes baking the cake. The chefs then plan to complete the cake while on the way to the Thousand Sunny.

episode.title: The Rebellious Daughter, Chiffon! Sanji's Big Plan for Transporting the Cake!
episode.english: The Rebellious Daughter, Chiffon! Sanji's Big Plan for Transporting the Cake!
episode.japanese: Hangyaku no Shifon – Sanji no Kēki Yusō Dai-Sakusen
episode.transliteration: 反逆の娘（シフォン） サンジのケーキ輸送大作戦
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Yusuke SuzukiStoryboarded by : Masahiro Hosoda
episode.summary: The chefs at Cacao Island leave the Sweets Factory with the unfinished cake with plans to complete it while out at sea. However, they were approached by Oven, who intends to punish Chiffon. Meanwhile, the Fire Tank Pirates are on their way to the island. Back at Nuts Island, Luffy tries to find a mirror while fleeing from Big Mom.

episode.title: A Man's Way of Life! Bege and Luffy's Determination as Captains!
episode.english: A Man's Way of Life! Bege and Luffy's Determination as Captains!
episode.japanese: Otoko no Ikizama – Bejji to Rufi Senchō no Ketsui
episode.transliteration: 男の生き様 ベッジとルフィ船長の決意
episode.summary: Oven tells Bege to stand down as he holds Chiffon hostage on Cacao Island, but Bege responds by shooting him. He reveals that the Nostra Castello can move on land as well, and takes the Big Mom Pirates by storm as the ship rumbles down the island toward Chiffon's group. Sanji then lifts up the cart carrying the cake, intending to place it on the ship. Meanwhile, the Sunny is pursued by the Big Mom Pirates, and Carrot asks if there is a full moon tonight. Luffy manages to escape from Nuts Island and Big Mom and after hopping to various islands through the Mirro-World, he thinks about how to beat Katakuri. Remembering his teaching that Haki grows stronger when one faces strong opponents, he decides to improve his own Haki by fighting Katakuri.

episode.title: The Cake Sank?! Sanji and Bege's Getaway Battle!
episode.english: The Cake Sank?! Sanji and Bege's Getaway Battle!
episode.japanese: Kēki Chinbotsu!? Sanji to Bejji Tōbō-sen
episode.transliteration: ケーキ沈没！？サンジ＆ベッジ逃亡戦
episode.summary: Sanji gets the wedding cake on the Nostra Castello, which runs over Oven as the Fire Tank Pirates and Sanji's group escape out to sea. However, Oven attacks the ship by boiling the ocean, but Pound intervenes and attacks him. Pound sees Chiffon and Pez, and he is glad to see his daughter and grandson being happy. He congratulates Chiffon on her marriage right as Oven takes him out with a naginata. Meanwhile, Luffy returns to the Mirro-World after regaining his Haki and resumes his fight with Katakuri. Out at sea, the Sunny crew becomes surrounded by Big Mom and her fleet.

episode.title: Sulong! Carrot's Big Mystic Transformation!
episode.english: Sulong! Carrot's Big Mystic Transformation!
episode.japanese: Suron – Kyarotto Shinpi no Dai Henshin
episode.transliteration: 月の獅子 (スーロン) キャロット神秘の大変身
episode.summary: Luffy and Katakuri resume their battle in the Mirro-World, with Luffy intending to use the battle to strengthen his Haki and defeat Katakuri. Meanwhile, the Sunny crew is surrounded by the Big Mom Pirates' fleet, and is headed right for Daifuku's fleet. However, Carrot offers to help the crew by using the full moon to activate Sulong, increasing her battle prowess and allowing her to overwhelm Daifuku and his crew.

episode.title: Break Through! The Straw Hat's Mighty Sea Battle!
episode.english: Break Through! The Straw Hat's Mighty Sea Battle!
episode.japanese: Toppa Seyo – Mugiwara no Ichimi Dai Kaisen!
episode.transliteration: 突破せよ 麦わらの一味大海戦！
episode.summary: Luffy continues focusing during his fight with Katakuri in order to improve his Haki. Meanwhile, Perospero is horrified to find out that the wedding cake is on Bege's ship, but on that ship, Sanji forbids Bege from poisoning the cake. Carrot successfully decimates Daifuku's fleet, clearing the way for the Sunny crew to outpace the Big Mom Pirates' fleet, and Brook brings her back to the Sunny. However, Big Mom then summons Zeus and Prometheus to her side as, with them and Napoleon, she leaps onto the Sunny to look for the cake.

episode.title: Finally, The Clash! The Emperor of the Sea vs. the Straw Hats!
episode.english: Finally, The Clash! The Emperor of the Sea vs. the Straw Hats!
episode.japanese: Tsuini Gekitotsu – Yonkō VS Mugiwara no Ichimi
episode.transliteration: 遂に激突 四皇VS麦わらの一味
episode.summary: As Katakuri continues his onslaught, Luffy struggles to raise the level of his Kenbunshoku Haki. After Big Mom boards the Thousand Sunny, the situation for the Straw Hats becomes more dire until Jinbe drives her off the ship. Big Mom continues with her attack and the Straw Hats work together to defend the ship.

episode.title: Dark King's Direct Precepts! The Battle Against Katakuri Turns Around!
episode.english: Dark King's Direct Precepts! The Battle Against Katakuri Turns Around!
episode.japanese: Meiō Jikiden – Katakuri-sen Dai Gyakuten Kaishi
episode.transliteration: 冥王直伝 カタクリ戦大逆転開始
episode.summary: Luffy and Katakuri's clash continues. Flampe watches the battle and plans to win Katakuri's favor. Remembering Rayleigh's training, Luffy is beginning to see into the future. Back at the Totto Land sea, the Straw Hats manage to capture Zeus, but Big Mom continues pursuing the Thousand Sunny by riding on Prometheus.

episode.title: Finally He Returns! Sanji, the Man Who'll Stop the Emperor of the Sea!
episode.english: Finally He Returns! Sanji, the Man Who'll Stop the Emperor of the Sea!
episode.japanese: Tsuini Kikan – Yonkō o Tomeru Otoko Sanji
episode.transliteration: 遂に帰還 四皇を止める男サンジ
episode.summary: Luffy continues to fight with Katakuri. Despite his injuries, he is determined to defeat his enemy and return to the Thousand Sunny. Back at the Sunny, the Straw Hat Pirates still flee from Big Mom, who uses her soul to enlarge Prometheus. Nami then sees the Nostra Castello with the wedding cake on board. Big Mom, lured by the scent, starts to pursue Capone Bege. Sanji returns to the Sunny and the Straw Hats continue their course for Cacao Island.

episode.title: Lurking in the Darkness! An Assassin Targeting Luffy!
episode.english: Lurking in the Darkness! An Assassin Targeting Luffy!
episode.japanese: Yami ni Hisomu – Rufi o Osou Ansatsusha!
episode.transliteration: 闇に潜む ルフィを襲う暗殺者！
episode.summary: With Big Mom following the Fire Tank Pirates, the group on the Thousand Sunny continues on to Cacao Island, but Sanji informs them that the Big Mom Pirates are aware of their plan to meet Luffy there. At Cacao Island, a large force of the Big Mom Pirates gathers and Oven prepares a trap for Luffy. Inside the Mirro-World, Flampe quietly interferes with Luffy's fight with Katakuri, causing Luffy to suffer a severe injury.

episode.title: One Man's Determination! Katakuri's Deadly Big Fight!
episode.english: One Man's Determination! Katakuri's Deadly Big Fight!
episode.japanese: Otoko no Kakugo – Katakuri Inochigake Ōshōbu
episode.transliteration: 男の覚悟 カタクリ命がけ大勝負
episode.summary: After discovering Flampe's presence in the Mirro-World, Katakuri finds her and confronts her for intruding in his fight. He stabs himself to make up for the injury she helped him deal to Luffy, and confronts Luffy again. The two of them use Haoshoku Haki to knock out Flampe's group before resuming their fight as equals. Meanwhile, Chiffon tells Bege to bring the cake to Funwari Island to keep Big Mom far enough away from the Straw Hats. As Sanji and Pudding head off for Cacao Island, the rest of the Sunny crew finds themselves under attack from Smoothie.

episode.title: Wake Up! The Color of Observation Able to Top The Strongest!
episode.english: Wake Up! The Color of Observation Able to Top The Strongest!
episode.japanese: Mezamero – Saikyō o Koeru Kenbun-shoku
episode.transliteration: 目覚めろ 最強を越える見聞色
episode.summary: Sanji and Pudding prepare to infiltrate Cacao Island, which Oven has stationed with thousands of his siblings and crewmates. In the Mirro-World, Luffy's Kenbunshoku Haki has developed to the point where he is able to foresee Katakuri's attacks and trade blows with him. With an hour to go before his planned rendezvous with the crew, Luffy activates a form of Gear Fourth known as Snakeman.

episode.title: A Fist of Divine Speed! Another Gear Four Application Activated!
episode.english: A Fist of Divine Speed! Another Gear Four Application Activated!
episode.japanese: Shinsoku no Ken – Aratanaru Gia Fōsu Hatsudō!
episode.transliteration: 神速の拳 新たなるギア4発動！
episode.summary: Sanji and Pudding make it to Cacao Island, and successfully sneak into Chocolat Town without anyone noticing. Meanwhile, Luffy activates Gear Fourth: Snakeman, a form that increases the speed of his punches and allows him to rapidly change their direction. Katakuri responds with powerful attacks of his own, and the two engage in a massive duel until finally hitting each other with finishing blows.

episode.title: Finally, It's Over! The Climax of the Intense Fight against Katakuri!
episode.english: Finally, It's Over! The Climax of the Intense Fight against Katakuri!
episode.japanese: Tsuini Shūketsu – Sōzetsu Katakuri-sen no Yukue
episode.transliteration: 遂に終結 壮絶カタクリ戦の行方
episode.summary: With 1:00 AM drawing closer, Sanji and Pudding reminisce about their experiences together as Sanji prepares to depart. The Straw Hats get close to Cacao Island, while the Fire Tank Pirates and the wedding cake approach Funwari Island with Big Mom on their tail. In the Mirro-World, Luffy emerges victorious from his battle with Katakuri. He finds that Brûlée has escaped, but Pekoms then shows up with a recaptured Brûlée, wanting to help Luffy escape to honor Pedro's memory.

episode.title: A Desperate Situation! The Iron-tight Entrapment of Luffy!
episode.english: A Desperate Situation! The Iron-tight Entrapment of Luffy!
episode.japanese: Zettai Zetsumei – Teppeki no Rufi Hōimō!
episode.transliteration: 絶体絶命 鉄壁のルフィ包囲網!
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Yoshihiro UedaStoryboarded by : Takahiro Imamura
episode.summary: The Sunny crew reaches Cacao Island, and in the Mirro-World, Pekoms tells Luffy he will activate his Sulong form to distract Oven's army. Upon reaching Cacao Island, Pekoms' distraction allows Luffy to run off, and Sanji joins his captain. Oven and his army eventually stop Pekoms' rampage, and Sanji and Luffy are surrounded. However, the Germa Kingdom then attacks Cacao Island, and Ichiji, Niji, Yonji, and Reiju arrive to help their brother and his captain.

episode.title: Pulling Back from the Brink! The Formidable Reinforcements – Germa!
episode.english: Pulling Back from the Brink! The Formidable Reinforcements – Germa!
episode.japanese: Kishi Kaisei – Saikyō no Engun Jeruma!
episode.transliteration: 起死回生 最強の援軍ジェルマ!
episode.summary: The Vinsmoke Family gets to work fighting against Oven's army on Cacao Island and seeing Sanji and Luffy off, and Brûlée reveals to her crewmates that Luffy defeated Katakuri. Despite the army's relentless effort to avenge Katakuri, Sanji and Luffy ultimately make it off the island and fly toward the waiting Sunny.

episode.title: The Last Hope! The Sun Pirates Emerge!
episode.english: The Last Hope! The Sun Pirates Emerge!
episode.japanese: Saigo no Toride – Taiyō no Kaizoku-dan Arawaru
episode.transliteration: 最後の砦 タイヨウの海賊団現る
episode.summary: The Fire Tank Pirates drop the wedding cake off on Funwari Island, and the Big Mom Pirates anxiously await the results of Big Mom eating it. Meanwhile, Sanji and Luffy return to the Thousand Sunny. Judge has the Germa Kingdom fleet take on the pursuing Big Mom Pirates' fleet, but the Straw Hats are confronted by an even more massive fleet in front of them. However, the Sun Pirates arrive to back up their former captain Jinbe until he and the Straw Hats make it out of Totto Land.

episode.title: A Captivating Flavor! Sanji's Cake of Happiness!
episode.english: A Captivating Flavor! Sanji's Cake of Happiness!
episode.japanese: Miwaku no Aji – Shiawase no Sanji no Kēki
episode.transliteration: 魅惑の味 幸せのサンジのケーキ
episode.summary: Big Mom eats Sanji's wedding cake, and is overwhelmed with sheer happiness as she enjoys it. The Big Mom Pirates and Totto Land citizens rejoice at the end of her craving rampage, but the battle at Cacao Island still rages. The Sun Pirates clear a path for the Straw Hats to escape, but Oven boils the sea and forces them to retreat. The Big Mom Pirates gain ground against Germa 66 on land, and at sea, the Queen Mama Chanter confronts the Straw Hats and attacks, leaving flaming wreckage in the Thousand Sunny's wake.

episode.title: The Man of Humanity and Justice! Jimbei, a Desperate Massive Ocean Current
episode.english: The Man of Humanity and Justice! Jimbei, a Desperate Massive Ocean Current
episode.japanese: Jingi no Otoko – Jinbē Kesshi no Daikairyū
episode.transliteration: 仁義の漢 ジンベエ決死の大海流
episode.summary: The Straw Hats had managed to be saved from death when Wadatsumi switched the Thousand Sunny with the Sun Pirates' ship. The Big Mom Pirates figure out what happened and quickly expose the Sunny again, but the Sun Pirates rise back up to confront them. The crew is soon overwhelmed, and Luffy gives Jinbe permission to go back and help his former crewmates, telling him to meet them at Wano Country. Jinbe goes to the Sun Pirates, and they create a current enabling the Straw Hats to escape from the Big Mom Pirates' fleet and leave Totto Land.

episode.title: The Parting Time! Pudding's Last Wish!
episode.english: The Parting Time! Pudding's Last Wish!
episode.japanese: Sekibetsu no Toki – Purin Saigo no “Onegai„
episode.transliteration: 惜別の時 プリン最後の“お願い„
episode.summary: Sanji finds out about Pedro's death as the Straw Hats successfully sail out of Totto Land, and as she overhears the news on Cacao Island, Pudding weeps while recalling her memories with Sanji. In the Mirro-World, Brûlée tends to Katakuri's wounds. She reveals that she knows he had laid on his back before, and built up his invulnerable image to protect his siblings after she was attacked as a child. Jimbei, the Sun Pirates, and Germa 66 prepare to retreat from Cacao Island, but they are stopped by the arrival of Big Mom. Meanwhile, Sanji gets back to work cooking food for his crew, and as he does this, his mentor Zeff serves some rowdy pirates at Baratie.

episode.title: The World in Shock! The Fifth Emperor of the Sea Arrives!
episode.english: The World in Shock! The Fifth Emperor of the Sea Arrives!
episode.japanese: Sekai Kyōgaku – Dai Go no Umi no Kōtei Arawaru!
episode.transliteration: 世界驚愕 第五の海の皇帝現る！
episode.summary: At Foosha Village and an unnamed island in the New World, Makino and Shanks each remember Luffy's experiences with Shanks and the Red Hair Pirates 12 years ago as they read the newspaper story about Luffy's incursion into Totto Land. In the Ryugu Kingdom, Neptune and his family read the news as they prepare to head to the Reverie and decide to place Fish-Man Island under Luffy's protection. On the Thousand Sunny, Luffy discovers a Raid Suit canister secretly given to him and Sanji by Niji, but Sanji refuses to use it. Carrot then shows the crew the newspaper, where they find out that Luffy and Sanji's bounties have increased and that Luffy is now considered the Fifth Emperor of the Sea.

episode.title: To the Reverie! The Straw Hats' Sworn Allies Come Together!
episode.english: To the Reverie! The Straw Hats' Sworn Allies Come Together!
episode.japanese: Reverī e Shūketsu! Mugiwara Meiyū-tachi
episode.transliteration: 世界会議 (レヴェリー) へ 集結！麦わら盟友達
episode.summary: As the royals from Dressrosa and Prodence Kingdom sail to Mariejois for the Reverie, they are attacked by pirates, but are saved by Koby and Helmeppo. Koby becomes flustered when Rebecca shows him the newspaper article about Luffy and remembers his life-altering encounter with the Straw Hat. The Four Emperors find out that Luffy has also been declared an Emperor, and Shanks reacts positively while the other three react negatively. As the Straw Hats sail to Wano Country, they find out that Luffy's bounty has increased to 1.5 billion berries.

episode.title: Sabo Goes into Action! All the Captains of the Revolutionary Army Appear!
episode.english: Sabo Goes into Action! All the Captains of the Revolutionary Army Appear!
episode.japanese: Sabo Ugoku – Kakumei Gunzen Taichō Tōjō
episode.transliteration: サボ動く 革命軍全隊長登場!
episode.summary: While the royalty is away for the Reverie, the Peachbeard Pirates raid the Lulucia Kingdom. However, the four commanders of the Revolutionary Army—Morley, Belo Betty, Lindbergh, and Karasu—arrive. Betty uses her ability to encourage the townspeople to fight back, and with the assistance of the other three commanders, they defeat Peachbeard and his crew. Meanwhile, Sabo, Monkey D. Dragon, and Koala reunite with Ivankov and Inazuma on Peachy Island as they wait for the commanders to arrive. Once they arrive, they will discuss their plan to officially declare war on the World Nobles during the Reverie.

episode.title: Going into Action! The Implacable New Admiral of the Fleet – Sakazuki!
episode.english: Going into Action! The Implacable New Admiral of the Fleet – Sakazuki!
episode.japanese: Ugokidasu – Shūnen no Shin Gensui Sakazuki
episode.transliteration: 動き出す 執念の新元帥サカズキ
episode.summary: At New Marineford, Sakazuki discovers that Fujitora has gone to Mariejois. He then orders for Ryokugyu to send him away. Meanwhile, Sengoku recalls the incidents at Impel Down and Marineford two years ago.

episode.title: The War of the Best! The Inherited Will of the King of the Pirates!
episode.english: The War of the Best! The Inherited Will of the King of the Pirates!
episode.japanese: Chōjō Sensō – Tsuga Reta Kaizoku-ō no Ishi
episode.transliteration: 頂上戦争 継がれた海賊王の意思
episode.summary: The nobles, including Shirahoshi from the Ryugu Kingdom, continue to gather for the Reverie. Admiral Fujitora talks with Admiral Ryokugyu.

episode.title: One Step Forward for Her Dream! Shirahoshi Goes Out in the Sun!
episode.english: One Step Forward for Her Dream! Shirahoshi Goes Out in the Sun!
episode.japanese: Yume no Ippo – Shirahoshi Taiyō no Moto e!
episode.transliteration: 夢の一歩 しらほし太陽の下へ!
episode.summary: King Stelly of the Goa Kingdom meets Garp and his envoy from Fish-Man Island. Shirahoshi gets her first look at the world on the surface.

episode.title: I Miss Him! Vivi and Rebecca's Sentiments!
episode.english: I Miss Him! Vivi and Rebecca's Sentiments!
episode.japanese: Aitai – Bibi to Rebekka no Omoi
episode.transliteration: 会いたい ビビとレベッカの想い
episode.summary: The Neptune Family and some other royals reach the top of the Red Line and entered Mariejois. They then arrive at Pangaea Castle and meet with all the participants of the Reverie. Shirahoshi meets Rebecca and Nefertari Vivi after overhearing them talking about Luffy.

episode.title: In the Dark Recesses of the Holyland! A Mysterious Giant Straw Hat!
episode.english: In the Dark Recesses of the Holyland! A Mysterious Giant Straw Hat!
episode.japanese: Seichi no Yami – Nazo no Kyodaina Mugiwara-bōshi
episode.transliteration: 聖地の闇 謎の巨大な麦わら帽子
episode.summary: Vivi, Rebecca, and Shirahoshi continue with their conversation about Luffy. Sai gets reacquainted with Rebecca and Leo. Vivi has an unpleasant encounter with Wapol before having a pleasant reunion with Dalton and Kureha. Meanwhile, a mysterious figure enters a chamber containing a large straw hat.

episode.title: The Holyland in Tumult! The Targeted Princess Shirahoshi!
episode.english: The Holyland in Tumult! The Targeted Princess Shirahoshi!
episode.japanese: Seichi Sōzen – Nerawareta Shirahoshi-hime!
episode.transliteration: 聖地騒然 狙われたしらほし姫！
episode.summary: After seeing the Empty Throne, Stelly desires to sit on it. Meanwhile, Charlos attempts to take Shirahoshi by force with CP-0 protecting him. Neptune prepares to attack Charlos until Donquixote Mjosgard intervenes and knocks out Charlos.

episode.title: An Explosive Situation! Two Emperors of the Sea Going After Luffy!
episode.english: An Explosive Situation! Two Emperors of the Sea Going After Luffy!
episode.japanese: Isshoku Soku Hatsu – Rufi Nerau Futari no Yonkou
episode.transliteration: ルフィを狙う二人の四皇
episode.summary: Big Mom contacts Kaido, informing him that she will be going to Wano Country to take Luffy's head. Kaido objects, having his own grudge against Luffy. Back at the Red Port, Garp has a conversation with Gion, Hina, and Tokikake.

episode.title: Sabo Enraged! The Tragedy of the Revolutionary Army Officer Kuma!
episode.english: Sabo Enraged! The Tragedy of the Revolutionary Army Officer Kuma!
episode.japanese: Sabo Ikaru – Kakumei-gun Kanbu Kuma no Higeki
episode.transliteration: サボ怒る 革命軍幹部くまの悲劇
episode.summary: After Charlos was taken away, Mjosgard promises to protect Shirahoshi during the Reverie. Meanwhile, Sabo sneaks around Mariejois before going to the Domain of the Gods. Jewelry Bonney, who was disguised as the queen of the Sorbet Kingdom, sneaks into the Domain of the Gods when the injured Charlos is brought back there. When meeting his son, Rosward introduces his new slave, Bartholomew Kuma. While hiding underground, Sabo and his comrades plan to free Kuma.

episode.title: Finally, It Starts! The Conspiracy-filled Reverie!
episode.english: Finally, It Starts! The Conspiracy-filled Reverie!
episode.japanese: Tsui ni Kaimaku – Inbō Uzumaku Reverī
episode.transliteration: 遂に開幕 陰謀渦巻く世界会議 (レヴェリー)
episode.summary: As Rosward and Charlos are returning to their home, Sabo and his comrades hold a strategy meeting. Inside Pangaea Castle, the king and queens gather in the conference room to begin the Reverie. Meanwhile, the Five Elders have a secret meeting with the mysterious individual known as Im.

episode.title: Marco! The Keeper of Whitebeard's Last Memento!
episode.english: Marco! The Keeper of Whitebeard's Last Memento!
episode.japanese: Maruko! Shirohige no Katami no Shugosha
episode.transliteration: マルコ！白ひげの形見の守護者
episode.summary: Cat Viper and the Guardians reach Whitebeard's home island. Cat Viper finds Marco in a hidden village where he works as a doctor. During the meeting, Marco tells Cat Viper about Whitebeard's childhood and the reason he cannot leave the island.

episode.title: Climbing Up a Waterfall! A Great Journey Through the Land of Wano's Sea Zone!
episode.english: Climbing Up a Waterfall! A Great Journey Through the Land of Wano's Sea Zone!
episode.japanese: Takinobori! Wano Kuni no Kaiiki Dai-kōkai!
episode.transliteration: 滝登り! ワノ国の海域大航海!
episode.summary: After reading about the Reverie in the newspaper, Luffy's group finds themselves in the perilous sea surrounding Wano Country, which leads to the bottom of a waterfall. Luffy uses the giant carp swimming around them to pull the crew and ship up the waterfall, but they end up sailing into a whirlpool at the top, causing Luffy to be submerged.

episode.title: The Land of Wano! To the Samurai Country where Cherry Blossoms Flutter!
episode.english: The Land of Wano! To the Samurai Country where Cherry Blossoms Flutter!
episode.japanese: Wano Kuni! Sakuramau Samurai no Kuni e
episode.transliteration: ワノ国！桜舞うサムライの国へ
episode.summary: Zoro, Usopp, Franky, and Robin are incognito inside Wano Country. Zoro poses as a ronin, Usopp works as a merchant, Franky works as a carpenter, and Robin trains as a geisha. One night, Zoro is arrested for street murders. On the next day, he is sentenced to commit seppuku. Deducing that the magistrate is the culprit, Zoro attacks him and his men. Elsewhere, Luffy and the Thousand Sunny washed up on a beach.

episode.title: Otama Appears! Luffy vs. Kaido's Army!
episode.english: Otama Appears! Luffy vs. Kaido's Army!
episode.japanese: Otama Tōjō – Rufi tai Kaidō-gun!
episode.transliteration: お玉登場 ルフィVSカイドウ軍！
episode.summary: While fighting the magistrate's men, Zoro retrieves his swords and demolishes the magistrate's home. Afterwards, Zoro becomes a wanted man. Back at Kuri Beach, Komachiyo and Hihimaru are fighting near the Thousand Sunny. Two Beasts Pirates arrive with a captive girl and try to capture Luffy. He easily defeats them and frees the girl, who introduces herself as Tama. After Tama tames Hihimaru, Luffy gets acquainted with her.

episode.title: He'll Come! The Legend of Ace in the Land of Wano!
episode.english: He'll Come! The Legend of Ace in the Land of Wano!
episode.japanese: Kanarazu kuru – Wano Kuni no Ēsu Densetsu!
episode.transliteration: 必ず来る ワノ国のエース伝説！
episode.summary: After securing the Sunny, O-Tama takes Luffy to the house where she lives with her master, the swordsmith Tenguyama Hitetsu, and prepares him a meal to thank him. She walk away for a moment when her stomach started growling. Now, the capital is the only place that is not a desolate land, but the two still live there waiting for the return of the pirate, Ace. Luffy reveals to them that unfortunately they waited in vain since Ace died. Hitetsu explains that, wrecked on the island, Ace helped them four years earlier during a famine. Meanwhile, Basil Hawkins, now a subject of Kaido, goes to investigate the soldiers defeated by Luffy.

episode.title: Side Story! The World's Greatest Bounty Hunter, Cidre!
episode.english: Side Story! The World's Greatest Bounty Hunter, Cidre!
episode.japanese: Tokubetsu-hen! Saikyō no Shōkin Kari Shīdoru
episode.transliteration: 特別編！最強の賞金狩りシードル
episode.summary: The bounty hunter group Cidre Guild unsuccessfully attempt to capture the Straw Hats, leaving the Thousand Sunny without any cola fuel. Luffy visits a nearby island in search of cola and is directed to a factory run by the Cidre Guild but is attacked on the way by Cidre Guild members run by Ginger, leader of the guild's firearms squad. He is knocked into a stream and washes up in a pool where Hancock is bathing. Luffy and members of the Kuja Pirates defeat everyone except Ginger, who escapes using a CO2 attack which separates the Kujas from Luffy and Hancock. As Hancock asks Luffy to attend the Pirates Fest with her, they are attacked by Cidre, the Cidre Guild's commander.

episode.title: Side Story! Clash! Luffy vs. the King of Carbonation!
episode.english: Side Story! Clash! Luffy vs. the King of Carbonation!
episode.japanese: Tokubetsu-hen! Kessen! Rufi tai Tansan-ō
episode.transliteration: 特別編！決戦！ルフィVS炭酸王
episode.summary: Cidre equips his most powerful carbonated rig to battle Luffy, and as they fight Luffy discovers that the Cidre Guild soldiers are local men who Cidre coerced by taking their families hostage. Hancock defeats both Ginger and Guarana, turning them to stone. Luffy is able to defeat Cidre with an Elephant Gun, and Hancock revives the Guild's slaves she had turned to stone. Afterwards, Luffy finds an invitation to the Pirate Fest, and the freed Cidre Guild members gift the Straw Hats several barrels of cola. The Straw Hats sail to Delta Island for the Pirate Fest, with a planned race for Gold Roger's treasure in particular exciting Luffy. Other Supernovas make their way as, elsewhere, Buena Festa looks forward to a clash between Luffy and Douglas Bullet.

episode.title: Save Otama! Straw Hat, Bounding through the Wasteland!
episode.english: Save Otama! Straw Hat, Bounding through the Wasteland!
episode.japanese: O-Tama Sukue – Mugiwara Kōya o Kakeru!
episode.transliteration: お玉救え 麦わら荒野を駆ける！
episode.summary: Luffy and Komachiyo leave Hitetsu to take Tama to a doctor. At a wasteland, Zoro saves a woman from two Beasts Pirates. After arriving at the wasteland, Luffy reunites with Zoro. However, they are soon confronted by Hawkins.

episode.title: The Headliner! Hawkins the Magician Appears!
episode.english: The Headliner! Hawkins the Magician Appears!
episode.japanese: Shin'uchi! Majutsu-shi Hōkinsu Tōjō
episode.transliteration: 真打ち! 魔術師ホーキンス登場
episode.summary: Luffy and Zoro fight against Hawkins' men. Hawkins eventually steps in and displays his powers to them. Komachiyo grabs Luffy and Zoro and runs from the battle, but Hawkins pursues them.

episode.title: Defeat is Inevitable! The Strawman's Fierce Attack!
episode.english: Defeat is Inevitable! The Strawman's Fierce Attack!
episode.japanese: Haiboku Kakutei – Sutorō Man no Mōkō!
episode.transliteration: 敗北確定 ストローマンの猛攻！
episode.summary: As Komachiyo flees with Luffy, Zoro, and the ill Tama, Hawkins pursues them with the straw entity. Zoro defends against the straw entity's attacks and eventually defeats it. After the group escapes from Hawkins, Tsuru, who had been hiding inside Komachiyo's tail, reveals herself and invites the group to her teahouse in Okobore Town, where she can help Tama.

episode.title: The Greatest Day of My Life! Otama and Her Sweet Red-bean Soup!
episode.english: The Greatest Day of My Life! Otama and Her Sweet Red-bean Soup!
episode.japanese: Saikō no Hi – O-Tama Hajimete no O-Shiruko
episode.transliteration: 最高の日 お玉初めてのおしるこ
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Tasuku ShimayaStoryboarded by : Aya Komaki
episode.summary: Luffy, Tsuru and Kiku prepares the medicine for Tama. Kiku also helps to bandage up Zoro after he sustained injury during the battle with Hawkins. After Tama recovered, Tsuru treat her sweet red bean soup, where she declares that this is the best birthday ever. Luffy and Zoro learns from Tsuru how Kaido and Orochi pollute the environment and turn Wano into a wasteland and the people are starving. Batman attacked Tsuru, but is saved by Zoro, while Tama was abducted by Gazelleman in the confusion.

episode.title: Charging into the Enemy's Territory! Bakura Town – Where Officials Thrive!
episode.english: Charging into the Enemy's Territory! Bakura Town – Where Officials Thrive!
episode.japanese: Tekijin Totsunyū – Yakunin Habikoru Bakura-chō!
episode.transliteration: 敵陣突入 役人はびこる博羅町！
episode.summary: Luffy, Zoro and Kiku chased after Gazelleman, riding on Komachiyo but they failed to catch up as he was too fast for them. He arrived in Holdem's residence in Bakura Town, the town where Orochi's officials and men of Kaido lives. He hands Tama over to Holdem, one of three headliners ruling over Bakura Town. Luffy's group arrived at the entrance of the town but were stop by the guards. Bepo, Sachi and Penguin saw them using a binocular from a nearby hilltop, and they ran to find Law, who was chilling in an abandoned building, and informed him that Luffy had appeared at the entrance of Bakura Town.

episode.title: The Yokozuna Appears! The Invincible Urashima Goes After Okiku!
episode.english: The Yokozuna Appears! The Invincible Urashima Goes After Okiku!
episode.japanese: Yokozuna Tōjō – O-Kiku Nerau Muteki no Urashima!
episode.transliteration: 横綱登場 お菊狙う無敵の浦島！
episode.summary: Luffy, Zoro, Kiku, and Komachiyo enter Bakura Town to rescue Tama after Luffy knocked out the guards with his Haōshoku Haki. They later come across Urashima participating in sumo matches. After Urashima's men grab Kiku and bring her to the ring, Kiku rejects Urashima by cutting off his topknot. Enraged, Urashima attacks Kiku, but Luffy steps in and clashes with him.

episode.title: A Climactic Sumo Battle! Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!
episode.english: A Climactic Sumo Battle! Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!
episode.japanese: Sumō Kessen – Mugiwara tai Saikyō no Yokozuna!
episode.transliteration: 相撲決戦 麦わらVS最強の横綱！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Yusuke SuzukiStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: Luffy faces against Urashima in a sumo match. Holdem tries to pull off Tama's cheek until Luffy sends Urashima crashing into Holdem's residence.

episode.title: Luffy Rages! Rescue Otama from Danger!
episode.english: Luffy Rages! Rescue Otama from Danger!
episode.japanese: Rufi Gekido – Pinchi no Otama o Sukue!
episode.transliteration: ルフィ激怒 ピンチのお玉を救え！
episode.summary: Luffy, Zoro, and Kiku fight back against the attacking Beasts Pirates and their samurai allies. Luffy calls out to Holdem, who approaches Luffy's group while holding Tama hostage.

episode.title: Taking Back Otama! A Fierce Fight Against Holdem!
episode.english: Taking Back Otama! A Fierce Fight Against Holdem!
episode.japanese: Otama Dakkan Gekitō! Hōrudemu-sen!
episode.transliteration: お玉奪還 激闘！ホールデム戦！
episode.summary: Holdem continues to taunt Luffy's group while holding Tama hostage, threatening to chew her up with Kamijiro. Kiku warns Luffy against attacking Holdem as Kuri is ruled by Jack, and he will destroy Bakura Town if they fight back. Speed arrived with the Treasure ship of food from Paradise Farm. Luffy ordered Zoro to steal the food cart, which he did with Kiku's help. Luffy proceed to punch Kamijiro and rescue Tama. When he saw the injuries on Tama's cheek from being pulled by Holdem with a pincer, he flew into a rage and punched Holdem with Red Hawk, where Tama see Ace in Luffy.

episode.title: Duel! The Magician and the Surgeon of Death!
episode.english: Duel! The Magician and the Surgeon of Death!
episode.japanese: Ikkiuchi – Majutsushi to Shi no Gekai!
episode.transliteration: 一騎打ち 魔術師と死の外科医！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Yasunori KoyamaStoryboarded by : Toshinori Fukuzawa
episode.summary: After defeating Holdem, Luffy grabs Tama and flees the scene. During the escape, they encounter Speed and Tama tames her. They then catch up to Zoro, Kiku, and Komachiyo as the latter three were fleeing with the stolen food cart. Meanwhile, Law fights Hawkins but their battle is interrupted when the food cart passes by them. After jumping on the food cart, Law reprimands Zoro for his group's actions.

episode.title: 20th Anniversary Special! Romance Dawn
episode.english: 20th Anniversary Special! Romance Dawn
episode.japanese: 20-Shūnen! - Tokubetsu-hen Romansu Dōn
episode.transliteration: 20周年！特別編ロマンスドーン
episode.summary: An adaptation of the second Romance Dawn one-shot manga, a predecessor to One Piece. The pirate Luffy is sailing in a search of "Piece-mains", pirates that focus on adventure and attack the "Morganeer" pirates who plunder lawlessly, when a Ruku ("monster bird") named Balloon lands in his ship. Luffy hands Balloon over to the nearby sorcerer pirate Speil, but gets imprisoned on Spiel's ship after insulting him. Luffy is trapped with Anne, a close friend of Balloon who explains that Spiel is after his magic blood and has kidnapped her as bait. Luffy in turn mentions that he was inspired by his pirate grandfather, and as a child unknowingly ate the Gum-Gum Devil Fruit belonging to him. Luffy uses his rubber powers to break them both out but is uninteresting in saving Balloon. Spiel shoots Anne after discovering her unlocking Balloon's cage and attacks Luffy when insulted again. Losing the fight and having obtained the Ruku he was after, Spiel destroys his ship with his former crew still aboard and uses Balloon to escape. After Anne saves him from drowning, Luffy successfully fights Spiel and rescues Balloon.

episode.title: The Coming of the Treasure Ship! Luffytaro Returns the Favor!
episode.english: The Coming of the Treasure Ship! Luffytaro Returns the Favor!
episode.japanese: Takarabune Tōrai – Rufitarō no Ongaeshi!
episode.transliteration: 宝船到来 ルフィ太郎の恩返し！
episode.summary: Luffy's group delivers the stolen food cart to Okobore Town and Luffy also gives the residents clean water. After Luffy parted ways with Tama and Speed, Law takes the group to the ruins of Oden Castle.

episode.title: Mysterious Grave Markers! A Reunion at the Ruins of Oden Castle!
episode.english: Mysterious Grave Markers! A Reunion at the Ruins of Oden Castle!
episode.japanese: Nazo no Bohyō – Oden Jōseki de no Saikai!
episode.transliteration: 謎の墓標 おでん城跡での再会！
episode.summary: While traveling to Oden Castle, Komachiyo, Law, Luffy, Zoro, and Kiku encounter a ferocious tiger. Zoro separates from the group to fight the tiger. The rest of the group later arrive at the ruins of Oden Castle. After seeing the graves of the Kozuki Family, Luffy reunites with Kin'emon, Momonosuke, Sanji, Nami, Brook, Chopper, and Carrot. Once they are inside Oden Castle, Kin'emon reveals that he, Momonosuke, Kiku, Raizo, and Kanjuro came from the past.

episode.title: A Legendary Samurai! The Man Who Roger Admired!
episode.english: A Legendary Samurai! The Man Who Roger Admired!
episode.japanese: Densetsu no Samurai – Rojā ga Horeta Otoko!
episode.transliteration: 伝説の侍 ロジャーが惚れた男！
episode.summary: Kin'emon explains to Luffy's group about the past. He recounts stories such as how his Lord, Kozuki Oden, brings order to Kuri, the day of his demise, and Toki sending Kin'emon's group and Momonosuke to the future.

episode.title: Bringing Down the Emperor of the Sea! A Secret Raid Operation Begins!
episode.english: Bringing Down the Emperor of the Sea! A Secret Raid Operation Begins!
episode.japanese: Datō Yonkō – Gokuhi Uchiiri Sakusen Hatsudō
episode.transliteration: 打倒四皇 極秘討ち入り作戦発動
episode.summary: Kin'emon explained to Luffy's group, who just arrived, the preparation they have done till now and assigned new tasks to them. He laid out the plan of how they are going to defeat Kaido, but much work remains, such as recruiting allies and gathering information on the enemy.

episode.title: The Strongest Man in the World! Shutenmaru, the Thieves Brigade Chief!
episode.english: The Strongest Man in the World! Shutenmaru, the Thieves Brigade Chief!
episode.japanese: Saikyō no Otoko – Tōzoku-dan Tōryō: Shutenmaru!
episode.transliteration: 最強の男 盗賊団棟梁・酒天丸！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Masahiro HosodaStoryboarded by : Akitaro Daichi
episode.summary: While Usopp is looking for allies in Wano Country, Shutenmaru and the Mt. Atama Thieves plunder Okobore Town. Jack suddenly arrives at Okubore Town and confronts Shutenmaru. Shutenmaru and Jack quickly get into a fight, but are interrupted when Kaido flies in his dragon form.

episode.title: Everyone is Annihilated! Kaido's Furious Blast Breath!
episode.english: Everyone is Annihilated! Kaido's Furious Blast Breath!
episode.japanese: Zen'in Shōmetsu – Kaidō Ikari no Boro Buresu!
episode.transliteration: 全員消滅 カイドウ怒りのボロブレス！
episode.summary: The drunken Kaido flies above Okobore Town in his dragon form and threatens Shutenmaru and all the people in the town. Luffy, Law, Kin'emon, and Kiku start running towards the town to rescue them. However, Kaido heads towards the ruins of Oden Castle and destroys it with a single attack.

episode.title: Finally Clashing! The Ferocious Luffy vs. Kaido!
episode.english: Finally Clashing! The Ferocious Luffy vs. Kaido!
episode.japanese: Tsuini Gekitotsu – Mōkō Rufi tai Kaidō
episode.transliteration: 遂に激突 猛攻ルフィVSカイドウ
episode.summary: Right after the destruction of Oden Castle, Luffy enters a furious battle with Kaido.

episode.title: Destructive! One Shot, One Kill – Thunder Bagua!
episode.english: Destructive! One Shot, One Kill – Thunder Bagua!
episode.japanese: Hakai-teki! Ichigeki Hissatsu no Raimei Hakke!
episode.transliteration: 破壊的！一撃必殺の雷鳴八卦！
episode.summary: Luffy continues his furious battle with Kaido. Despite his best efforts, the battle ends in Luffy's defeat.

episode.title: A Living Hell! Luffy, Humiliated in the Great Mine!
episode.english: A Living Hell! Luffy, Humiliated in the Great Mine!
episode.japanese: Iki-Jigoku! Rufi Kutsujoku no Dai Saikutsu-jō
episode.transliteration: 生き地獄 ルフィ屈辱の大採掘場
episode.summary: After his defeat, Luffy is sent to a prison in the Udon region. Kiku returns to the mountain where Oden Castle was destroyed and discovers that the group there managed to escape the destruction. Franky, Robin, Usopp, and Zoro read the news about Luffy's fight with Kaido. Dogstorm and his group discover Tama alive and take her into the forest. At the prison in Udon, Luffy meets Kid again.

episode.title: The Holyland in Tumult! Emperor of the Sea Blackbeard Cackles!
episode.english: The Holyland in Tumult! Emperor of the Sea Blackbeard Cackles!
episode.japanese: Seichi Gekidō – Futeki ni Warau Yonkō Kurohige
episode.transliteration: 聖地激動 不敵に笑う四皇黒ひげ
episode.summary: Perona learns from a newspaper that Gecko Moria is alive and prepares to leave Kuraigana Island to search for him. Moria and his zombie army attack Pirate Island to find Absalom only to learn that the Blackbeard pirates had killed him. After reading the newspaper, Blackbeard foresaw how the entire events unfolded with Strawhats entering Wano where Kaido resides, the revolutionary army infiltrating Mary Geoise to rescue Bartholomew Kuma, and Big Mom in pursuit of getting revenge on Strawhats.

episode.title: It's On! The Special Operation to Bring Down Kaido!
episode.english: It's On! The Special Operation to Bring Down Kaido!
episode.japanese: Ugokidasu – Datō Kaidō Daikeikaku!
episode.transliteration: 動き出す 打倒カイドウ大計画！
episode.summary: Dogstorm clashes with Shutenmaru, who refuses to aid in Kin'emon's operation. Sanji and the others seek out recruits.

episode.title: Rampage! The Prisoners – Luffy and Kid!
episode.english: Rampage! The Prisoners – Luffy and Kid!
episode.japanese: Dai Abare! Shūjin Rufi to Kiddo!
episode.transliteration: 大暴れ！囚人ルフィとキッド！
episode.summary: Nami and Shinobu finish with their current objective in the Flower Capital and Sanji's soba stand is growing more popular. In Udon, Luffy and Kid continue to work. Dobon becomes angry at them for eating a lot of food. The vice warden tries to attack them only to be defeated by the pair.

episode.title: A Great Sensation! Sanji's Special Soba!
episode.english: A Great Sensation! Sanji's Special Soba!
episode.japanese: Dai Hyōban! Sanji no Ohako Soba!
episode.transliteration: 大評判！サンジの十八番そば！
episode.summary: Sanji tangles with some gang members who disrupt his soba business and learns that one of his customers has friends in high places.

episode.title: Luxurious and Gorgeous! Wano's Most Beautiful Woman – Komurasaki!
episode.english: Luxurious and Gorgeous! Wano's Most Beautiful Woman – Komurasaki!
episode.japanese: Gōka Kenran – Wano Kuni Ichi no Bijo: Komurasaki
episode.transliteration: 豪華絢爛 ワノ国一の美女・小紫
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Yasunori KoyamaStoryboarded by : Hiroshi Hara
episode.summary: Wano's most popular courtesan heads to the palace, but a revenge plot threatens the proceedings.

episode.title: A Tale of Chivalry! Zoro and Tonoyasu's Little Trip!
episode.english: A Tale of Chivalry! Zoro and Tonoyasu's Little Trip!
episode.japanese: Ninkyō Den! Zoro to Tonoyasu Futari-tabi!
episode.transliteration: 任侠伝！ゾロとトの康二人旅！
episode.summary: Zoro goes to a gambling house with Tonoyasu. After a brawl, Zoro and Tonoyasu go to Ebisu Town. Meanwhile, the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance works to steal weapons and food. Franky learns that Minatomo no longer has the blueprints of Kaido's mansion. He goes all over the Flower Capital searching for them but hits a dead end. At the shogun's castle, CP-0 attempts to negotiate with Orochi.

episode.title: A State of Emergency! Big Mom Closes in!
episode.english: A State of Emergency! Big Mom Closes in!
episode.japanese: Kinkyū Jitai – Biggu Mamu Dai Sekkin!
episode.transliteration: 緊急事態 ビッグ・マム大接近！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Katsumi TokoroStoryboarded by : Akitaro Daichi
episode.summary: The banquet at Orochi's palace begins and Robin begins her mission. Shinobu, Nami, and Brook sneak into the palace as well. Meanwhile, in Udon prison, Kid explains to Luffy and Caribou about how he lost his arm. Back at the Flower Capital, two of the Flying Six, Page One and X Drake arrive to hunt down Sanji. In the seas surrounding Wano Country, the Big Mom Pirates draw closer.

episode.title: The Capital in an Uproar! Another Assassin Targets Sanji!
episode.english: The Capital in an Uproar! Another Assassin Targets Sanji!
episode.japanese: Miyako Sōzen! Sanji Nerau Aratana Shikaku
episode.transliteration: 都騒然！サンジ狙う新たな刺客
episode.summary: King flies to the waterfall while the Big Mom Pirates are coming up and knocks their ship down. Meanwhile, back at the capital, Page One attack multiple soba shops and owners looking for Sanji. Hearing the cries, Sanji comes to fight Page One.

episode.title: Dashing! The Righteous Soba Mask!
episode.english: Dashing! The Righteous Soba Mask!
episode.japanese: Dai Katsuyaku! Masayoshi no O-Soba Masuku!
episode.transliteration: 大活躍！正義のおそばマスク！
episode.summary: As he confronts Page One, Sanji puts on his Raid Suit and displays its capabilities. Back in the shogun's caste, Robin was sneaking around trying to find important information but she is soon confronted by the Orochi Oniwabanshu.

episode.title: A Desperate Situation! Orochi's Menacing Oniwabanshu!
episode.english: A Desperate Situation! Orochi's Menacing Oniwabanshu!
episode.japanese: Zettai Zetsumei – Kyōi no Orochi Oniwabanshū
episode.transliteration: 絶体絶命 脅威のオロチお庭番衆
episode.summary: Robin gets caught by the Orochi Oniwabanshu in Orochi's castle. The ninjas attack Robin in order to find the truth of her intentions but with the help of her Devil Fruit, she is able to get away from them. Meanwhile, Chopper, Kiku, Tama, and Momonosuke find Big Mom who gets drifted to the shore after the encounter with King. Chopper and the others then discover that Big Mom lost her memories.

episode.title: Pandemonium! The Monster Snake, Shogun Orochi!
episode.english: Pandemonium! The Monster Snake, Shogun Orochi!
episode.japanese: Shura-jō! Osoreru Daija – Shōgun Orochi
episode.transliteration: 修羅場！怒れる大蛇 将軍オロチ
episode.summary: At Kuri Beach, Chopper gives the amnesiac Big Mom a fake name. Back inside the shogun's castle, Orochi warns his guests about the return of the Akazaya Nine. Toko laughs out loud, enraging Orochi. As Orochi lashes out at Toko, Komurasaki steps in and slaps him. Komurasaki refuses to apologize for her transgression and Orochi transforms in a fit of rage and goes on a rampage. Robin tries to flee with Toko but she is found by the Orochi Oniwabanshu.

episode.title: The Flower Falls! The Final Moment of the Most Beautiful Woman in the Land of Wano!
episode.english: The Flower Falls! The Final Moment of the Most Beautiful Woman in the Land of Wano!
episode.japanese: Hana Chiru! Wano Kuni Ichi no Bijo no Saigo
episode.transliteration: 花散る！ワノ国一の美女の最期
episode.summary: Orochi takes his rage out on Komurasaki as Robin protects Toko. Brook, Nami, and Shinobu arrive at the banquet hall to aid Robin. Right after Orochi releases his grip on Komurasaki during the commotion, Kyoshiro faces the oiran and seemingly cuts her down. Orochi then pursues Robin and Toko, intending to kill the little girl. Nami manages to stop Orochi with Zeus' help. Afterwards, the group at the castle escapes with Shinobu. At Okobore Town, Chopper's group convinces Big Mom to travel with them to Udon.

episode.title: The Bond Between Prisoners! Luffy and Old Man Hyo!
episode.english: The Bond Between Prisoners! Luffy and Old Man Hyo!
episode.japanese: Shūjin no Kizuna – Rufi to Hyōjii!
episode.transliteration: 囚人の絆 ルフィとヒョウじい！
episode.summary: In the Ringo region, Kanjuro meets up with Shinobu's group at the Northern Cemetery. In Ebisu Town, Law's group learns from a newspaper that a funeral for Komurasaki will be held and that Kid escaped from Udon prison, the place where Chopper's group and Big Mom are currently traveling to. In Udon prison, Hyogoro tries to make good use of the meal tickets that Luffy generously gave to him, but Daifugo approaches and torments the elderly man.

episode.title: A Lead Performer! Queen the Plague Emerges!
episode.english: A Lead Performer! Queen the Plague Emerges!
episode.japanese: Ōkanban! Ekisai no Kuīn Arawaru
episode.transliteration: 大看板! 疫災のクイーン現る！
episode.summary: Luffy kicks Daifugo to defend Hyogoro and then fights the guards until Babanuki fires a cannonball at him. Raizo manages to steal some keys from the Prisoner Mines executive tower. As Queen arrives at the Prisoner Mines, Luffy attempts to escape with Hyogoro.

episode.title: Climb Up! Luffy's Desperate Escape!
episode.english: Climb Up! Luffy's Desperate Escape!
episode.japanese: Yojinobore – Rufi Kesshi no Tōsō-geki!
episode.transliteration: よじ登れ ルフィ決死の逃走劇！
episode.summary: Luffy and Hyogoro fail to escape and are quickly surrounded by the Beasts Pirates. They manage to defeat some of the soldiers but are detained by Daifugo and Babanuki. Meanwhile, Usopp, Franky, and Law are hiding at Yasuie's house and wonder where Sanji is at. At the bathouse, Shinobu tell Nami and Robin about Hyogoro. Raizo is surprised to see Kawamatsu in Udon prison while Queen forces Luffy and Hyogoro fight in sumo matches with collars that will cut their heads off if they leave the ring.

episode.title: Dead or Alive! Queen's Sumo Inferno!
episode.english: Dead or Alive! Queen's Sumo Inferno!
episode.japanese: Sei ka Shi ka – Kuīn no Ōzumō Inferuno
episode.transliteration: 生か死か クイーンの大相撲地獄（インフェルノ）
episode.summary: At the Prisoner Mines, the Sumo Inferno begins, but Luffy easily defeated his opponents. Meanwhile, at the Flower Capital bathhouse, Drake and Hawkins arrive to search for those associated with the Kozuki Family. As Shinobu, Robin, and Nami are accosted by Hawkins, Sanji is revealed to be at the bathhouse as well. After a scuffle with Drake and Hawkins, Sanji escapes with Shinobu, Robin, and Nami. In the Ringo region, Zoro confronts the person who took Shusui.

episode.title: Gyukimaru! Zoro Fights a Duel on Bandit's Bridge!
episode.english: Gyukimaru! Zoro Fights a Duel on Bandit's Bridge!
episode.japanese: Gyūkimaru! Zoro Oihagi-bashi no Kettō
episode.transliteration: 牛鬼丸！ゾロおいはぎ橋の決闘
episode.summary: The Sumo Inferno continues and Queen sends in the Gifters after Luffy defeats the Pleasures. At the Oihagi Bridge, Zoro clashes with Gyukimaru to get Shusui back. Their fight is interrupted when a woman and Toko arrive seeking help as they were chased by an assassin known as Kamazo. Zoro then decides to fight the assassin to protect the woman and the girl.

episode.title: A Big Turnover! The Three-Sword Style Overcomes Danger!
episode.english: A Big Turnover! The Three-Sword Style Overcomes Danger!
episode.japanese: Dai-Gyakuten! Shisen o Koeta Santōryū
episode.transliteration: 大逆転！死線を越えた三刀流！
episode.summary: Due to a leak, those allied with the Kozuki Family are getting arrested in the Flower Capital. During an argument with Shinobu, Law plans to rescue his crew. Meanwhile, at Oihagi Bridge, Zoro continues his clash with Kamazo. Because of Gyukimaru's interference, Kamazo lands a hit on Zoro. However, Zoro manages to turn the battle around and defeats Kamazo.

episode.title: Zoro, Stunned! The Shocking Identity of the Mysterious Woman!
episode.english: Zoro, Stunned! The Shocking Identity of the Mysterious Woman!
episode.japanese: Zoro Kyōgaku – Shōgeki! Nazo no Bijo no Shōtai
episode.transliteration: ゾロ驚愕 衝撃! 謎の美女の正体
episode.summary: Luffy continues trying to use an advanced Busoshoku Haki technique as he and Hyogoro are confronted by Alpacaman and Madilloman. After the battle with Kamazo, Zoro's wound is treated by the woman he saved. During their conversation, the woman revealed herself to be Momonosuke's sister, Hiyori.

episode.title: Get the Hang of It! The Land of Wano's Haki – Ryuo!
episode.english: Get the Hang of It! The Land of Wano's Haki – Ryuo!
episode.japanese: Etoku Seyo – Wano Kuni no Haki, Ryūō!
episode.transliteration: 会得せよ ワノ国の覇気・流桜！
episode.summary: After Hiyori revealed her identity to Zoro, she explains about some things about her past such as how Kawamatsu watched over her after her parents' death. Back in the Sumo Inferno, Hyogoro defeats Alpacaman, displaying his knowledge and skills with advanced Busoshoku Haki, and offers to teach Luffy.

episode.title: Tonoyasu! Ebisu Town's Most Loved!
episode.english: Tonoyasu! Ebisu Town's Most Loved!
episode.japanese: Tonoyasu! Ebisu-chō ichi no Ninkimono!
episode.transliteration: トの康！えびす町一の人気者！
episode.summary: Luffy tries to learn Ryuo through fighting in the Sumo Inferno. It continues until the night and will resume the next day. Luffy and Hyogoro meet Caribou and Raizo and talks about the rebellion. Tonoyasu speaks to and addresses Kanjuro and Shinobu casually, but they do not remember him. Meanwhile, Big Mom approaches Udon with Kiku, Chopper, Momonosuke, and Tama.

episode.title: Shaking the Nation! The Identity of Ushimitsu Kozo The Chivalrous Thief!
episode.english: Shaking the Nation! The Identity of Ushimitsu Kozo The Chivalrous Thief!
episode.japanese: Shōgeki Hashiru – Gizoku Ushimitsu Kozō no Shōtai
episode.transliteration: 衝撃走る 義賊丑三つ小僧の正体
episode.summary: After his capture, Tonoyasu is sentenced to execution. Meanwhile, Holdem and his men battle the Mt. Atama Thieves. While clashing with Ashura Doji, Holdem sets the mountain on fire. In Ringo, Brook finds Zoro, Hiyori, and Toko and informs them of the impending execution in the Flower Capital.

episode.title: The Straw Hats Run! Save the Captive Tonoyasu!
episode.english: The Straw Hats Run! Save the Captive Tonoyasu!
episode.japanese: Ichimi Hashiru! Sukue Toraware no Tonoyasu
episode.transliteration: 一味疾る！救え囚われのトの康
episode.summary: Toko and Zoro's group make their way to the Flower Capital. As Shimotsuki Yasuie is placed on a wooden pole and is being broadcast throughout Wano, his old acquaintances recognize him. The citizens of Ebisu Town and some of the Straw Hats rush to the execution. As Orochi heads to the execution site, Yasuie reveals that he lied about being Ushimitsu Kozo and plans to say a few things before meeting his demise.

episode.title: Zoro's Fury! The Truth About the Smile!
episode.english: Zoro's Fury! The Truth About the Smile!
episode.japanese: Zoro no Ikari – Sumairu no Shinjitsu!
episode.transliteration: ゾロの怒り SMILEの真実！
episode.summary: After claiming responsibility for Kin'emon's secret message, saying it was a prank, and casting doubt in the Rasetsu prison guards, Yasuie meets a brutal end as Orochi and his men shoot him to death. As the Ebisu Town citizens "laugh" over Yasuie's death, Zoro furious that they would do so after all he's done for them, Hiyori reveals to him that they were affected by the fruits known as SMILE.

episode.title: Toko's Tears! Orochi's Pitiless Bullets!
episode.english: Toko's Tears! Orochi's Pitiless Bullets!
episode.japanese: Toko no Namida! Orochi Hijō no Jūdan!
episode.transliteration: トコの涙！オロチ非情の銃弾！
episode.summary: As the citizens of Ebisu Town grieve over Yasuie's death, Shinobu reveals more information about the SMILE fruits. Toko enters the execution site, hoping to revive her father. Seeing Toko, Orochi attempts to kill her as well, but Zoro and Sanji step in and save her.

episode.title: The Straw Hats Step In! An Uproarious Deadly Battle at the Execution Ground!
episode.english: The Straw Hats Step In! An Uproarious Deadly Battle at the Execution Ground!
episode.japanese: Ichimi Ran'nyū! Sōzen! Shokei-jō no Gekitō
episode.transliteration: 一味乱入！騒然！処刑場の激闘
episode.summary: Zoro and Sanji manage to save Toko. The swordsman directly attacks Orochi, who is protected by Kyoshiro, while Sanji fights against X Drake. Franky saves Zoro and manages to recover Yasuie's body and the rest of the Straw Hat Pirates joins the fight. At Udon, Luffy is assisting to his crewmembers' fights when two prisoners arrive: Kid and Kamazo, who turns out to be Killer.

episode.title: Luffy's Determination! Win Through the Sumo Inferno!
episode.english: Luffy's Determination! Win Through the Sumo Inferno!
episode.japanese: Rufi no Ketsui – Yabure Ōzumō Inferuno!
episode.transliteration: ルフィの決意 破れ大相撲地獄（インフェルノ）！
episode.summary: Zoro clashes with Kyoshiro and Sanji clashes with X Drake while Usopp takes Toko to safety. The Orochi Oniwabanshu arrives to confront the Straw Hat Pirates. Law arrives at the Rasetsu Town prison to rescue his captured crewmates, but he is confronted by Hawkins. Back at Udon, Queen subjects Kid and Killer to water torture as he resumes the Sumo Inferno. However, Big Mom arrives at the Prisoner Mines.

episode.title: The Storm Has Come! A Raging Big Mom!
episode.english: The Storm Has Come! A Raging Big Mom!
episode.japanese: Arashi Tōrai! Ō-abare Biggu Mamu!
episode.transliteration: 嵐到来！大暴れビッグ・マム！
episode.summary: After the skirmish inside the Flower Capital, Kin'emon confesses to Ashura Doji that he provoked Holdem into attacking Mt. Atama. When Ashura becomes angry, Kin'emon admits his mistake for trying to force Ashura to join the rebellion and once again begs him for his help. After Chopper's group arrives at the Prisoner Mines, Big Mom breaks in. During her search for oshiruko, she gets into a fight with Queen.

episode.title: A Grudge Over Red-bean Soup! Luffy Gets into a Desperate Situation!
episode.english: A Grudge Over Red-bean Soup! Luffy Gets into a Desperate Situation!
episode.japanese: Oshiruko no Urami – Rufi Zettai Zetsumei
episode.transliteration: おしるこの恨み ルフィ絶体絶命
episode.summary: Big Mom subdues Queen when the latter tries to fight her. During that scuffle, Kid and Killer are saved from drowning. Big Mom does not find any oshiruko, and when Luffy blurts out that he ate it, she attacks him out of rage. Luffy and Hyogoro are forced out of the ring, but Luffy manages to remove the collars before they are killed. Afterwards, Hyogoro decides to test Luffy by having him defend against Big Mom's attack.

episode.title: Stop the Emperor of the Sea! Queen's Secret Plan!
episode.english: Stop the Emperor of the Sea! Queen's Secret Plan!
episode.japanese: Yonkō o Tomero! Kuīn no Hisaku
episode.transliteration: 四皇を止めろ！クイーンの秘策
episode.summary: Luffy attempts to defend against Big Mom's attack, but she sends him and Hyogoro crashing into a wall. They both survived, but Big Mom continues attacking Luffy, chasing him around the Prisoner Mines. Queen regains consciousness and he comes up with a plan to take down Big Mom. Once Luffy and Big Mom return to where they started, Queen uses a dive bomb attack and strikes her in the head. The attack appears to have failed and Big Mom regains her memories.

episode.title: Brutal Ammunition! The Plague Rounds Aim at Luffy!
episode.english: Brutal Ammunition! The Plague Rounds Aim at Luffy!
episode.japanese: Saikyō Heiki! Rufi o Nerau Ekisaito Dan
episode.transliteration: 最凶兵器！ルフィを狙う疫災弾
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Takuhito SatōStoryboarded by : Akitaro Daichi
episode.summary: Right after Big Mom regains her memories, she suddenly faints. Queen quickly orders his men to restrain Big Mom and escorts her to Onigashima. With both Queen and Big Mom away, Luffy continues practicing with advanced Busoshoku Haki. Babanuki then orders the prisoners to subdue Luffy, and they comply. Daifugo also fires toxic bullets on the prisoners. Before Luffy could be infected, a mysterious prisoner shouts out.

episode.title: Start Fighting Back! Luffy and the Akazaya Samurai!
episode.english: Start Fighting Back! Luffy and the Akazaya Samurai!
episode.japanese: Hangeki Kaishi! Rufi to Akazaya no Samurai!
episode.transliteration: 反撃開始！ルフィと赤鞘の侍！
episode.summary: Raizo retrieves the keys to Kawamatsu's cell as well as his sword. The ninja later gives them to him, and Kawamatsu frees himself. After Raizo, Kawamatsu, and Kikunojo reunite, they joined up with Luffy and Hyogoro in fighting the Beasts Pirates. However, the Beasts Pirates continue infecting prisoners with Excite Bullets.

episode.title: We're Here to Win! Luffy's Desperate Scream!
episode.english: We're Here to Win! Luffy's Desperate Scream!
episode.japanese: Kachi ni Kita! Rufi Kesshi no Sakebi
episode.transliteration: 勝ちに来た！ルフィ決死の叫び
episode.summary: The prisoners try to stop Luffy from getting them involved but they are still gunned them with the Excite Bullets that infects them with the Mummy virus. The infected prisoners surround Luffy and allies, blaming them for this and doubts they'll defeat Kaido. Luffy grabs the infected prisoners, infecting himself and tells them that he made a promise to make Wano a prosperous place again and doesn't need useless allies. After Luffy tells them to make a choice, the prisoners raise up and defeat the Beasts Pirates in charge of Udon without any outside enemies finding out.

episode.title: Warriors' Dream! Luffy's Conquer of Udon!
episode.english: Warriors' Dream! Luffy's Conquer of Udon!
episode.japanese: Tsuwamono-domo ga Yume! Rufi Udon Seiatsu!
episode.transliteration: 兵どもが夢！ルフィ兎丼制圧！
episode.summary: After Udon is conquered, Chopper tends to Luffy and works to develop a cure for his condition. Luffy asks Kid to join the fight against Kaido, but Kid rejects his offer and leaves Udon with Killer. After finding out that Luffy is a pirate, the prisoners distrust him, but Momonosuke speaks to them and convinces them to join the cause to liberate Wano Country. Elsewhere, Ashura Doji reveals to Kin'emon and Dogstorm that he had comrades who were too impatient to wait for the Kozuki Family to return and died when they tried to fight Kaido. Afterwards, Ashura comes around and decides to rejoin Kin'emon.

episode.title: Orochi's Hunting Party! The Ninja Group vs. Zoro!
episode.english: Orochi's Hunting Party! The Ninja Group vs. Zoro!
episode.japanese: Orochi no Otte! Ninja Gundan tai Zoro
episode.transliteration: オロチの追手！忍者軍団VSゾロ
episode.summary: Zoro and Hiyori have an encounter with Fujin and several ninjas that serve Orochi. After defeating the ninjas, Zoro plans to get Shusui back. In the Flower Capital, Law allows himself to be taken prisoner in exchange for the release of his captured crewmates. Back in Udon, Chopper cures Luffy of the Mummy virus. Afterwards, Luffy regains his strength.

episode.title: Tension Rises in Onigashima! Two Emperors of the Sea Meet?!
episode.english: Tension Rises in Onigashima! Two Emperors of the Sea Meet?!
episode.japanese: Onigashima Kinpaku! Sōgū!? Futari no Yonkō
episode.transliteration: 鬼ヶ島緊迫！遭遇!? 二人の四皇
episode.summary: As the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance continues with their preparations for the Fire Festival, Zoro returns to Oihagi Bridge along with Hiyori and he challenges Gyukimaru again to reclaim Shusui. The battle is then interrupted by Kawamatsu. Big Mom has been taken to Onigashima, where she and Kaido begin clashing.

episode.title: Hiyori's Confession! A Reunion at Bandit's Bridge!
episode.english: Hiyori's Confession! A Reunion at Bandit's Bridge!
episode.japanese: Hiyori no Kokuhaku! Oihagi-bashi no Saikai
episode.transliteration: 日和の告白！おいはぎ橋の再会
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Ryōsuke TanakaStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: At Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom continue with their clash. Queen contacts Udon, and Babanuki, having been tamed by Tama, gives Queen a false report. Back at Udon, Hyogoro gets reacquainted with the other yakuza leaders, who join the rebellion. At Oihagi Bridge, Hiyori and Kawamatsu have a heartfelt reunion. The reunion is cut short as a group of Beasts Pirates arrives, seeking revenge on Gyukimaru. Zoro and Kawamatsu defeat the attackers, and Gyukimaru flees the scene with Zoro chasing after him.

episode.title: Its Name is Enma! Oden's Great Swords!
episode.english: Its Name is Enma! Oden's Great Swords!
episode.japanese: Sono Na wa Enma! Oden no Meitō!
episode.transliteration: その名は閻魔！おでんの名刀！
episode.summary: Kawamatsu rekindles with Hiyori whilst Zoro chases after Gyukimaru. Kawamatsu explains that he spent the decade robbing and storing swords from the eternal graves in Ringo after befriending Onimaru, a komagitsune who was once the campanion of Shimotsuki Ushimaru. Kawamatsu contacts Kin'emon to reveal that he can supply the alliance with the stored weapons. Meanwhile, Gyukimaru reveals himself to be Onimaru in a human form. Hiyori then offers to trade Zoro's Shushui with Emna, a sword that belonged to Kozuki Oden and the only blade that had ever injured Kaido.

episode.title: A New Alliance?! Kaido's Army Gathers!
episode.english: A New Alliance?! Kaido's Army Gathers!
episode.japanese: Arata na Dōmei!? Kaidō-gun Dai Shūketsu
episode.transliteration: 新たな同盟!? カイドウ軍大集結
episode.summary: At the secret place where Kawamatsu stored weapons, Zoro agrees to return Shusui in exchange for Enma. At the Flower Capital, Law subdues Hawkins and escapes prison with the help from an unknown individual. As the day of the Fire Festival draws closer, the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance continues with their preparations for the raid on Onigashima. Apoo returns to Wano with a group of gigantic beings known as the Numbers. At Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom decide to put aside their feud and form an alliance to conquer the world.

episode.title: Ticking Down to the Great Battle! The Straw Hats Go into Combat Mode!
episode.english: Ticking Down to the Great Battle! The Straw Hats Go into Combat Mode!
episode.japanese: Semaru Kessen! Mugiwara Ichimi Sentō Taisei
episode.transliteration: 迫る決戦！麦わら一味戦闘態勢
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Nanami MichibataStoryboarded by : Tatsuya Nagamine
episode.summary: Hiyori parted ways with Zoro and Kawamatsu, and the two later inform Momonosuke and the Akazaya Nine with him of her survival. Zoro receives Enma and sees its destructive power. Luffy continues training his Busoshoku Haki and Zoro trains with his new sword. Meanwhile, the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance adds more numbers to their cause and finish up with their preparations. On the day before the Fire Festival, Momonosuke and his group of retainers march to the rendezvous point to meet up with their allies.

episode.title: Big News! An Incident That Will Affect the Seven Warlords!
episode.english: Big News! An Incident That Will Affect the Seven Warlords!
episode.japanese: Biggu Nyūsu! Shichibukai o Osou Jiken
episode.transliteration: 大ニュース！七武海を襲う事件
episode.summary: After the Levely concluded, big news concerning Sabo spread throughout the world. Those who knew Sabo become distressed after reading the news about him. Koby and X Drake have a private conversation via transponder snail, and Drake informs Koby about the newly formed alliance between Kaido and Big Mom and the recent presence of CP-0 in Wano Country. Thanks to the efforts of Nefertari Cobra and Riku Doldo III, the Seven Warlords of the Sea have been abolished. Now that the Warlords are no longer affiliated with the World Government, the Marines pursue the former members.

episode.title: A Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger!
episode.english: A Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger!
episode.japanese: Densetsu no Tatakai! Gāpu to Rojā
episode.transliteration: 伝説の戦い！ガープとロジャー
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Hikaru TakeuchiStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: At the new Marine Headquarters, the Marine officers hold a meeting. Sengoku explains about the Rocks Pirates and the history concerning this crew. Brannew then reveals the bounty of each of the current Emperors as well as Gol D. Roger and Edward Newgate. Sakazuki declares that the Marines will not go to Wano Country and Sengoku talks about Kozuki Oden.

episode.title: The Rendezvous Port! The Land of Wano Act Three Begins!
episode.english: The Rendezvous Port! The Land of Wano Act Three Begins!
episode.japanese: Yakusoku no Minato! Wano Kuni-hen Daisanmaku Kaimaku
episode.transliteration: 約束の港！ワノ国編第三幕開幕
episode.summary: Orochi heads to Onigashima after departing from Port Tabu on the day of the Fire Festival. Meanwhile, Kin'emon and the other samurai wait for their allies at Port Tokage, who have not arrived due to an incident orchestrated by Orochi the day prior.

episode.title: The Number-One Samurai in the Land of Wano! Here comes Kozuki Oden!
episode.english: The Number-One Samurai in the Land of Wano! Here comes Kozuki Oden!
episode.japanese: Wano Kuni Ichi no Samurai! Kōzuki Oden Tōjō
episode.transliteration: ワノ国一の侍！光月おでん登場
episode.summary: It is revealed that Orochi had the Beasts Pirates bombed the Thousand Sunny and destroyed some bridges to cut off routes to Tokage Port. At the port, the Akazaya Nine prepare to continue with the raid on their own. A flashback to many years ago begins. Back then, Oden was a well-known troublemaker. A younger Kin'emon takes a baby white boar from some thugs and brings it to the Flower Capital to gain money. However, the boar's parent, the Mountain God, arrives at the capital and wreaks havoc.

episode.title: Tearfully Swearing Allegiance! Oden and Kin'emon!
episode.english: Tearfully Swearing Allegiance! Oden and Kin'emon!
episode.japanese: Namida no Deshiiri – Oden to Kin'emon
episode.transliteration: 涙の弟子入り おでんと錦えもん
episode.summary: The Mountain God continues its rampage in the Flower Capital until Oden confronts and defeats it. After this incident, Oden was expelled from the capital. Due to their admiration for Oden, Kin'emon and Denjiro decide to follow him. After staying with Shimotsuki Yasuie for a time, Oden decides to travel to Kuri.
