Along the way, Oden is also joined by Izo, Kikunojo, Kanjuro, and Raizo. Oden eventually arrives at Kuri and prepares to fight the bandits there.

episode.title: Changing Destiny! The Whitebeard Pirates Cast Ashore!
episode.english: Changing Destiny! The Whitebeard Pirates Cast Ashore!
episode.japanese: Ugoku Unmei Hyōchaku! Shirohige Kaizokudan!
episode.transliteration: 動く運命 漂着！白ひげ海賊団！
episode.summary: Oden defeats Ashura Doji and earns the title of the Daimyo of Kuri. He then spends years rebuilding the lawless land and eventually rescues and nurtures Cat Viper, Dogstorm, and Kawatmatsu. Yasuie then gives gold to Oden's retainers to let them train and become worthy samurai. Oden and his retainers become distinguished legends in Wano, and Kozuki Sukiyaki is proud of Oden's accomplishments. Meanwhile, the Whitebeard Pirates cast ashore the beaches of Wano.

episode.title: Oden's Determination! Whitebeard's Test!
episode.english: Oden's Determination! Whitebeard's Test!
episode.japanese: Oden no Ketsui! Shirohige no Shiren!
episode.transliteration: おでんの決意！白ひげの試練！
episode.summary: Kozuki Oden's dreams to leave Wano lead him directly to Whitebeard after he learns of the pirate's arrival. After a brief battle, Oden begs Whitebeard to let him join his crew. Whitebeard denies his request due to concerns about Oden's character. Once their ship is repaired, the Whitebeard Pirates leave at night to avoid Oden's advances, but he catches up anyway, attaching a chain to the ship and riding with Izo through the ocean. Marco saves Izo and brings him onto the Moby Dick where he is tied up. Whitebeard tells Oden that if he holds on for three days, he can join the crew. Three days have passed, and Oden only has an hour left before he can join the crew. However, after hearing the screams of Amatsuki Toki, Oden lets go of the chain to save her life.

episode.title: Whitebeard's Little Brother! Oden's Great Adventure!
episode.english: Whitebeard's Little Brother! Oden's Great Adventure!
episode.japanese: Shirohige no Otōto! Oden no Dai Bōken!
episode.transliteration: 白ひげの弟！おでんの大冒険！
episode.summary: Toki tends to Oden after he rescued her from the kidnappers. On the next day, they are confronted by the kidnappers and their leader, Karma. Whitebeard intervenes and knocks out Karma. Whitebeard accepts Oden into his crew because of his selflessness. Toki, Izo, and the stowaways Dogstorm and Cat Viper become part of Whitebeard's crew as well. Oden travels to various places and has many eventful experiences. Oden and Toki also have a son together and the infant is given the name Kozuki Momonosuke.

episode.title: Crossing Swords! Roger and Whitebeard!
episode.english: Crossing Swords! Roger and Whitebeard!
episode.japanese: Majieru Yaiba! Rojā to Shirohige!
episode.transliteration: 交える刃！ロジャーと白ひげ！
episode.summary: Orochi plots to take the shogunate with Higurashi's assistance. As Oden continues his journey with the Whitebeard Pirates, he finally encounters the Roger Pirates. A clash between Whitebeard and Gol D. Roger ensues.

episode.title: Roger's Wish! A New Journey!
episode.english: Roger's Wish! A New Journey!
episode.japanese: Rojā no Negai! Arata na Tabidachi
episode.transliteration: ロジャーの願い！新たな旅立ち
episode.summary: After a battle between the Whitebeard Pirates and Roger Pirates, Oden agrees to accompany Roger on his final voyage to the last island due to his ability to read the Poneglyphs. He is joined by his family as well as stowaways Cat Viper and Dogstorm.

episode.title: Devoting His Life! Roger's Adventure!
episode.english: Devoting His Life! Roger's Adventure!
episode.japanese: Shōgai o Kakete! Rojā no Bōken
episode.transliteration: 生涯をかけて！ロジャーの冒険
episode.summary: The Roger Pirates travel the Grand Line as they visit Skypiea, Water 7, Tequila Wolf, Sabaody Archipelago, and Fishman Island. At Fishman Island, the Roger Pirates are able to take a copy of a Road Poneglyph while a young Madam Shyarly predicts that the Ancient Weapon Poseidon will be born in 10 years.

episode.title: The King of the Pirates is Born! Arriving at the Last Island!
episode.english: The King of the Pirates is Born! Arriving at the Last Island!
episode.japanese: Kaizoku Ō Tanjō – Tōtatsu! “Saigo no Shima”
episode.transliteration: 海賊王誕生 到達！“最後の島”
episode.summary: Toki becomes ill, and Oden is forced to drop off his family with Cat Viper and Dogstorm at Wano Country while quickly taking a copy of the Road Poneglyph. The Roger Pirates travel to Zou to get a copy of the final Road Ponegylph needed in order to arrive at the final island. Before departing, Buggy becomes extremely ill and stays behind with Shanks taking care of him. When faced with the treasure on the last island, the Roger Pirates simply laugh while Roger expresses interest in the humorous tale of Joyboy. Roger then becomes the King of the Pirates as he dubs the final island "Laugh Tale".

episode.title: To the Land of Wano! The Roger Pirates Disband!
episode.english: To the Land of Wano! The Roger Pirates Disband!
episode.japanese: Wano Kuni e! Rojā Kaizokudan Kaisan
episode.transliteration: ワノ国へ！ロジャー海賊団解散
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Takaaki IshiyamaStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: After attaining everything and becoming the King of the Pirates, Roger disbands his crew. After discussing about who would surpass them, the Roger Pirates threw one last party together and Roger was the first one to leave the crew. Later, Oden returned to Wano with intentions to open its borders before Joy Boy's return and reunited with his family. However, he was surprised the changes that happen while he was gone, including his father dying and Orochi becoming shogun. After learning about the atrocities Orochi has done from his retainers, Oden prepares to confront him.

episode.title: Sad News! The Opening of the Great Pirate Era!
episode.english: Sad News! The Opening of the Great Pirate Era!
episode.japanese: Kanashiki Shirase – Dai Kaizoku Jidai Makuake
episode.transliteration: 悲しき知らせ 大海賊時代幕開け
episode.summary: Oden charges to the Flower Capital to confront Orochi, cutting down anyone who tries to stop him. He then tries to attack Orochi but blocked by Semimaru's barrier and learns that Orochi had Higurashi take Sukiyaki's appearance to make himself the next shogun. After his conversation with Orochi, Oden would dance in his underwear in front of the castle once a week. His retainers question him for answers, but Oden doesn't tell them. A year later, Oden receives a newspaper from the outside world from Momonosuke and learns of Roger's execution as well as Whitebeard who thinks back to his final meeting with Roger who tells him about the Will of D. Meanwhile, Oden ran to the seacoast crying and laughing, amazed by the life his former life lived due Roger starting the Golden Age of Piracy.

episode.title: Raid! Oden and the Akazaya Nine!
episode.english: Raid! Oden and the Akazaya Nine!
episode.japanese: Uchiiri! Oden to Akazaya Kunin Otoko
episode.transliteration: 討ち入り！おでんと赤鞘九人男
episode.summary: The Beasts Pirates and Gecko Pirates clash against each other as someone vandalizes Ryuma's grave. Oden continues to dance, and the only people left that still support are his family, retainers, Yasuie, and Hyogoro. Five years later, Orochi goes back on his promise with Oden and revealed how he had Kaido deal with Hyogoro. This spurs Oden take action as he and his retainers, now given the name Akazaya Nine, set out to defeat Kaido. Yasuie goes to Kuri to protect Oden's family at his request. Arriving in the Udon region, Oden and the Akazaya Nine are confronted by the Beasts Pirates. Wondering how and why they are prepared for them, Kaido reveals a spy must be among them. Oden questions Kaido about their promise and Kaido reveals it was a lie in order to increase their chance of victory. Oden and the Akazaya Nine charge at Kaido's subordinates and begin cutting them down.

episode.title: The End of the Battle! Oden vs. Kaido!
episode.english: The End of the Battle! Oden vs. Kaido!
episode.japanese: Ketchaku no Toki! Oden tai Kaidō!
episode.transliteration: 決着の時！おでんVSカイドウ！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Ryōsuke TanakaStoryboarded by : Aya Komaki
episode.summary: Shinobu helps Oden and the Akazaya Nine in their battle as King and Queen join the fray to confront Oden's retainers. Oden confronts Kaido and is pushed back until he manages to injure him, leaving a scar. Kaido turns back into his human form and defeats Oden after Higurashi tricks him by transforming into Momonosuke and pretend to be held hostage. Ashura and Kin'emon try to rescue Oden but were defeated as well by King and Queen. Three days later, Oden and the Akazaya Nine were sentenced to public execution by boiling. Before getting in the pot, Oden demands Orochi and Kaido give him and his retainers a chance to live.

episode.title: Boiled to Death! Oden's One-hour Struggle!
episode.english: Boiled to Death! Oden's One-hour Struggle!
episode.japanese: Kamayude no Kei – Oden Kesshi no Ichijikan
episode.transliteration: 釜茹での刑 おでん決死の一時間
episode.summary: Having been defeated by Kaido, Oden is captured and sentenced to be executed in the middle of the Flower Capital. Orochi and Kaido decides to boil him and his subordinates in hot oil, Oden proposes a challenge, that if one of them survives in the hot oil for one hour, the rest of them should be set free. Kaido agrees to the challenge, and Oden rushes into the boiling vessel of oil. He holds a plank up for the Akazaya Nine to sit on. The crowd watching the execution criticize Oden, but Shinobu reveals that Oden danced naked in the streets in order to save 100 people from being kidnapped with each dance. The kidnapped civilians were used as laborers to manufacture weapons, leaving the crowd shocked.

episode.title: Oden Wouldn't Be Oden If It Wasn't Boiled!
episode.english: Oden Wouldn't Be Oden If It Wasn't Boiled!
episode.japanese: 〝Niete Nanbo no Oden ni Sōrō〟
episode.transliteration: 〝煮えてなんぼのおでんに候〟
episode.summary: Oden manages to survive for over an hour, which enrages Orochi. The latter tells his men to shoot and kill Oden, breaking the promise. Oden manages to throw his scabbards off of the execution platform before being shot and killed by Kaido.

episode.title: The Castle on Fire! The Fate of the Kozuki Clan!
episode.english: The Castle on Fire! The Fate of the Kozuki Clan!
episode.japanese: Moeru Shiro! Kōzuki no Ichizoku no Unmei!
episode.transliteration: 燃える城！光月の一族の運命！
episode.summary: The Akazaya Nine rush towards the Kuri Castle to protect Momonosuke and Lady Toki. After Kaido threatens Momonosuke and leaves the castle to burn, Toki sends Kin'emon, Kanjuro, Kikunojo, Raizo, and Momonosuke 20 years into the future. Kawamatsu escapes the burning castle with Hiyori. Shortly after, Toki is shot and killed after delivering inspiring words to onlookers.

episode.title: Back to the Present Day! 20 Years Later!
episode.english: Back to the Present Day! 20 Years Later!
episode.japanese: Futatabi Genzai! Nijū-nen no Toki o Koete
episode.transliteration: 再び現在！二十年の時をこえて
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Tasuku ShimayaStoryboarded by : Tasuku Shimaya & Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: Denjiro is enraged with Oden and Toki's deaths to the point where his face becomes unrecognizable. He takes on the alias "Kyoshiro" and starts the Kyoshiro family to get close with Orochi in the Flower Capital. It is also revealed that Denjiro is "Ushimitsu Kozo" who steals money from the Capital and distributes it to the poor. After running away from Kawamatsu, Hiyori meets Denjiro and agrees to take on the alias "Komurasaki" for the next 20 years. A few months before the present day, Orochi receives a letter from a Kurozumi spy that informs him about the return of the Akazaya Nine sent through time.

episode.title: The Sea Is For Pirates! Raid! To Onigashima!
episode.english: The Sea Is For Pirates! Raid! To Onigashima!
episode.japanese: Umi wa Kaizoku! Uchiiri! Iza Onigashima
episode.transliteration: 海は海賊！討入り！いざ鬼ヶ島
episode.summary: No allies have to come to aid the raid on Onigashima so the Akazaya Nine jump on a rowboat to get to Onigashima. Kikunojo tells that there must be a traitor amongst them. Kanjuro reveals himself to be the traitor. Three Beasts Pirates galleon come to attack all. Kanjuro is decapitated by Kin'emon only to reveal that it was a drawing. Kanjuro captures Momonosuke. Luffy, Law and Kid arrive.

episode.title: The Worst Generation Charges in! The Battle of the Stormy Sea!
episode.english: The Worst Generation Charges in! The Battle of the Stormy Sea!
episode.japanese: Saiaku no Sedai Shingeki! Arashi no Umi no Tatakai
episode.transliteration: 最悪の世代進撃！嵐の海の戦い
episode.summary: A naval battle between the Beasts Pirates and the alliance ensues. It is revealed that the Thousand Sunny withstood the bombing attacks the day prior, which surprises the Gifters. Luffy, Law, and Kid destroy one of the opposing ships together in an attempt to assert dominance over one another. Meanwhile, Kyoshiro arrives and destroys one of the Beast Pirate ships much to everyone's surprise.

episode.title: Good Luck?! Leader Kin'emon's Plot!
episode.english: Good Luck?! Leader Kin'emon's Plot!
episode.japanese: Kyōun!? Rīdā Kin'emon no Ikkei
episode.transliteration: 強運!? リーダー錦えもんの一計
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Toshihiro MaeyaStoryboarded by : Toshinori Fukuzawa
episode.summary: After destroying the Beast Pirates' ships, Kyoshiro reveals his real identity as Denjiro, one of Kozuki Oden's retainers. He then corrects that Kin'emon's mistaken Habu port for Tokage port. He also says that every samurai has safely arrived at their destination, totaling 5400 allies for the war. Although Kawamatsu swims back to shore to confront Kanjuro, he manages to get away, flying away with Momonosuke.

episode.title: A Tearful Promise! The Kidnapped Momonosuke!
episode.english: A Tearful Promise! The Kidnapped Momonosuke!
episode.japanese: Namida no Yakusoku! Sarawareta Momonosuke
episode.transliteration: 涙の約束！さらわれたモモの助
episode.summary: After clashing with Usopp and Sanji, Kanjuro flies away with the kidnapped Momonosuke. After Momonosuke gave a heart touching speech, the Beast Pirates starts attacking the samurai's ships from a distance and sink it one by one. Suddenly, the Beast Pirates' attacking ship was destroyed and to the Straw Hats' excitement the one who attacked the ship was revealed to be Jimbei who finally arrived in Wano.

episode.title: A New Member! 'First Son of the Sea' Jimbei!
episode.english: A New Member! 'First Son of the Sea' Jimbei!
episode.japanese: Arata na Nakama! Kaikyō no Jinbē!
episode.transliteration: 新たな仲間！海侠のジンベエ！
episode.summary: Jimbei arrives in Onigashima and joins the Straw Hat Pirates. The Akazaya Nine and Law make their plan while the Straw Hats attack the guards at the Torii gate.

episode.title: Kaido's Trump Card! The Tobi Roppo Appear!
episode.english: Kaido's Trump Card! The Tobi Roppo Appear!
episode.japanese: Kaidō no Kirifuda – Tobi Roppō Tōjō
episode.transliteration: カイドウの切り札 飛び六胞登場
episode.summary: The Straw Hats enter Onigashima's torii gate and defeat the guards there. Queen begins the Golden Kagura festivities, and the Tobi Roppo meet to hear their captain's request. The Straw Hats set up to toast Jimbei joining, but after the Akazaya Nine and their other allies advance on Onigashima, they decide to wait to celebrate with everyone after they defeat Kaido, Orochi, and Big Mom.

episode.title: The Samurai Warriors' Earnestness! The Straw Hats Land at Onigashima!
episode.english: The Samurai Warriors' Earnestness! The Straw Hats Land at Onigashima!
episode.japanese: Samurai-tachi no Honki! Ichimi Onigashima Jōriku
episode.transliteration: 侍たちの本気！一味鬼ヶ島上陸
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Nanami MichibataStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: As the alliance and Kid Pirates reach Onigashima, Kin'emon uses his sorcery to everyone's clothes to blend in with the Beasts Pirates. He then gives a speech to the samurai to take advantage of their disguises and reach the castle for the final battle.

episode.title: Luffy Goes Out of Control?! Sneaking into Kaido's Banquet!
episode.english: Luffy Goes Out of Control?! Sneaking into Kaido's Banquet!
episode.japanese: Rufi Bōsō!? Sen'nyū Kaidō no Utage
episode.transliteration: ルフィ暴走!? 潜入カイドウの宴
episode.summary: Luffy, Zoro, and the Kid Pirates enter Onigashima through the main entrance whilst the rest of the Straw Hat Pirates joined with Shinobu and Carrot begin to take the mountain path. At the live floor, Luffy and Zoro are engraged by the obnoxious behavior of the Beast Pirates and their wasteful attitude towards food and drinks.

episode.title: Thinking of Otama! Luffy's Furious Strike!
episode.english: Thinking of Otama! Luffy's Furious Strike!
episode.japanese: O-Tama e no Omoi – Rufi Ikari no Ichigeki
episode.transliteration: お玉への思い ルフィ怒りの一撃
episode.summary: Luffy attacks nearby Beast Pirates while Zoro cuts through a tower to get to Luffy on the live floor, which causes a commotion. Together, they are enraged by the Beast Pirates wasting red bean soup when they reflect on the struggles of Otama.

episode.title: Fighting Music! An Ability That Harms Luffy!
episode.english: Fighting Music! An Ability That Harms Luffy!
episode.japanese: Tatakau Myūjikku! Rufi o Osou Nōryoku!
episode.transliteration: 戦う音楽！ルフィを襲う能力！
episode.summary: Luffy and Zoro attempt to escape the live floor and reach Kaido's castle when they are stopped by Scratchmen Apoo. After being overpowered by Apoo's music ability, Kid arrives to punch Apoo for betraying their former alliance.

episode.title: His Dream Broken?! The Trap That Lures Sanji!
episode.english: His Dream Broken?! The Trap That Lures Sanji!
episode.japanese: Yume Yabureru!? Sanji o Izanau Wana!
episode.transliteration: 夢やぶれる!? サンジを誘う罠！
episode.summary: Kid confronts Apoo about betraying their alliance, but one of the Numbers, Haccha, comes to interfere. Kid's crew handles Haccha while Luffy, Zoro, Kid, and Killer escape the area and find out how to block Apoo's attacks. Big Mom's crew make their way up the falls and Kin'emon's group advance near the pleasure hall, although Sanji gets distracted and attempts to find women in there but fails. Who's Who wants to get rid of someone from the Tobi Roppo.

episode.title: Reinforcements Arrive! The Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates!
episode.english: Reinforcements Arrive! The Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates!
episode.japanese: Engun Tōchaku! Shirohige Kaizokudan Taichō!
episode.transliteration: 援軍到着！白ひげ海賊団隊長！
episode.summary: Sanji goes back in the pleasure hall to find women as Big Mom appears spotting Chopper in her sight. The Big Mom Pirates make it up the falls to be awaited by Marco the Phoenix who sends them back down the falls as Cat Viper and Izo see Marco. Kanjuro brings Momonosuke to Orochi, and Luffy and Zoro fight Kaido's underlings.

episode.title: The Pact Between Men! The Fierce Fighting of Brachio Tank!
episode.english: The Pact Between Men! The Fierce Fighting of Brachio Tank!
episode.japanese: Otoko no Chikai! Gekitō Burakio Tanku
episode.transliteration: 漢の誓い！激闘ブラキオタンク
episode.summary: Chopper and Usopp attempt to escape Big Mom, but instead battle her inside the Brachio Tank, helping Kin'emon's group move on. Meanwhile, Marco, Izo, and Cat Viper head to Onigashima while Denjiro fools Sasaki and chains him to a tree. Prometheus catches Nami's group and chases them while Ulti and Page One crash down the stairs and make contact with Luffy.

episode.title: Thunder Bagua! Here Comes Kaido's Son!
episode.english: Thunder Bagua! Here Comes Kaido's Son!
episode.japanese: Raimei Hakke! Tōjō Kaidō no Musuko
episode.transliteration: 雷鳴八卦！登場カイドウの息子
episode.summary: Kanjuro brings Momonosuke to Orochi and Kaido and informs them of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance advancing to Onigashima. Orochi decides to hold Momonosuke's execution in order to break the alliance's spirits. Usopp and Chopper continue to distract Big Mom as Kin'emon's group continue onwards. Luffy fights Ulti and Page One until Yamato appears and knocks out Ulti with one hit. He then picks up Luffy and runs away while revealing that he is Kaido's son.

episode.title: Enemy or Ally? Luffy and Yamato!
episode.english: Enemy or Ally? Luffy and Yamato!
episode.japanese: Teki ka? Mikata ka? Rufi to Yamato
episode.transliteration: 敵か？味方か？ルフィとヤマト
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Yusuke SuzukiStoryboarded by : Shigeyasu Yamauchi
episode.summary: Perospero arrives at Onigashima to stop the Emperor's alliance and revenge against Luffy, King, and Marco. Big Mom corners Usopp and Chopper until Prometheus calls her because he found Nami's group. Orochi begins Momonosuke's execution as some of the alliance watch on. Luffy questions Yamato's motive and attacks him, who blocks Luffy's attacks. When Luffy attacks Yamato with Red Hawk, it reminds him of his battle against Ace who came to Wano for Kaido's head.

episode.title: Desire to be Oden! Yamato's Dream!
episode.english: Desire to be Oden! Yamato's Dream!
episode.japanese: Oden ni Naritai – Yamato no Omoi
episode.transliteration: おでんになりたい ヤマトの思い
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Toshihiro MaeyaStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima & Aya Komaki
episode.summary: Orochi continues with speech about defeating the Kozuki and how their final heir and retainers were sent 20 years into future for revenge. Robin, Jimbei, and the samurai in disguise are forced to wait for a chance to rescue Momonosuke as Orochi thinks of a way to execute him. The Heart Pirates and remaining Akazaya Nine arrive at Onigashima just as Cat Viper, Marco, and Izo arrive as well. Kaido arrives at the Performance Floor to announce the New Onigashima Project. Meanwhile, Yamato manages convince Luffy to listen to him and revealed he witness Oden's execution, read his journal, and took on his name to continue his dream of opening Wano up. Yamato then removed his mask, revealing that he's actually a girl and how Luffy reminds her of Ace, shocking Luffy.

episode.title: Explosive?! The Handcuffs that Shackle Yamato's Freedom!
episode.english: Explosive?! The Handcuffs that Shackle Yamato's Freedom!
episode.japanese: Bakuhatsu!? Yamato no Jiyū o Shibaru Jō!
episode.transliteration: 爆発!? ヤマトの自由を縛る錠！
episode.summary: Yamato tells Luffy how Ace came to Wano for Kaido's head and mentioned Luffy a lot. She also revealed that she wanted to join him on his adventures but couldn't due to the exploding handcuffs on her by Kaido. Law separates from the Akazaya Nine and Izo as they are confronted by Kanjuro and the Beasts Pirates. Prometheus continues to chase Nami, Carrot, Shinobu, and Zeus using the new Homies to capture them as Big Mom grabs Zeus. Kaido reveals his intentions to collect the Ancient Weapons and allied with Big Mom, who arrives at the Performance Floor, due to the World Government's intent to go to war with the Four Emperors after abolishing the Seven Warlords of the Sea.

episode.title: The Akazaya Face-off! Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro!
episode.english: The Akazaya Face-off! Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro!
episode.japanese: Akazaya Ikkiuchi – Kikunojō tai Kanjūrō
episode.transliteration: 赤鞘一騎打ち 菊之丞VSカン十郎
episode.summary: The alliance in the Performance Floor are shocked by Big Mom's appearance and her capture of Nami's group. She and Kaido mention the purpose of their alliance is to acquire the One Piece and Ancient Weapons to bring fear and war. When Kaido mentions building more factories in the Flower Capital, Orochi refuses due to the vengeance he wants for the Kurozumi clan. Kaido cuts Orochi's head off his body, shocking everyone and Luffy decides to go rescue Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Kiku and Kanjuro continue their battle with Kanjuro using their past against her, saying it was all an act. Accepting that the Kanjuro she knew will never return, Kiku defeats him and the Akazaya Nine and Izo continue on with their mission. Meanwhile, Kaido gives Orochi's subordinates an ultimatum: either join him or die. He also mentions turning Wano into a pirate empire for the war, relocating Onigashima to the Flower Capital, and make Yamato the new shogun of New Onigashima. Angered by this news, Yamato makes a shortcut for her and Luffy to use to reach Kaido.

episode.title: Raid! Inheriting Oden's Will
episode.english: Raid! Inheriting Oden's Will
episode.japanese: Uchiiri! Uketsugu Oden no Ishi
episode.transliteration: 討入り！受け継ぐおでんの意志
episode.summary: Orochi's subordinates decide to join Kaido who asks Momonosuke the same question he asked 20 years ago. Momonosuke answers the question this time and Kaido prepares to execute him. Luffy removes Yamato's handcuffs which explodes, sending to them flying into Performance Floor and blowing away Big Mom and some the Beasts Pirates. Angry that Kaido really gonna kill him, Yamato denounces him as her father and prepares to attack him. However, she is stopped by Luffy due to the Akazaya Nine and Izo arriving. They then bypass the Lead Performers and knock Kaido off the stage, injuring him.

episode.title: Onigashima in Tumult! Luffy's All-Out War Begins!
episode.english: Onigashima in Tumult! Luffy's All-Out War Begins!
episode.japanese: Onigashima Gekidō – Rufi Zenmen Sensō Kaishi
episode.transliteration: 鬼ヶ島激動 ルフィ全面戦争開始
episode.summary: Due to their Ryuo, the Akazaya Nine's weapons pierce Kaido in several places, and he falls off the stage. The allies samurai remove their disguise. Ulti confronts Yamato, who makes official her departure from the Beasts Pirates, saying she doesn't care if Kaido dies. Big Mom finds Luffy and says she will kill him. Trafalgar Law follows through Kaidou's castle, and Who's-Who stops chasing Yamato to resolve other business. Shinobu tries to approach Momonosuke without being noticed. Nami and Carrot escape from the Homies with a combined electric attack, and Nami retrieves Zeus. Luffy says he didn't come just to defeat Kaido, but to finish him, Big Mom, and Orochi and his subordinates.

episode.title: The Battle Under the Moon! The Berserker, Sulong the Moon Lion!
episode.english: The Battle Under the Moon! The Berserker, Sulong the Moon Lion!
episode.japanese: Gekka no Tatakai – Kyōsenshi “Sūron”
episode.transliteration: 月下の戦い 狂戦士“月の獅子”
episode.summary: When the alliance, Kidd Pirates, Marco, and Perospero begin to overrun Kaido's castle, Queen calls off the banquet and tells the Beasts Pirates to counter the raid. Kaido transforms into his dragon form and fly outside to the roof with Akazaya Nine riding on him. The Minks and Jack, Nangi, and soldiers join their battle with the Minks transforming into their Sulong forms and clash with Jack in his mammoth form and defeat Nangi and soldiers. Cat Viper and Dogstorm would then begin to transform into their Sulong forms as well.

episode.title: Zeus' Treason?! The Cornered Nami!
episode.english: Zeus' Treason?! The Cornered Nami!
episode.japanese: Zeusu no Hangyaku!? Nami Zettai Zetsumei!
episode.transliteration: ゼウスの反逆!? ナミ絶体絶命！
episode.summary: Shinobu tries to rescue Momonosuke but gets caught by King, who prepares to kill Momonosuke until Sanji rescues him and tosses him to Shinobu. King then sends Sanji through a building and Luffy tells Yamato to protect Momonosuke while he deals with Big Mom. Big Mom launches a powerful attack that Luffy dodges and almost kills Sasaki, but frees him the tree he was chained to. She then goes after Nami, who still has Zeus and retrieved him to prepare an attack strike her down. But Franky and Brook arrive with Brook slicing Zeus in half and Franky running over Big Mom's face with the back wheel of the Kurosai FR-U IV, sending her to the floor.

episode.title: I'll Protect You! Yamato Meets Momonosuke!
episode.english: I'll Protect You! Yamato Meets Momonosuke!
episode.japanese: Kimi o Mamoru – Kaikō Yamato to Momonosuke
episode.transliteration: 君を守る 邂逅ヤマトとモモの助
episode.summary: While everyone is surprised by Franky running over Big Mom, Luffy prepares to go to the roof. Usopp and Chopper try to escape from Jaki, Goki, and Juki but no avail. Yamato knocks Ulti away and reaches Momonosuke and Shinobu, who learn from Luffy that she is an ally. However, he calls himself Oden, they run away. Big Mom wakes up in anger and Franky prepares to fire a Radical Beam at her but is surprised when the Numbers, who are revealed to be failed recreations of the Ancient Giants, arrive. Noticing Jaki carrying the Brachio Tank V, Franky fires the Radical Beam at him. Taking advantage of the situation, Big Mom attempts to attack Franky but is stopped by Jimbei and Robin, who sends her rolling out of the castle. Franky tells Usopp and Chopper that its time combine while Luffy looks up at the hole to the roof, telling Kin'emon to wait for him.

episode.title: Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hats Come Together!
episode.english: Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hats Come Together!
episode.japanese: Attōteki Senryoku! Mugiwara no Ichimi Shūketsu
episode.transliteration: 圧倒的戦力！麦わらの一味集結
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Kōhei KuretaStoryboarded by : Aya Komaki & Kōhei Kureta
episode.animatedBy: Yong-Ce Tu, Midori Matsuda & Keiichi Ichikawa
episode.summary: Marco and Perospero spot Big Mom rolling out of the Sky Dome. Sasaki is freed from the tree and prepares to go after Denjiro. Jack overpowers the Minks until Cat Viper and Dogstorm transform into their Sulong forms and attack him. Luffy and Zoro attempt to get to the roof but are stopped by Queen while Franky defeats Jaki. The Straw Hats gather together after defeating some of the Beasts Pirates soldiers. Luffy asks everyone to back them up as he makes another attempt to get up to the roof.

episode.title: A Risky Invitation! A Plot to Eliminate Queen!
episode.english: A Risky Invitation! A Plot to Eliminate Queen!
episode.japanese: Kiken na Sasoi! Kuīn Massatsu Keikaku
episode.transliteration: 危険な誘い！クイーン抹殺計画
episode.summary: X Drake watches the alliance take on the Beasts Pirates and thinks back to Koby telling him how Luffy draws people in. He tells Hawkins it's the best time to turncoat, but Hawkins refuses and predicts someone only has 1% chance of surviving until tomorrow. King contacts the Tobi Roppo and tells them to prevent the intruders from reaching the roof. Who's Who asks Drake to help him kill Queen. The samurai clash with the Mimawarigumi and the Orochi Oniwabanshu while Zoro and Jimbei save them from Goki's attack. Meanwhile, Drake and Who's Who confront Queen only for Drake to be attacked by them with Hawkins revealing his prediction was for Drake. They question Drake's objectives due to him letting Law escape, but he escapes from them and defeats Juki as Luffy defeats Goki. Noticing each other, Drake asks Luffy to fight alongside him.

episode.title: A New Rivalry! Nami and Ulti!
episode.english: A New Rivalry! Nami and Ulti!
episode.japanese: Arata na Innen! Nami to Uruti!
episode.transliteration: 新たな因縁！ナミとうるティ！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Toshihiro MaeyaStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: Before Luffy can answer, Zoro attacks Drake and tells Luffy not to trust him with Franky and Jimbei agreeing as well. However, Luffy lets him join despite his crew's protest and runs to the castle with Sanji. Page One and Ulti defeat a horde of samurai and try to attack Luffy before being stopped by Usopp and Nami. Apoo attacks Luffy and Sanji but its ineffective due to them covering their ears. Haccha arrives to help and goes after the General Franky while carrying Jaki. Zoro continues to clash with Drake and questions his true identity until Apoo tries to summon more Numbers. They attack him together, but Apoo dodges and Zoro accepts Drake's alliance due to their mutual dislike of Apoo. They attack Apoo together until Queen shoots at them and the samurai, who are affected by the bullets which causes ice to appear on their bodies.

episode.title: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!
episode.english: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!
episode.japanese: Hisō no Yaiba! Akazaya tai Kaidō Futatabi
episode.transliteration: 悲壮の刃！赤鞘VSカイドウ再び
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Nanami MichibataStoryboarded by : Masahiro Hosoda, Nanami Michibata & Tatsuya Nagamine
episode.summary: The samurai shot by Queen continue to freeze over and turn into ogres, attacking their own comrades who turn into demons as well. Queen fires more bullets at the samurai and even some of the Beasts Pirates. Yamato is still chasing after Momonosuke and Shinobu to convince them she is their ally. The Minks continue to battle Jack and his squad until Cat Viper and Dogstorm are only ones left standing, forcing Kaido to step in. Perospero finds Big Mom and is forced to end his alliance with Marco since the alliance with Kaido was her idea. She then battles Marco as Carrot reaches them and looks at the moon. Luffy and Sanji continue on to the roof as the Akazaya Nine battle Kaido.

episode.title: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Oden's Secret Swordplay!
episode.english: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Oden's Secret Swordplay!
episode.japanese: Uketsugishi Waza – Sakuretsu Oden no Hiken
episode.transliteration: 受け継ぎし技 炸裂おでんの秘剣
episode.summary: Queen continues to turn the samurai into ogres while Yamato continues to chase after Momonosuke and Shinobu. The Akazaya Nine battle Kaido but are overwhelmed by his strength. Kin'emon remembers a time when Oden offered to teach them his Oden Two-Sword Style, but they declined. The Akazaya Nine rally together and their attacks begin to injure Kaido, who wonders why and is surprised to see an image of Oden when Kin'emon, Denjiro, Ashura, and Dogstorm cut him in his scar using their master's sword style.

episode.title: The Power of Ice Oni! A New Version of the Plague Rounds!
episode.english: The Power of Ice Oni! A New Version of the Plague Rounds!
episode.japanese: 「Kōri Oni」no Iryoku! Arata na Ekisaito Dan
episode.transliteration: 「氷鬼」の威力！新たな疫災弾
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Shō InuzukaStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: As more samurais continue to turn into ogres by Queen's new plague, Ice Oni, Sanji and Jimbei defeat more of the Beasts Pirates so Luffy could save his strength for Kaido. In the Flower Capital, the citizens contiune to celebrate the Fire Festival while still clinging the belief that the Kozuki clan will save them. On the Skull Dome's rooftop, Kaido has fallen and the Akazaya Nine attempt to finish him off but he gets back up, telling them their attacks were too shallow to reopen his wound. He then unleashes a roar of wind scythes, one of which cuts off Kikunojo's left arm.

episode.title: I Won't Forgive Him! Chopper's Determination!
episode.english: I Won't Forgive Him! Chopper's Determination!
episode.japanese: Yurusanē! Choppā no Ketsui!
episode.transliteration: 許さねェ！チョッパーの決意！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Ryōsuke TanakaStoryboarded by : Ryōsuke Tanaka & Tatsuya Nagamine
episode.summary: Yamato is still chasing after Momonosuke and Shinobu who are being watched by Bao Huang and reports their location to King. She then informs the rest of the crew to bring Momo's head in order break the samurai's will. Sasaki encounters Shinobu and Momonosuke and has his Armored Corps fire at them. However, Shinobu dodges the assault and counters while Momonosuke to no avail until Yamato protects them. Queen continues to spread the Ice Oni, infecting friend and foe alike. Luffy, Sanji, and Jimbei contiune to the roof while defeating Headliners who cross their path. Dogstorm orders his men to get away from the roof as Kin'emon cauterize Kikunojo's severed arm. Kaido changes back into his human form and continues the fight against the Akazaya Nine.

episode.title: Zoro's Pursuit! Ice Oni Tag!
episode.english: Zoro's Pursuit! Ice Oni Tag!
episode.japanese: Zoro no Tsuigeki! Kōri Oni in Onigokko
episode.transliteration: ゾロの追撃！氷鬼in鬼ゴッコ
episode.summary: As Queen spreads Ice Oni, he gives Apoo the only known antidote and starts a game for it where everyone chase after Apoo to claim the antidote or everyone infected dies within an hour. Dogstorm and Cat Viper revert to their base forms after being knocked back by Kaido. Yamato reveals to Momonosuke and Shinobu that she was at Oden's execution and was inspired by Shinobu's speech as well as Oden's life. The Armored Corps fires at them again with Yamato taking the hit while also revealing that she rushed to Kuri Castle to save Momonosuke but couldn't do anything to help him. He knocks out one of Sasaki's men and formally introduces himself to Momonosuke and Shinobu.

episode.title: Nami Surrenders?! Ulti's Fierce Headbutt!
episode.english: Nami Surrenders?! Ulti's Fierce Headbutt!
episode.japanese: Nami Kōfuku!? Uruti no Mō-zutsuki
episode.transliteration: ナミ降伏!? うるティの猛頭突き
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Tasuku ShimayaStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima & Tasuku Shimaya
episode.summary: Marco clashes with Big Mom but is caught by her while Perospero prepares to shoot him. Apoo battles Zoro and Drake to protect the antidote. Chopper becomes infected with the Ice Oni. Nami and Usopp continue to run away from Ulti and Page One until they are forced to fight. They are overwhelmed by the siblings who demand to hear that Luffy will never become King of the Pirates. Nami states that he will be, angering Ulti who prepares to headbutt Nami before being attacked by Komachiyo with Tama riding on his back.

episode.title: Sasaki's Onslaught! Armored Division vs. Yamato!
episode.english: Sasaki's Onslaught! Armored Division vs. Yamato!
episode.japanese: Sasaki no Mōkō – Sōkōbutai tai Yamato
episode.transliteration: ササキの猛攻 装甲部隊VSヤマト
episode.summary: Carrot hesitates to transform but after support from Wanda, they both transform into their Sulong forms and attack Perospero. Big Mom tosses Marco, who is caught by Carrot and Wanda, aside to go back inside the castle. Marco follow suit and is surprised by the Ice Onis while Carrot and Wanda deal with Perospero. Page One rescues Ulti from Komachiyo and attacks Usopp, who lands on Komachiyo's back during its escape. Tama reveals she arrived on the island by the enemy's ship and tells Hihimaru to hold off Page One and Ulti for three minutes. Yamato continues to blow away Sasaki's Armored Division while protect Momonosuke and Shinobu at the same time. When Sasaki prepares to join the battle, Yamato begins to transform until Franky arrives with Hatcha, who destroys the floor. As Yamato escapes with Momonosuke and Shinobu, she knocks out Hatcha while Franky confronts Sasaki and his Armored Division. As he runs with Momonosuke and Shinobu in his arms, Yamato tells Momonosuke to live because she believes he is the one who will lead the world to the new dawn.

episode.title: Eliminate the Ice Oni! Chopper's Fire Trick!
episode.english: Eliminate the Ice Oni! Chopper's Fire Trick!
episode.japanese: Kōri Oni o Yabure – Choppā no Hisaku!
episode.transliteration: 氷鬼を破れ チョッパーの火策！
episode.summary: Law finds a Poneglyph while thinking back to when Corazon told him about D. and telling Robin his true name. He continues to look for the Road Poneglyph in order to learn D.'s true meaning. More Ice Onis are being created while Zoro and Drake battle Apoo for the cure. Big Mom arrives to the Performance Floor to reunite with Kaido who easily overwhelms the Akazaya Nine, and Kid gathers a ton of metal to use against him. Zoro notices Kiku's servered arm falling from the floor and begins cutting the Ice Onis down in rage before defeating Apoo. He gives the cure to Chopper who uses fire to slow the symptoms down. Luffy, Sanji, and Jimbei are about to reach the third floor when Sanji hears a woman in trouble.

episode.title: It's Not Okay! The Spider Lures Sanji!
episode.english: It's Not Okay! The Spider Lures Sanji!
episode.japanese: Yokanē yo!! Sanji o Sasou Kumo
episode.transliteration: よかねェよ!! サンジを誘う蜘蛛
episode.animatedBy: Keita Saitō, Masahiro Kitazaki & Shigenori Taniguchi
episode.summary: Sanji goes to rescue the woman in trouble only to end up in a trap set by Black Maria. Luffy and Jimbei take a shortcut to the fourth floor provided to them by the former Udon prisoners, dodging two more Headliners in the process. Kin'emon tries to battle Kaido but his sent flying. Marco arrives at the Performance Stage to help the Straw Hats while Yamato attempts to escape the island with Momonosuke and Shinobu only to learn that Kaido has raised Onigashima into the air with his power.

episode.title: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!
episode.english: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!
episode.japanese: Gyakuten no Itte! Fushichō Maruko no Honō
episode.transliteration: 逆転の一手！不死鳥マルコの炎
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Toshihiro MaeyaStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: Marco uses his phoenix flames to slowdown the Ice Oni's spread on its victims, making them regain their senses temporarily. Chopper begins to make the cure while X Drake and the alliance protect him from Apoo and the Beasts Pirates. Jimbei stays behind to fight Who's Who while Luffy goes ahead. Franky battles Sasaki, who transforms, and his Armored Division. Page One and Ulti defeat Hihimaru and begin to search for Nami and Usopp. Yamato takes Momonosuke and Shinobu to a storage room to hide and Momonosuke asks about the broken dragon statue. Yamato reveals that her friend who came to Wano to kill Kaido several years ago did it.

episode.title: Yamato's Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!
episode.english: Yamato's Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!
episode.japanese: Yamato no Kako – Yonkō no Kubi o Nerau Otoko
episode.transliteration: ヤマトの過去 四皇の首を狙う男
episode.summary: Sanji tries to escape Black Maria only to be captured by her again. Jimbei takes down some of Who's Who's subordinates who reveals to Jimbei that were once allies when he was Warlord. Yamato treats Shinobu and tells Momonosuke how Ace came to Onigashima to rescue the abducted children and take Kaido's head. However, he was confronted by Yamato who revealed that the Beasts Pirates went on an expedition and that he is Kaido's son. As the Spade Pirates take the children back to their parents, Ace stays behind to battle Yamato and learns the reason why she cannot leave the island. However, Ace tells him otherwise which causes Yamato to destroy the dragon statue at the gate and Ace punches the statue to take responsibility. They then share a bottle of sake and Ace tells Yamato about the up-and-coming pirates that's appearing but tells him that his brother will be the greatest. Momonosuke is surprised that another pirate appeared to help Wano and that Kaido is Yamato's father. He also learns from Yamato that Ace is dead but that he was waiting for Luffy, who has inherited his will. Elsewhere, Tama reveals her history with Ace to Nami and how ungently Luffy told her he had died. Nami apologizes and reveals to Tama how Ace's death was painful for Luffy as well.

episode.title: Marco's Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!
episode.english: Marco's Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!
episode.japanese: Maruko no Namida! Shirohige Kaizokudan no Kizuna
episode.transliteration: マルコの涙！白ひげ海賊団の絆
episode.summary: The samurai defend Chopper as he makes the antidote and Marco restores more Ice Oni victims. Queen orders the Beasts Pirates, who are reluctant at first, to attack Marco to no avail. Marco turns into a phoenix and takes Zoro to the roof while thinking back to when Ace wanted to go save Wano but couldn't then. Meanwhile, Tama learns that Luffy and Ace are brothers and regrets for what she said to Luffy earlier but is reassured by Nami and Usopp. Momonosuke is also surprised to learn of Ace's heritage and that it must fate that he chose Luffy to help him. Marco holds King and Queen back while he throws Zoro up to the roof. The Musketeers defend the entrance to the roof until Luffy arrives and heads up after defeating a group of the Beasts Pirates. Big Mom tells Kaido not to kill Robin as they need her and they argue when she asks about the Road Ponegliff. She reminds Kaido of his life debt of her giving him the mythical Fish-Fish Fruit the same day Rocks fell. However, Kaidou brushes her off and says that they can talk about it all they want once they find the One Piece.

episode.title: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!
episode.english: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!
episode.japanese: Mugiwara no Rufi – Kaizoku Ō ni Naru Otoko
episode.transliteration: 麦わらのルフィ 海賊王になる男
episode.summary: Yamato shows Momonosuke his father's journal and tells him how she found it. She reveals that Whitebeard, Roger, and Oden predicted that the next generation of pirates would advance to the New World. She also thought Ace would lead the charge due to his death, she recalled him telling her about Luffy and his dream. Yamato tells Ace that another person that knew Oden had the same exact dream. She then gives Ace her Vivre Card and that they will meet again through it. However, this would be their final meeting as Ace died at Marineford and Yamato decided to wait for Luffy. In the present, Yamato gives Oden's journal to Momonosuke and explains how Oden predicted the next group of pirates would defeat Kaido in his stead. Luffy, Zoro, Law, Kid, and Killer reach the roof and confront Kaido and Big Mom. Luffy walks past them to check on the Akazaya Nine and Kin'emon asks him to save Wano before Law teleports them away. Kaido attacks Luffy but he dodges and knocks Kaido down with Red Roc, shocking Big Mom. He then introduces himself as the one who will surpass the two of them and become the King of the Pirates.

episode.title: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!
episode.english: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!
episode.japanese: Kaibutsu Kessen! Iji Hariau San Senchō
episode.transliteration: 怪物決戦！意地張りあう三船長
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Yasunori KoyamaStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: Kaido attacks Luffy, who barely dodges and is pleased, especially after seeing the shadows of those who were capable of fighting him behind Luffy. Big Mom attempts to attack Luffy with Prometheus but Zoro cuts it in half using Foxfire Style while Kaido attempts to attack a distracted Luffy. However, Law rescues Luffy and they argue with each other with Kid joining in. Big Mom fires Heavenly Bon-Bons at the three captains who refused to dodge due to Luffy's game. Zoro and Killer attack Kaido as Luffy, Law, and Kid get back up and prepare to attack. Meanwhile, Sanji attempts to escape Black Maria's Pleasure Hall but is unable to attack them and refuses to her about Robin.

episode.title: A Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!
episode.english: A Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!
episode.japanese: Ōwaza Renpatsu! Saiaku no Sedai no Mōkō!
episode.transliteration: 大技連発！最悪の世代の猛攻！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Kōhei Kureta & Nanami MichibataStoryboarded by : Satoshi Itō, Tatsuya Nagamine, Henry Thurlow, Nanami Michibata & Katsumi Ishizuka
episode.summary: Luffy, Kid, and Law attack Kaido, who's enjoying the battle, with their respective techniques. He turns back into his dragon form and Big Mom joins him, revealing they intend to take everything from the Worst Generation and be one step closer to becoming King of the Pirates. Kaido attacks with Demolition Gust but everyone dodges it with Luffy, Kid, and Law counterattacking and injuring him. Killer attempts to attack Kaido but is stopped by Big Mom, allowing Luffy to use this opening to kick Kaido in the face. However, Kaido prepares to fire at Luffy until Zoro cuts his attack and only grazes Kaido's cheek when Big Mom warned him. While Kaido wonders why he senses Oden's presence in the sword, Big Mom strikes everyone with lightning but is surprised when doesn't affect Luffy. Kaido fires another Bolo Breath at him but is also surprised when that doesn't affect Luffy either and gets hit by Kong Gatling.

episode.title: Kaido Laughs! The Emperors of the Sea vs. New Generation!
episode.english: Kaido Laughs! The Emperors of the Sea vs. New Generation!
episode.japanese: Warau Kaidō! Yonkō tai Shin Sedai!
episode.transliteration: 笑うカイドウ！四皇VS新世代！
episode.summary: Luffy continues to hit Kaido with Kong Gatling and knock him into the roof with everybody in the Skull Dome noticing the vibrations. Luffy attempts to land one more hit, but Fourth Gear wears off and Big Mom tries attacks him until Zoro rescues him. Law hits Big Mom with Counter Shock while Kid and Killer charge at Kaido, who gets back up and uses Tatsumaki to blow everyone away and eats Luffy. Zoro uses his own Tatsumaki to free Luffy and cut through Kaido's scales. Kaido finally deduces that Zoro was using Oden's sword, as the pain and strange Haki felt similar. He decides to challenge Zoro using Tatsumaki Demolition Gust, which everyone tries to dodge. He then changes into his hybrid form, which surprises the Worst Generation, and tells Big Mom that this battle has started to get fun, which she agrees with. Meanwhile, CP0 is revealed to be at the banquet and go over the battlefield, hoping the pirates wipe each other out after losing their business partner, Orochi.

episode.title: Otama's Secret Plan! Operation Kibi Dango!
episode.english: Otama's Secret Plan! Operation Kibi Dango!
episode.japanese: Otama no Hisaku! Kibi Dango Dai Sakusen
episode.transliteration: お玉の秘策！きびだんご大作戦
episode.summary: A few hours before the raid, Tama told Speed to take her to Onigashima because she plans on bringing the Gifters under her control in order to help the alliance and makes a big bag of dumplings on the way. In the present, Speed, Gazelleman, and Daifugo pass out Millet Dumplings to the Gifters to bring them under Tama's control by telling them it's one of Queen's inventions. At the Performance Floor, while protecting Chopper, Hyogoro gets infected by a samaurai when Marco's flame wears off. Franky continues to battle Sasaki but is at a disadvantage until Nami, Usopp, and Tama arrive and take over the Armored Corps with the dumplings. This opening allows Franky to cut a confused Sasaki with his sword.

episode.title: Sanji's Scream! An SOS Echoes Over the Island!
episode.english: Sanji's Scream! An SOS Echoes Over the Island!
episode.japanese: Sanji Zekkyō! Shimajū ni Hibiku Esu Ō Esu
episode.transliteration: サンジ絶叫！島中に響くSOS
episode.summary: Sanji is captured by Black Maria. Perospero fights against Carrot and Wanda. The location of the Scabbards is found. The battle in Skull Dome continues as Chopper tries to create an antidote for the Ice Onis. Sanji screams for Robin to come save him.

episode.title: Spank Strikes! Sanji's Woman-trouble!
episode.english: Spank Strikes! Sanji's Woman-trouble!
episode.japanese: Supanku Sakutersu! Sanji no Jonan!
episode.transliteration: スパンク炸裂！サンジの女難！
episode.summary: Sanji is freed from Black Maria's webs by Brook and Robin and went to help the Scabbards. Yamato, Shinobu, and Momonosuke are spotted by a Mary in the storehouse and escape after battling many of Kaidou's officers. Carrot continues her battle against Perospero. Luffy, Kid, Law, Killer, and Zoro continue their fight against Kaidou and Big Mom on the Skull Dome's roof.

episode.title: No Regrets! Luffy and Boss, a Master-Disciple Bond!
episode.english: No Regrets! Luffy and Boss, a Master-Disciple Bond!
episode.japanese: Kui Nashi – Rufi to Oyabun Shitei no Kizuna
episode.transliteration: 悔いなし ルフィと親分師弟の絆
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Yusuke SuzukiStoryboarded by : Yusuke Suzuki & Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: The battle at the live floor of Skull Dome continues as Chopper creates and tries the antidote he created, While Marco holding back both King and Queen all by himself. Hyogoro, before completely transforming into an Ice Oni, asks Yatappe to kill him. While Law, Kid, Zoro and Killer continue their battle against Big Mom and Kaidou on the roof of Skull Dome, Luffy finishes regenerating his Haki and wakes up to help them.

episode.title: All Set! Chopperhage Nebulizer!
episode.english: All Set! Chopperhage Nebulizer!
episode.japanese: Junbi Ōkē! Chopafāji Neburaizā
episode.transliteration: 準備OK! チョパファージ霧砲（ネブライザー）
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Toshihiro MaeyaStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: Chopper's antidote is a success, and he spreads it across the Live Floor, curing everyone. Angered by this, Queen attempts to attack Chopper, but the Pleasures protect him after Queen insults them and the Waiters for being useless. Marco takes this opportunity to grab Queen by the neck, allowing Chopper to attack him and yells at everyone, who inwardly apologizes, that he isn't a raccoon. Meanwhile, in the Treasure Repository, the Akazaya Nine recover but are confused as to who tended to them and are surprised when Kozuki Oden appears before them.

episode.title: Oden Appears! The Confused Hearts of the Akazaya Members!
episode.english: Oden Appears! The Confused Hearts of the Akazaya Members!
episode.japanese: Oden Arawaru! Yureru Akazaya no Kokoro!
episode.transliteration: おでん現る！揺れる赤鞘の心！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Shō InuzukaStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: In the Right Brain Tower, Yamato and Shinobu continue to run and defeat the Beasts Pirates. When Shinobu tries to ease Momonosuke's mind, he feels disgusted with himself because he's weak while everyone overrates him and transforms into a dragon which surprises the two. In CP0's room, the leader thinks back to when Dr. Vegapunk created a failed Artificial Devil Fruit from Kaidou's Lineage Factor and hopes it was destroyed with Punk Hazard after it was left there. Meanwhile, the Akazaya Nine are happy to see Oden except for Ashura and Raizo, who see though Oden's lies who is revealed to be a drawing made by Kanjuro. Elsewhere, Momonosuke returns to normal and reveals that Luffy is worn out but still in high spirits. On the Skull Dome's roof, the Worst Generation are being pushed back by Kaidou and Big Mom, they decide to split them up in order to beat them.

episode.title: The Worst Generation Gets Wiped Out?! The Emperors' Deadly Attack!
episode.english: The Worst Generation Gets Wiped Out?! The Emperors' Deadly Attack!
episode.japanese: Saiaku no Sedai Zenmetsu!? Yonkō no Ōwaza!
episode.transliteration: 最悪の世代全滅!? 四皇の大技！
episode.summary: The Akazaya Nine fight off the fake Oden, with Ashura dying in the process. Dogstorm stays behind to fight Jack while the rest of them begin searching for Momonosuke. On the rooftop, the Emperors launch a joint attack, nearly taking out the Worst Generation, but Zoro is barely able to block the attack, allowing Luffy to fire back and note that Kaidou has resorted to dodging attacks.

episode.title: The Supernovas Strike Back! The Mission to Tear Apart the Emperors!
episode.english: The Supernovas Strike Back! The Mission to Tear Apart the Emperors!
episode.japanese: Chōshinsei Hangeki! Yonkō Bunkai Sakusen
episode.transliteration: 超新星反撃！四皇分解作戦
episode.animatedBy: Masahiro Kitazaki, Kimitaka Itō, Yong-Ce Tu & Toshio Deguchi
episode.summary: As the Akazaya Nine defeat Orochi, the Worst Generation continue battling the Emperors, successfully throwing Big Mom off the roof.

episode.title: Defend Luffy! Zoro and Law's Sword Technique!
episode.english: Defend Luffy! Zoro and Law's Sword Technique!
episode.japanese: Rufi o Mamore! Zoro to Rō no Kengi
episode.transliteration: ルフィを守れ！ゾロとローの剣技
episode.summary: Big Mom recovers from her fall, re-approaching Onigashima, while Kaidou and the Worst Generation continue to fight. Zoro manages to scar Kaidou, but both him and Law are defeated, and Luffy resolves to defeat the Emperor.

episode.title: Surpass the Emperor of the Sea! Luffy Strikes Back with an Iron Fist!
episode.english: Surpass the Emperor of the Sea! Luffy Strikes Back with an Iron Fist!
episode.japanese: Yonkō o Koero – Rufi Hangeki no Tekken
episode.transliteration: 四皇を超えろ ルフィ反撃の鉄拳
episode.summary: The Worst Generation and Emperors scatter across Onigashima, preparing for new fights. Kid prepares to battle Big Mom, Killer fights Hawkins, and Luffy fights Kaidou. Meanwhile, Nami, Tama, and Usopp return to the Live Floor, chased by Page One.

episode.title: A Faint Memory! Luffy and Red-Haired's Daughter Uta!
episode.english: A Faint Memory! Luffy and Red-Haired's Daughter Uta!
episode.japanese: Awai Kioku – Rufi to Akagami no Musume Uta
episode.transliteration: 淡い記憶 ルフィと赤髪の娘ウタ
episode.summary: Luffy meets Shanks and Uta for the first time, and the two children begin developing their friendship.

episode.title: A Pledge for the Next Genesis! Luffy and Uta!
episode.english: A Pledge for the Next Genesis! Luffy and Uta!
episode.japanese: Shin Jidai no Chikai! Rufi to Uta
episode.transliteration: 新時代の誓い！ルフィとウタ
episode.summary: After Shanks leaves on a trip, Uta doesn't return, much to Luffy's shock. At the same time, Elegia is mysteriously destroyed, seemingly due to Shanks.

episode.title: Nami Screams – A Deadly Death Race!
episode.english: Nami Screams – A Deadly Death Race!
episode.japanese: Nami Zekkyō – Zettai Zetsumei Desu Rēsu!
episode.transliteration: ナミ絶叫 絶体絶命デスレース！
episode.summary: Luffy and Kaidou resume their fight. Momonosuke, Shinobu, and Yamato wait for Kin'emon's help. Page One chases down Nami, Usopp, and Tama, but is defeated by an enraged Big Mom as retaliation for Okobore Town's destruction.

episode.title: The Dawn of the Land of Wano – The All-Out Battle Heats Up!
episode.english: The Dawn of the Land of Wano – The All-Out Battle Heats Up!
episode.japanese: Wano Kuni no Yoake – Zenmen Taiketsu Gekika!
episode.transliteration: ワノ国の夜明け 全面対決激化！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Tasuku ShimayaStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima & Tasuku Shimaya
episode.summary: The Nine Red Scabbards split up to help across Onigashima, with Cat Viper heading to Perospero. Yamato begins heading to the rooftop. Chopper continues fighting Queen, and Nami begins to fight Ulti.

episode.title: The Conclusion! Luffy, Accelerating Fist of the Supreme King
episode.english: The Conclusion! Luffy, Accelerating Fist of the Supreme King
episode.japanese: Ketchaku! Rufi Kasoku Suru Haō no Kobushi
episode.transliteration: 決着！ルフィ加速する覇王の拳
episode.animatedBy: Masahiro Kitazaki, Kimitaka Itō & Yong-Ce Tu
episode.summary: Sanji and Zoro head to the Live Floor, while Nami faces off against Ulti. Big Mom defeats the Tobiroppo member, allowing Nami and Usopp to escape. Luffy and Kaidou continue their fight, and Luffy falls off Onigashima, unconscious.

episode.title: Luffy, Defeated! The Straw Hats in Jeopardy?!
episode.english: Luffy, Defeated! The Straw Hats in Jeopardy?!
episode.japanese: Rufi Haiboku! Mugiwara no Ichimi Kyūchi!?
episode.transliteration: ルフィ敗北！麦わらの一味窮地!?
episode.summary: As Luffy falls into the sea, various fights progress over Onigashima. Zeus is eaten by Hera, and Chopper continues to stall Queen. Momonosuke reads Oden's logbook, but is found by a Mary. Kid finally finds Big Mom, preparing to fight.

episode.title: The Animal Kingdom Pirates Trample Down! The End of the Kozuki Clan!
episode.english: The Animal Kingdom Pirates Trample Down! The End of the Kozuki Clan!
episode.japanese: Hyakujū Jūrin! Kōzuki-ke no Shūen!
episode.transliteration: 百獣蹂躙！光月家の終焉！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Shō InuzukaStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: Chopper continues to battle Queen while Bao Huang declares Luffy's loss. Kanjuro defeats Kikunojo before being beaten himself by Kin'emon. Kaidou arrives in front of Momonosuke, crushing Kin'emon.

episode.title: Fight Against the Dark Night – The Commander-in-chief of the Land of Wano Sounds Off
episode.english: Fight Against the Dark Night – The Commander-in-chief of the Land of Wano Sounds Off
episode.japanese: Yamiyo ni Aragae – Wano Kuni Sōdaishō Hoeru
episode.transliteration: 闇夜に抗え ワノ国総大将吠える
episode.summary: Like all the other samurai, Chopper is discouraged by the news of Luffy's loss and Queen doesn’t miss the chance to finish him off! Meanwhile, Kin'emon fights for his life to save Momonosuke and that motivates Momonosuke to rise up!

episode.title: Believe in Luffy! The Alliance's Counterattack Begins!
episode.english: Believe in Luffy! The Alliance's Counterattack Begins!
episode.japanese: Rufi o Shinjiro! Dōmei Hangeki Kaishi!
episode.transliteration: ルフィを信じろ！同盟反撃開始！
episode.summary: Momonosuke and Shinobu face Kaidou while Kid and Law challenge Big Mom. Meanwhile, Nami, heading towards the stage on the Live Floor along with Usopp and Tama, hears a strange voice.

episode.title: Nami's Lethal Attack! Otama's Desperate Challenge!
episode.english: Nami's Lethal Attack! Otama's Desperate Challenge!
episode.japanese: Nami Hissatsu! Otama Kesshi no Ōichiban!
episode.transliteration: ナミ必殺！お玉決死の大一番！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Nanami MichibataStoryboarded by : Kōhei Kureta & Nanami Michibata
episode.summary: Nami, uses Zeus to strike down Ulti, and her defeat is accidentally announced across Onigashima by Bao Huang. Tama gives a command to the Gifters she tamed, turning all the Gifters against the Beasts Pirates.

episode.title: A Dramatic Increase of Allies! Straw Hats Fight Back!
episode.english: A Dramatic Increase of Allies! Straw Hats Fight Back!
episode.japanese: Mikata Gekizō! Mugiwara no Ichimi Gyakushū!
episode.transliteration: 味方激増！麦わらの一味逆襲！
episode.summary: Hearing Tama's command, the Gifters side with the samurai and upset the Tobiroppo and others! Chopper starts to take care of Zoro while suffering from the side effect of the enhanced Rumble Ball. Meanwhile, Jimbei gets stunned by Who's-Who's story.

episode.title: The Pride of a Helmsman? The Enraged Jimbei!
episode.english: The Pride of a Helmsman? The Enraged Jimbei!
episode.japanese: Sōdashu no Hokori – Ikari no Jinbē!
episode.transliteration: 操舵手の誇り 怒りのジンベエ！
episode.summary: Who's-Who fiercely battles Jimbei in his saber tiger form, but after making rude remarks regarding the Fish-Men, Jimbei angrily defeats Who's-Who.

episode.title: Showdown Battles of the Monsters! Yamato and Franky
episode.english: Showdown Battles of the Monsters! Yamato and Franky
episode.japanese: Kaijū Dai Kessen! Yamato to Furankī
episode.transliteration: 怪獣大決戦！ヤマトとフランキー
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Tasuku ShimayaStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima & Tasuku Shimaya
episode.summary: To cut ties with Kaidou, Yamato unleashes her true power. Meanwhile, Queen repeatedly attacks Sanji with his power as a cyborg, and Sasaki in his Human-Beast Form launches tricky attacks on Franky and drives him into a corner.

episode.title: The Predator's Trap - Black Maria's Temptation
episode.english: The Predator's Trap - Black Maria's Temptation
episode.japanese: Hoshokusha no Wana - Burakku Maria no Yūwaku
episode.transliteration: 捕食者の罠 ブラックマリアの誘惑
episode.animatedBy: Shaolei Li, Takuya Imakado, Mami Kotoku & Zhenlei Cheng
episode.summary: Franky manages to defeat Sasaki by aiming for his weak spot, his belly. Meanwhile, Robin is faced with Black Maria's illusion mist.

episode.title: Slash the Nightmare - Brook Draws His Freezing Sword!
episode.english: Slash the Nightmare - Brook Draws His Freezing Sword!
episode.japanese: Akumu o Kiru - Burukku no Kōri no Battō!
episode.transliteration: 悪夢を斬る ブルックの氷の抜刀！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Shō MatsuiStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: In the dense mist, Brook is surprised to see his old friends, the Rumbar Pirates. Robin and Black Maria begin fighting in earnest, and Luffy asks Momonosuke to bring him back to Onigashima.

episode.title: Clutch! A Demon Incarnate, Robin!
episode.english: Clutch! A Demon Incarnate, Robin!
episode.japanese: Kuratchi! Akuma no Keshin - Robin!
episode.transliteration: クラッチ！悪魔の化身 ロビン！
episode.summary: The battle between Black Maria and Robin rages on, with Robin unveiling new techniques and achieving victory. On the Wano mainland, Luffy continues to gain energy, and Momonosuke asks Shinobu to turn him into an adult.

episode.title: A Spell! Kid and Zoro Facing Threats!
episode.english: A Spell! Kid and Zoro Facing Threats!
episode.japanese: Jubaku! Semaru Kyōi - Kiddo to Zoro!
episode.transliteration: 呪縛！迫る脅威 キッドとゾロ！
episode.summary: Raizo battles Fukurokuju, Killer battles Hawkins, Sanji battles both King and Queen and Cat Viper enters battle with Perospero. After Sanji is defeated, King pursues Zoro while he is still incapacitated.

episode.title: Taking a Chance! The Two Arms Go into Battle!
episode.english: Taking a Chance! The Two Arms Go into Battle!
episode.japanese: Ichikabachika no Ōshōbu! Ryōyoku Shutsujin!
episode.transliteration: 一か八かの大勝負！両翼出陣！
episode.summary: Zoro gets back on his feet and along with Sanji, confronts King and Queen, the All-Stars of the Beasts Pirates. Watching Zoro fight, Hyogoro and Kawamatsu remember someone from way back.

episode.title: Ascend to the Dawn! A Pink Dragon Gets Agitated
episode.english: Ascend to the Dawn! A Pink Dragon Gets Agitated
episode.japanese: Yoake e to Nobore! Momoiro no Ryū Takeru
episode.transliteration: 夜明けへと昇れ！桃色の龍猛る
episode.summary: Dogstorm confronts his sworn enemy who destroyed his country. Meanwhile, Cat Viper faces Perospero who is responsible for Pedro’s death. At Tokage Port, Momonosuke roars with his determined eyes.

episode.title: For the Future! Yamato and the Great Swordsmen's Pledge
episode.english: For the Future! Yamato and the Great Swordsmen's Pledge
episode.japanese: Mirai e! Yamato to Dai Kengō no Chikai
episode.transliteration: 未来へ！ヤマトと大剣豪の誓い
episode.summary: The battle between Kaidou and Yamato gets intense. Backed into a corner, Yamato remembers three great swordsmen whom she met when she was a child. Their stunning choice for the future of the Land of Wano encourages Yamato.

episode.title: Luffy Soars! Revenge Against the King of the Beasts
episode.english: Luffy Soars! Revenge Against the King of the Beasts
episode.japanese: Rufi Hishō! Hyakujū e no Ribenji
episode.transliteration: ルフィ飛翔！百獣へのリベンジ
episode.summary: Luffy amps up the reluctant Momonosuke, who is afraid of heights, in his giant pink dragon form, to fly and take him to Onigashima in the sky. Meanwhile, Yamato, in a hard battle against Kaidou, vows to survive until Luffy returns.

episode.title: Two Dragons Face Off! Momonosuke's Determination!
episode.english: Two Dragons Face Off! Momonosuke's Determination!
episode.japanese: Sōryū Aiutsu! Momonosuke no Kakugo!
episode.transliteration: 双竜相搏つ！モモの助の覚悟！
episode.summary: Momonosuke faces Kaidou once again trembling in fear. However, with Luffy’s encouragement, he bravely steps up and shows his dragon fangs remembering what he had to go through because of Kaidou.

episode.title: A Legend All Over Again! Luffy's Fist Roars in the Sky
episode.english: A Legend All Over Again! Luffy's Fist Roars in the Sky
episode.japanese: Densetsu no Sairai! Ten ni Todoroku Rufi no Kobushi
episode.transliteration: 伝説の再来！天に轟くルフィの拳
episode.summary: Yamato helps Momonosuke conquer his fear of flying and the two take on the most important task of saving Onigashima. Meanwhile, Luffy and Kaidou clash which parts the heavens. The clear skies help Dogstorm and Cat Viper finally defeat their foes.

episode.title: The Situation Has Grown Tense! The End of Onigashima!
episode.english: The Situation Has Grown Tense! The End of Onigashima!
episode.japanese: Fūun Kyū o Tsugeru! Onigashima no Matsuro!
episode.transliteration: 風雲急を告げる！鬼ヶ島の末路！
episode.summary: Momonosuke, with his newfound courage, and Yamato are on a mission to save Onigashima from crashing into the Flower Capital. On the Live Floor, Zoro and Sanji are engaged in battles of their own against Beasts Pirates’ All-Stars, King and Queen.

episode.title: Sanji's Mutation? The Two Arms in Crisis!
episode.english: Sanji's Mutation? The Two Arms in Crisis!
episode.japanese: Sanji no Ihen - Ryōyoku Kiiro Shingō!
episode.transliteration: サンジの異変 両翼黄色信号！
episode.summary: Momonosuke attempts and struggles to move Onigashima. The members of CP0 send troops to Wano Country. Inside, Sanji realizes he, like his siblings, may have genetic advancements that allow him to heal instantaneously.

episode.title: Death to Your Partner! Killer's Deadly Gamble!
episode.english: Death to Your Partner! Killer's Deadly Gamble!
episode.japanese: Aibō ni Shi o! Kirā Kesshi no Ōbakuchi
episode.transliteration: 相棒に死を！キラー決死の大博打
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Yūji Tokuno & Yasunori KoyamaStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: Killer and Hawkins continue their battle. Killer finds away to damage Hawkins despite his Devil Fruit powers, and emerges victorious in battle.

episode.title: A Shadowy Figure Pulls the Strings! Onigashima in Flames
episode.english: A Shadowy Figure Pulls the Strings! Onigashima in Flames
episode.japanese: Yami no Mono no An'yaku! Onigashima Enjō
episode.transliteration: 闇の者の暗躍！鬼ヶ島炎上
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Hazuki OmoyaStoryboarded by : Kenichi Takeshita & Hazuki Omoya
episode.summary: Kin'emon survives his defeat in battle, having been cut into two pieces. Meanwhile, Kanjuro gives his "final performance," creating a flame monster and setting the castle on fire.

episode.title: A Countercharge! Law and Kid's Return-Attack Combination
episode.english: A Countercharge! Law and Kid's Return-Attack Combination
episode.japanese: Gyakushū! Rō to Kiddo no Hangeki Dōmei
episode.transliteration: 逆襲！ローとキッドの反撃同盟
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Shō MatsuiStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: Law and Kid awaken their powers and carry out their first successful attack against Big Mom. However, Big Mom consumes a year of her life to strengthen herself in retaliation.

episode.title: For Luffy - Sanji and Zoro's Oath
episode.english: For Luffy - Sanji and Zoro's Oath
episode.japanese: Rufi no Tame ni - Sanji to Zoro no Chikai
episode.transliteration: ルフィの為に サンジとゾロの誓い
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Nanami MichibataStoryboarded by : Nanami Michibata & Satoshi Itō
episode.summary: As the situation around Onigashima escalates, fearing his awakening enhancements, as Sanji makes his decision, he contacts Zoro and requests for the latter to kill him if he loses control.

episode.title: The Onslaught of Kazenbo - Orochi's Evil Clutches Close in
episode.english: The Onslaught of Kazenbo - Orochi's Evil Clutches Close in
episode.japanese: Kazenbō Shūrai - Semaru Orochi no Ma no Te
episode.transliteration: 火前坊襲来 迫るオロチの魔の手
episode.summary: The chaos within the floating island of Onigashima rages on to seemingly no end. Kazenbo, Kanjuro's creation, is wreaking havoc all throughout the Skull Dome in the name of vengeance for the Kurozumi. The rampage causes panic among Beasts Pirates and samurai, alike. As Orochi watches on, he hears a sound that reminds him of his past love.

episode.title: Zoro Faces Adversity - A Monster! King the Wildfire
episode.english: Zoro Faces Adversity - A Monster! King the Wildfire
episode.japanese: Gyakkyō no Zoro - Kaibutsu! Kasai no Kingu
episode.transliteration: 逆境のゾロ 怪物！火災のキング
episode.summary: As Queen reveals to Sanji King's secret, elsewhere as he is struggling against King, Zoro realizes an important fact from his past.

episode.title: The Secret of Enma! The Cursed Sword Entrusted to Zoro
episode.english: The Secret of Enma! The Cursed Sword Entrusted to Zoro
episode.japanese: Enma no Himitsu! Zoro ni Takusareshi Yōtō
episode.transliteration: 閻魔の秘密！ゾロに託されし妖刀
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Tasuku ShimayaStoryboarded by : Tatsuya Nagamine & Wataru Matsumi
episode.summary: As Zoro recalls his past involving an old man he once knew, the clues from his memory help him realize the secret necessary to truly master Enma.

episode.title: The Strike of an Ifrit! Sanji vs. Queen
episode.english: The Strike of an Ifrit! Sanji vs. Queen
episode.japanese: Majin no Ichigeki! Sanji tai Kuīn
episode.transliteration: 魔神の一撃！サンジVSクイーン
episode.summary: As Queen overwhelms Sanji with the Raid Suit abilities he duplicated, Some unknowingly interferes with the battle. Taking advantage of his scientific enhancements, Sanji discovers a new ability, Ifrit Jambe, allowing him to defeat Queen and send him falling off the island.

episode.title: The Three-Sword Style of the Supreme King! Zoro vs. King
episode.english: The Three-Sword Style of the Supreme King! Zoro vs. King
episode.japanese: Haō no Santōryū! Zoro tai Kingu
episode.transliteration: 覇王の三刀流！ゾロVSキング
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Ryōsuke TanakaStoryboarded by : Ryōsuke Tanaka & Katsumi Ishizuka
episode.animatedBy: Keita Saitō, Midori Matsuda & Katsumi Ishizuka
episode.summary: As the battle between Zoro and King reaches its climax, Zoro, after deducing the secret of King's abilities, uses his newfound power to create the King of Hell Three Sword Style. As King remembers his past, the two fight, with Zoro emerging the victor.

episode.title: Luffy is on the Move! A Turning Point to a New Era!
episode.english: Luffy is on the Move! A Turning Point to a New Era!
episode.japanese: Rufi Yakudō! Shin Jidai no Bunkiten!
episode.transliteration: ルフィ躍動！新時代の分岐点！
episode.summary: As the Raid on Onigashima continues to erupt, Usopp locates Kin'emon and Kiku, and while Izou holds off the Beasts Pirates for them to escape, the battle between Raizo and Fukurokuju reaches its climax. Meanwhile, after Drake is defeated, CP0 reports on the current situation on Onigashima and how the only major forces left are Kaidou and Big Mom as the two continue their individual battles.

episode.title: Drunken Dragon Bagua! The Lawless Dragon Closing in on Luffy
episode.english: Drunken Dragon Bagua! The Lawless Dragon Closing in on Luffy
episode.japanese: Shuron Hakke! Rufi ni Semaru Muhō no Ryū
episode.transliteration: 酒龍八卦！ルフィに迫る無法の龍
episode.summary: As Luffy continues to fight Kaidou, Kaidou uses a form of drunk fighting known as Shuron Hakke, making the battle harder for Luffy. Meanwhile, at Mary Geoise, as the Five Elders review the situation, they mention a Devil Fruit that had lay dormant for centuries: which the World Government had to rename just as Zunesha arrives at Wano Country.

episode.title: The Destruction of the Alliance?! Fire up, the Will of the New Generation!
episode.english: The Destruction of the Alliance?! Fire up, the Will of the New Generation!
episode.japanese: Dōmei Kaimetsu!? Moero Shin Sedai no Ishi!
episode.transliteration: 同盟壊滅!? 燃えろ新世代の意志！
episode.summary: As the battles inside Onigashima continue, Chopper returns to normal, Franky searches for Zoro, Izou encounters CP0 and Yamato reaches the Armory and works on defeating Kazenbo and stopping it from setting off the explosives. Meanwhile, as Law and Eustass Kid struggle against Big Mom, when she prepares to leave to assist Kaidou, determined not to allow her to interfere in Luffy's fight, the two launch a powerful counterattack, which badly injures her.

episode.title: Here Comes Main Act! Powerful Techniques of Shockwave and Magnetism
episode.english: Here Comes Main Act! Powerful Techniques of Shockwave and Magnetism
episode.japanese: Ōtori Kitaru! Hadō to Jiki no Ōwaza
episode.transliteration: 大トリ来る！波動と磁気の大技
episode.summary: As Momonosuke continues to pull Onigashima away from the Flower Capital, he hears Zunesha's voice. Meanwhile, Big Mom recovers from Kid's last attack and launches a powerful counterattack, putting both him and Law in danger. Despite taking heavy damage and at their limit, the two rivals begin their own their last ditch effort plan to remove Big Mom from Onigashima.

episode.title: To the New Era! Settled! The Determination of the Brats
episode.english: To the New Era! Settled! The Determination of the Brats
episode.japanese: Shin Jidai e! Ketchaku! Gaki-domo no Kakugo
episode.transliteration: 新時代へ！決着！ガキ共の覚悟
episode.summary: Law and Kid emerge victorious against Big Mom, causing her to fall into the exposed magma chamber below. Meanwhile, Fukurokuju begins to lose his composure as a result of being set alight, and Zunesha arrives at Wano Country.

episode.title: Moon Princess Echoes! The Final Phase of the Land of Wano!
episode.english: Moon Princess Echoes! The Final Phase of the Land of Wano!
episode.japanese: Tsukihime ga Hibiku! Wano Kuni Saishū Kyokumen!
episode.transliteration: 月姫が響く！ワノ国最終局面！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Shō MatsuiStoryboarded by : Yutaka Nakashima & Shō Matsui
episode.summary: As the last part of the Raid on Onigashima begins, with the only vital battle between Luffy and Kaidou left, Momonosuke reveals to Yamato why he refuses to open Wano Country to the rest of the world. Meanwhile, Izou sacrifices himself to stop CP0 from going after Luffy as they receive new orders to eliminate the latter. As Orochi becomes trapped, he learns the truth about Komurasaki when she mentions her father, Oden. While, at the top of Onigashima, after Kaidou senses Big Mom's defeat, to defeat Kaidou, Luffy, in his final effort, resorts to using Gear 4.

episode.title: There is Only One Winner - Luffy vs. Kaido
episode.english: There is Only One Winner - Luffy vs. Kaido
episode.japanese: Shōsha wa Hitori - Rufi tai Kaidō
episode.transliteration: 勝者はひとり ルフィVSカイドウ
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Shō InuzukaStoryboarded by : Toshinori Fukuzawa & Shō Inuzuka
episode.summary: Raizo outlasts Fukurokuju in the burning hallway, causing the latter to collapse from his injuries. Meanwhile, Guernica follows his order, taking down Drake before interrupting the battle on the Skull Dome.

episode.title: Luffy is Defeated?! The Determination of Those Left Behind
episode.english: Luffy is Defeated?! The Determination of Those Left Behind
episode.japanese: Rufi Haiboku!? Nokosareta Mono no Kakugo
episode.transliteration: ルフィ敗北!? 残された者の覚悟
episode.summary: After defeating Luffy on the Skull Dome, Kaidou viciously beats Guernica before returning to the Skull Dome to battle the remaining allied forces on the Live Floor. Meanwhile, on the Skull Dome, Luffy undergoes a sudden transformation, which Zunesha declares to be the return of Joy Boy.

episode.title: Luffy's Peak - Attained! Fifth Gear
episode.english: Luffy's Peak - Attained! Fifth Gear
episode.japanese: Rufi no Saikō Chiten - Tōtatsu!〝Gia Fifusu〟
episode.transliteration: ルフィの最高地点 到達！〝ギア5〟
episode.summary: Zunesha reveals to Momonosuke and Yamato that Joy Boy has returned. Meanwhile, in Mary Geoise, the Five Elders debate angering Kaidou to stop Luffy, deciding it is worth the risk to stop the Gum-Gum Fruit, actually called the "Human-Human Fruit, Model: Nika," from awakening. After his awakening, Luffy names his ability Gear 5, and confronts Kaidou once again. Meanwhile, Hiyori continues her confrontation with Orochi, and the former Shogun is lit on fire by a near-death Kazenbo.

episode.title: The Ridiculous Power! Fifth Gear in Full Play
episode.english: The Ridiculous Power! Fifth Gear in Full Play
episode.japanese: Fuzaketa Nōryoku! Yakudō Suru Gia Fifusu
episode.transliteration: ふざけた能力！躍動するギア5
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Tasuku ShimayaStoryboarded by : Tasuku Shimaya, Megumi Ishitani, Bahi JD, Yong-Ce Tu & Takeshi Maenami
episode.animatedBy: Nobuyuki Iwai, Keisuke Mori, Kimitaka Itō & Shigefumi Shingaki
episode.summary: With his newfound power, Luffy is able to overwhelm Kaidou to the point where he greatly enjoys the battle, shocking Kaidou and his allies alike with his immense power.

episode.title: No Way Out! A Hellish Scene on Onigashima
episode.english: No Way Out! A Hellish Scene on Onigashima
episode.japanese: Nigeba Nashi! Jigoku Ezu no Onigashima
episode.transliteration: 逃げ場なし！地獄絵図の鬼ヶ島
