episode.summary: As Luffy and Kaidou continue their battle, Raizo and Jimbei utilize their plan to put out the fire that has spread throughout Onigashima. Meanwhile, Yamato warns Momonosuke of the danger Onigashima will face if he does not act soon to create new flame clouds to keep it from crashing into the Flower Capital.

episode.title: I Trust Momo - Luffy's Final Powerful Technique!
episode.english: I Trust Momo - Luffy's Final Powerful Technique!
episode.japanese: Momo o Shinjiru - Rufi Saigo no Ōwaza!
episode.transliteration: モモを信じる ルフィ最後の大技！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Nanami MichibataStoryboarded by : Masahiro Hosoda & Hone Hone
episode.animatedBy: Kazuya Hisada, Hone Hone & Shū Sugita
episode.summary: As Momonosuke struggles to create his own flame clouds, Luffy continues to fight Kaidou. As the Samurai realize what would happen to Onigashima if Luffy won, Orochi is freed from the Seastone Nail and attempts to murder Hiyori. After hearing the voices of the people, Luffy prepares his final attack.

episode.title: 20 Years Worth of Prayers! Take Back the Land of Wano
episode.english: 20 Years Worth of Prayers! Take Back the Land of Wano
episode.japanese: Nijū-nen no Inori! Wano Kuni o Torimodose
episode.transliteration: 二十年の祈り！ワノ国を取り戻せ
episode.summary: As Luffy and Kaidou prepare their final attack, Momonosuke is tasked with moving Onigashima out of the way of Luffy's attack. Meanwhile, Denjiro saves Hiyori by beheading Orochi one final time.

episode.title: The World That Luffy Wants!
episode.english: The World That Luffy Wants!
episode.japanese: Rufi no Mezasu Sekai!
episode.transliteration: ルフィの目指す世界！
episode.summary: Kaidou's past is revealed; he was a former Rocks Pirate who later built his own crew which sought out to create war. In the present day, Momonosuke moves Onigashima away just as Luffy defeats Kaidou, sending him falling into the ground.

episode.title: The Curtain Falls! The Winner, Straw Hat Luffy!
episode.english: The Curtain Falls! The Winner, Straw Hat Luffy!
episode.japanese: Makuhiki! Shōsha - Mugiwara no Rufi!
episode.transliteration: 幕引き！勝者 麦わらのルフィ！
episode.summary: As Kaidou's unconscious body falls into a magma chamber and triggers a volcanic eruption, Onigashima lands safely near the Flower Capital. Momonosuke announces their victory to the townspeople.

episode.title: He Returns! The Shogun of the Land of Wano, Kozuki Momonosuke
episode.english: He Returns! The Shogun of the Land of Wano, Kozuki Momonosuke
episode.japanese: Kikan! Wano Kuni Shōgun - Kōzuki Momonosuke
episode.transliteration: 帰還！ワノ国将軍 光月モモの助
episode.summary: Momonosuke announces to the citizens his victory and the return of the Kozuki Family. Tama remembers her childhood, and Yamato asks to join Luffy's crew.

episode.title: The Morning Comes! Luffy and the Others Rest!
episode.english: The Morning Comes! Luffy and the Others Rest!
episode.japanese: Asa ga Kita! Rufi-tachi no Kyūsoku!
episode.transliteration: 朝が来た！ルフィ達の休息！
episode.summary: As the Five Elders learn of Wano Country's status, a festival is held to celebrate the alliance's victory. Meanwhile, Admiral Ryokugyu heads to Wano.

episode.title: A Celebration Banquet! The New Emperors of the Sea!
episode.english: A Celebration Banquet! The New Emperors of the Sea!
episode.japanese: Shukusai no Utage! Atarashiki Umi no Kōtei-tachi!
episode.transliteration: 祝祭の宴！新しき海の皇帝達！
episode.summary: Tenguyama reveals his true identity as Sukiyaki to Robin and confirms Wano's secret. The new Emperors of the Sea are declared, as Ryokugyu heads after Luffy.

episode.title: The World Will Burn! The Onslaught of a Navy Admiral!
episode.english: The World Will Burn! The Onslaught of a Navy Admiral!
episode.japanese: Sekai ga Moeru! Kaigun Taishō Shūrai!
episode.transliteration: 世界が燃える！海軍大将襲来！
episode.summary: The Red Hair Pirates, now at Wano, decide on going after the One Piece. The Red Scabbards attempt to stop Ryokugyu from pursuing Luffy. Sakazuki, Borsalino, and Tensei discuss the events at the Levely regarding the Revolutionary Army's interference and Sabo's alleged assassination of Nefertari Cobra.

episode.title: The Coming of the New Era! The Red-Haired's Imperial Rage
episode.english: The Coming of the New Era! The Red-Haired's Imperial Rage
episode.japanese: Shin Jidai Tōrai! Akagami no Kōtei no Ikari
episode.transliteration: 新時代到来！赤髪の皇帝の怒り
episode.summary: Sukiyaki shows Robin and Law the Road Ponyglyph and tells them more about Wano Country's history, including the ancient civilization and the location of Pluton. Meanwhile, the Nine Red Scabbards and Momonosuke battle against Ryokugyu. Momonosuke successfully uses a fire-breathing attack against Ryokugyu for the first time, and with the help of Shanks forces the admiral to retreat.

episode.title: The World That Moves On! A New Organization, Cross Guild
episode.english: The World That Moves On! A New Organization, Cross Guild
episode.japanese: Ugoku Sekai! Shin Soshiki Kurosu Girudo
episode.transliteration: 動く世界！新組織クロスギルド
episode.summary: As things settle back down, Nekomamushi and Inuarashi announce to Carrot their decision to have her become the new leader of the Mokomo Dukedom, while Sukiyaki reveals his true identity to his grandchildren and attendants, with the intent to passing his knowledge down to Momonosuke. A few days later, as the Straw Hat Pirates, Heart Pirates, and Kid Pirates prepare to leave Wano Country, Kid reveals to Luffy about Buggy being chosen as one of the Four Emperors and his new group the Cross Guild.

episode.title: Time to Depart - The Land of Wano and the Straw Hats
episode.english: Time to Depart - The Land of Wano and the Straw Hats
episode.japanese: Tabidachi no Toki - Wano kuni to Mugiwara no Ichimi
episode.transliteration: 旅立ちの時 ワノ国と麦わらの一味
episode.summary: Before their departure from Wano Country, the Straw Hat Pirates say their goodbyes to their comrades. Luffy visits the ruins of Kuri Castle, where he parts with the Nine Red Scabbards and the Mink Tribe, and Tsurujo's shop, where he leaves Tama. Meanwhile, Zoro visits Yasuie and Pedro's graves, and Sanji sells the last of his soba in the Flower Capital.

episode.title: The Last Curtain! Luffy and Momonosuke's Vow
episode.english: The Last Curtain! Luffy and Momonosuke's Vow
episode.japanese: Shūmaku! Rufi to Momonosuke no Chikai
episode.transliteration: 終幕！ルフィとモモの助の誓い
episode.summary: The Straw Hat Pirates say their final goodbyes to Momonosuke, Kin'emon, and Yamato, formally declaring Wano Country as one of their territories. With their business concluded, they finally depart from the island, at the same time as the Heart and Kid Pirates. Meanwhile, in the Flower Capital, the story of the return of the Kozuki Family is recounted as a performance.

episode.title: A New Emperor! Buggy the Genius Jester!
episode.english: A New Emperor! Buggy the Genius Jester!
episode.japanese: Shin Kōtei! Senryō Dōke no Bagī!
episode.transliteration: 新皇帝！千両道化のバギー！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Tasuku ShimayaStoryboarded by : Nozomu Shishido
episode.summary: As the Straw Hats leave Wano, they find out their new bounties. Meanwhile, on Karai Bari Island, Mihawk and Crocodile confront Buggy for being portrayed as the clown's subordinates. However, they relent after they realize it's not the worst idea to have Buggy bear the brunt of the Marines' attention and have him become one of the new Emperors of the Sea. Thus, the Cross Guild is established with Buggy as the figurehead, and Mihawk and Crocodile as its Chief Officers.

episode.title: The War on the Island of Women! A Case Involving Koby the Hero
episode.english: The War on the Island of Women! A Case Involving Koby the Hero
episode.japanese: Nyōgashima no Ran! Eiyū Kobī no Ikken
episode.transliteration: 女ヶ島の乱！英雄コビーの一件
episode.summary: The Marines invade Amazon Lily to arrest Boa Hancock with the aid of their new Seraphim Pacifista. However, the Blackbeard Pirates also invade Amazon Lily, where Blackbeard captures Hancock, with the intention of stealing her Devil Fruit power.

episode.title: Luffy's Dream
episode.english: Luffy's Dream
episode.japanese: 〝Rufi no Yume〟
episode.transliteration: 〝ルフィの夢〟
episode.summary: With the help of Rayleigh, Hancock and the Kuja Pirates defend Amazon Lily from both the Marines and the Blackbeard Pirates. Meanwhile, news of Cobra's assassination and Vivi's kidnapping spread to the Straw Hat Pirates, while Luffy reveals to his crew the end of his dream, even larger than becoming Pirate King.

episode.title: Luffy-senpai Support Project! Barto's Secret Room!
episode.english: Luffy-senpai Support Project! Barto's Secret Room!
episode.japanese: Rufi Senpai Ōen Kikaku! Baruto no Himitsu no Heya!
episode.transliteration: ルフィ先輩応援企画！バルトの秘密の部屋！
episode.summary: Bartolomeo and O-Tama recap the events of the Wano Country Arc up until when the Straw Hats assemble at the Performance Floor.

episode.title: A Special Episode to Admire Zoro-senpai and Sanji-senpai! Barto's Secret Room 2!
episode.english: A Special Episode to Admire Zoro-senpai and Sanji-senpai! Barto's Secret Room 2!
episode.japanese: Zoro Sanji Senpai Tannō Kikaku! Baruto no Himitsu no Heya Sekando!
episode.transliteration: ゾロ・サンジ先輩堪能企画！バルトの秘密の部屋2！
episode.summary: Bartolomeo and Law recap the events of the Wano Country Arc from Zoro and Sanji's point of view up until Luffy, Zoro, Law, Kidd, and Killer confront Kaido and Big Mom.

episode.title: A Comprehensive Anatomy! The Legend of Kozuki Oden!
episode.english: A Comprehensive Anatomy! The Legend of Kozuki Oden!
episode.japanese: Dai Tettei Kaibō! Kōzuki Oden Densetsu!
episode.transliteration: 大徹底解剖！光月おでん伝説！
episode.summary: Yamato and Momonosuke recap the events of Oden's life to the formation of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.

episode.title: The Captain's Log of the Legend! Red-Haired Shanks!
episode.english: The Captain's Log of the Legend! Red-Haired Shanks!
episode.japanese: Densetsu no Rogu! Akagami no Shankusu!
episode.transliteration: 伝説の記録（ログ）！赤髪のシャンクス！
episode.summary: Various figures think back on their time knowing Shanks, including Koby and Makino.

episode.title: A Comprehensive Anatomy! Fierce Fight! The Five from the New Generation
episode.english: A Comprehensive Anatomy! Fierce Fight! The Five from the New Generation
episode.japanese: Dai Tettei Kaibō! Gekitō! Gonin no Shin Sedai
episode.transliteration: 大徹底解剖！激闘！5人の新世代
episode.summary: Recaps the fight on the Skull Dome's roof between the Worst Generation and the Emperors Kaidou and Big Mom.

episode.title: Recapping Fierce Fights! Straw Hats vs. Tobi Roppo
episode.english: Recapping Fierce Fights! Straw Hats vs. Tobi Roppo
episode.japanese: Dai Gekisen Tokushū! Mugiwara no Ichimi Buiesu Tobi Roppō
episode.transliteration: 大激戦特集！麦わらの一味VS飛び六砲
episode.summary: Zoro and Sanji narrate in this recap of battles that took place between the Straw Hat Pirates and the Tobiroppo.

episode.title: Recapping Fierce Fights! Zoro vs. A Lead Performer!
episode.english: Recapping Fierce Fights! Zoro vs. A Lead Performer!
episode.japanese: Dai Gekisen Tokushū! Zoro tai Ōkanban!
episode.transliteration: 大激戦特集！ゾロVS大看板！
episode.summary: Sanji and Chopper narrate the events of what has occurred in the battle between Zoro and King so far.

episode.title: Recapping Fierce Fights! The Countercharge Alliance vs. Big Mom
episode.english: Recapping Fierce Fights! The Countercharge Alliance vs. Big Mom
episode.japanese: Dai Gekisen Tokushū! Hangeki Dōmei tai Biggu Mamu
episode.transliteration: 大激戦特集！反撃同盟VSビッグ・マム
episode.summary: Nami and Nico Robin narrate the progress of Law and Kid's battle against Big Mom so far.

episode.title: Luffy-senpai Support Project! Barto's Secret Room 3!
episode.english: Luffy-senpai Support Project! Barto's Secret Room 3!
episode.japanese: Rufi Senpai Ōen Kikaku! Baruto no Himitsu no Heya Sādo!
episode.transliteration: ルフィ先輩応援企画！バルトの秘密の部屋3！
episode.summary: Bartolomeo and O-Tama recap the events of the Wano Country Arc up from Luffy's second defeat against Kaido to Luffy awakening Gear 5.

episode.title: Luffy-senpai Support Project! Barto's Secret Room 4!
episode.english: Luffy-senpai Support Project! Barto's Secret Room 4!
episode.japanese: Rufi Senpai Ōen Kikaku! Baruto no Himitsu no Heya Fōsu!
episode.transliteration: ルフィ先輩応援企画！バルトの秘密の部屋4！
episode.summary: Bartolomeo and O-Tama recap the events of the Wano Country Arc up from Gear 5 Luffy battling Kaido to Luffy finally defeating Kaido.

episode.title: A Very Special Feature! Momonosuke's Road to Becoming a Great Shogun
episode.english: A Very Special Feature! Momonosuke's Road to Becoming a Great Shogun
episode.japanese: Dai Tokushū! Momonosuke no Mei Shōgun e no Michi
episode.transliteration: 大特集！モモの助の名将軍への道
episode.summary: A recap special covering the character Kozuki Momonosuke.

episode.title: Entering a New Chapter! Luffy and Sabo's Paths!
episode.english: Entering a New Chapter! Luffy and Sabo's Paths!
episode.japanese: Shinshō Totsunyū! Rufi to Sabo no Shinro!
episode.transliteration: 新章突入！ルフィとサボの針路！
episode.animatedBy: Ziwei He, Keisuke Mori, Shūichi Itō & Midori Matsuda
episode.summary: After leaving Wano, the Straw Hats pursue the final Road Poneglyph, vital to Luffy's dream of becoming the King of the Pirates. Meanwhile, Sabo's communication with the Revolutionary Army is abruptly halted by the Marines, resulting in the destruction of Lulusia. Later, while the Straw Hats rescue a girl from the sea, they encounter a massive shark that threatens their ship.

episode.title: A New Island! Future Island Egghead
episode.english: A New Island! Future Island Egghead
episode.japanese: Atarashī Shima! Mirai Shima Egguheddo
episode.transliteration: 新しい島！未来島エッグヘッド
episode.summary: Luffy, Chopper, and the girl, who reveals herself as Jewelry Bonney, are rescued by Jinbe. The rest of the crew is attacked by the shark and capsizes, but are eventually saved by a woman who claims to be Dr. Vegapunk. Meanwhile, Helmeppo seeks Prince Grus' aid to save Koby.

episode.title: Brimming with the Future! An Adventure on the Island of Science!
episode.english: Brimming with the Future! An Adventure on the Island of Science!
episode.japanese: Mirai Mansai! Kagaku no Kuni no Bōken!
episode.transliteration: 未来満載！科学の国の冒険！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Sho MatsuiStoryboarded by : Sho Matsui, Yasunori Koyama & Satoshi Itō
episode.summary: Lilith, a satellite of Vegapunk, attacks the Thousand Sunny, but is stopped by Shaka, another satellite of Vegapunk, who identifies Zoro and Robin. He orders Lilith to bring the Straw Hats to him. Meanwhile, Luffy, Bonney, Jinbe, and Chopper explore Egghead. Bonney threatens to get revenge on Vegapunk for turning her father, into a cyborg. They encounter holograms of Egghead's inventions and meet another satellite, Atlas, who also reveals herself to be Vegapunk.

episode.title: Bonney's Lamentation! Darkness Lurking on the Future Island
episode.english: Bonney's Lamentation! Darkness Lurking on the Future Island
episode.japanese: Bonī no Dōkoku! Mirai Shima ni Hisomu Yami
episode.transliteration: ボニーの慟哭！未来島に潜む闇
episode.summary: A CP0 unit that resembles Bartholomew Kuma is dispatched to Egghead to eliminate Dr. Vegapunk. Meanwhile, as Luffy's group faces an assault from a Pacifista, Bonney recognizes its resemblance to Kuma and reveals him to be her father. She orders Luffy to stop attacking it. In another part of the New World, the Heart Pirates come under attack from the Blackbeard Pirates.

episode.title: The Winner Takes All! Law vs. Blackbeard!
episode.english: The Winner Takes All! Law vs. Blackbeard!
episode.japanese: Shōsha Sōtori! Rō tai Kurohige!
episode.transliteration: 勝者総取り！ローVS黒ひげ！
episode.summary: After an assault by the Blackbeard Pirates, the Heart Pirates flee and dock on a nearby island. Trafalgar Law is confronted and attacked by Doc Q. Van Augur and Burgess, but Law easily counters. Blackbeard aims to seize their Road Poneglyphs, which commences a heated battle. Meanwhile, Charlotte Pudding is revealed to be a prisoner on board the Blackbeard Pirates' ship. At Marine Headquarters, Sakazuki awaits the outcome of the battle between Law and Blackbeard. Blackbeard uses his powers to retaliate against Law's attacks by shrouding him in darkness.

episode.title: The Mystery Deepens! Egghead Labophase
episode.english: The Mystery Deepens! Egghead Labophase
episode.japanese: Fukamaru Nazo! Egguheddo Rabofēzu
episode.transliteration: 深まる謎！エッグヘッド研究層（ラボフェーズ）
episode.summary: Luffy, Chopper, Jinbe, and Bonney evade the Pacifista after Bonney uses her Devil Fruit powers to confuse it. Jinbe reveals Kuma's backstory as a deposed king, later becoming a pirate and eventually a cyborg. Meanwhile, Lilith leads the other Straw Hats to Egghead's Labophase. There, they encounter a Seraphim resembling Jinbe. Shaka, one of the six Vegapunk satellites, contacts Monkey D. Dragon, informing him that he predicts his own demise.

episode.title: The Brain of a Genius - Six Vegapunks!
episode.english: The Brain of a Genius - Six Vegapunks!
episode.japanese: Tensai no Zunō - Rokunin no Begapanku!
episode.transliteration: 天才の頭脳 6人のベガパンク！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Eri HyunStoryboarded by : Masahiro Hosoda & Satoshi Itō
episode.summary: The Straw Hats fall into Lilith's trap and are forced to face S-Shark, who wields multiple powers. Sanji, Robin, and Usopp's attacks fail against it. Lilith, along with two other satellites of Vegapunk, Edison, and Pythagoras control S-Shark from afar. Edison conducts experiments on S-Shark to help it evolve. Shaka halts the fight, and he reveals Egghead's history. Meanwhile, Luffy's group finds an old, advanced robot in a scrapyard.

episode.title: A Forbidden Piece of History! A Theory Concerning a Kingdom
episode.english: A Forbidden Piece of History! A Theory Concerning a Kingdom
episode.japanese: Kinji Rareta Rekishi! Aru Ōkoku no Kasetsu
episode.transliteration: 禁じられた歴史！ある王国の仮説
episode.summary: Shaka discusses his theory with Sanji's group regarding an ancient kingdom connected to the Void Century. He believes this kingdom was eradicated by the World Government to erase its history. Shaka links this theory to the Ohara Incident, where scholars sought to uncover this history. During his visit to Ohara, Shaka found discarded books that were saved by the scholars during the island's destruction. Meanwhile, Luffy and Chopper investigate an ancient robot and encounter the real Dr. Vegapunk.

episode.title: The Will of Ohara! The Inherited Research
episode.english: The Will of Ohara! The Inherited Research
episode.japanese: Ohara no Ishi! Uketsugareru Kenkyū
episode.transliteration: オハラの意志！受け継がれる研究
episode.summary: Shaka tells Sanji's group about how the giants saved Ohara's books 22 years ago when Dr. Vegapunk met up with Dragon. He also confirms to Robin the identity of their leader. At the scrapyard, Bonney attempts to kill Vegapunk. Meanwhile, a masked assassin approaches Egghead.

episode.title: The Eccentric Dream of a Genius!
episode.english: The Eccentric Dream of a Genius!
episode.japanese: Kisō Tengai! Tensai ga Omoiegaku Yume!
episode.transliteration: 奇想天外！天才が想い描く夢！
episode.summary: Luffy's group questions Vegapunk about the Iron Giant, a legendary robot linked to an ancient power source. Vegapunk desires to leave Egghead to pursue his ambition of harnessing infinite energy, making him a target for CP0 assassins. Meanwhile, CP0 led by Rob Lucci forcefully makes his way into Egghead. Kuma breaks free during repairs in Kamabakka Kingdom, escaping Dragon and Ivankov's pursuit.

episode.title: Preparations for Interception! Rob Lucci Strikes!
episode.english: Preparations for Interception! Rob Lucci Strikes!
episode.japanese: Geigeki Junbi! Robu・Rutchi Shūrai!
episode.transliteration: 迎撃準備！ロブ・ルッチ襲来！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Kenichi TakeshitaStoryboarded by : Kenichi Takeshita & Yutaka Nakashima
episode.summary: As Lucci's group launches their invasion of Egghead, Shaka begins the preparations to deal with it. However, Atlas ignores orders and is damaged when attempting to fight Lucci. Upon arriving at that location, an angry Luffy prepares to engage Lucci in battle.

episode.title: Powers on a Different Level! Luffy vs. Lucci!
episode.english: Powers on a Different Level! Luffy vs. Lucci!
episode.japanese: I Jigen no Chikara! Rufi tai Rutchi!
episode.transliteration: 異次元の力！ルフィVSルッチ！
episode.animatedBy: Keita Saitō, Kimitaka Itō& Hiroyasu Oda
episode.summary: Sakazuki learns that the Straw Hats are on Egghead and are aligning with Vegapunk. He sends Kizaru to support Lucci and the CP0 agents. Despite being given orders, Lucci disobeys and battles Luffy. They both transform into their awakened forms. Vegapunk explains the uniqueness of Luffy's Devil Fruit, linking it to Nika, the Sun God. Sentomaru arrives and aids Luffy with the help of the Seraphims, but he ends up being knocked out by Lucci's attack.

episode.title: The Strongest Form of Humanity! The Seraphim's Powers!
episode.english: The Strongest Form of Humanity! The Seraphim's Powers!
episode.japanese: Saikyō no Jinrui! Serafimu no Nōryoku!
episode.transliteration: 最強の人類！セラフィムの能力！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Wataru MatsumiStoryboarded by : Wataru Matsumi & Yong-Ce Tu
episode.summary: The battle between Luffy and Lucci continues, with Luffy overpowering Lucci. The rest of the Straw Hats learn from Vegapunk that certain Devil Fruit powers are able to be replicated through blood transfusion. Luffy rejoins Jinbe and the others, as the group makes their way to the Labophase area of Egghead. After his defeat, Lucci is reunited with Kaku and Stussy.

episode.title: Sinister Schemes! The Operation to Escape Egghead
episode.english: Sinister Schemes! The Operation to Escape Egghead
episode.japanese: Ugomeku Inbō! Egguheddo Dasshutsu Sakusen
episode.transliteration: 蠢く陰謀！エッグヘッド脱出作戦
episode.summary: Luffy, Bonney, and Jinbe make it to Vegapunk's lab, where Atlas is tended to. With the defeat of Sentomaru, CP0 regains control of the Seraphims. Kuma, having escaped the Kammabakka Kingdom, crashes at Red Port. Vegapunk calls on the help of another ally to escape the island. A mysterious force deactivates the Frontier Dome defense system, allowing CP0 to enter. Kizaru is seen approaching Egghead with a marine fleet.

episode.title: Turn Back My Father! Bonney's Futile Wish!
episode.english: Turn Back My Father! Bonney's Futile Wish!
episode.japanese: Chichi o Modose! Hakanaki Bonī no Negai!
episode.transliteration: 父を戻せ！儚きボニーの願い！
episode.summary: Kaku and Zoro engage in a battle after Kaku fails to destroy the Thousand Sunny. Bonney pursues Dr. Vegapunk, demanding answers about Kuma. The Kid Pirates arrive at Elbaf. Meanwhile, Garp makes his way to G-14 to announce his rescue mission to retrieve Koby.

episode.title: A Desperate Situation! The Seraphim's All-out Attack!
episode.english: A Desperate Situation! The Seraphim's All-out Attack!
episode.japanese: Zettai Zetsumei! Serafimu Sō Kōgeki!
episode.transliteration: 絶体絶命！セラフィム総攻撃！
episode.directedBy: Directed by : Sho MatsuiStoryboarded by : Sho Matsui, Yasunori Koyama & Sho Inuzuka
episode.summary: Bonney discovers a glowing paw, realizing it contains Kuma's memories stored before he became a cyborg. Vegapunk tries to deceive her but fails. Meanwhile, Kuma clashes with the Marines while attempting to climb the Red Line. In the fight between Kaku and Zoro, Kaku unveils his enhanced Devil Fruit form. Suddenly, Stussy reveals her true nature and betrays Kaku and Lucci, attacking them both before turning her attention towards Zoro.

episode.title: A Beautiful Act of Treason! The Spy, Stussy!
episode.english: A Beautiful Act of Treason! The Spy, Stussy!
episode.japanese: Uruwashiki Hangyaku! Naitsū-sha Sutyūshī
episode.transliteration: 麗しき反逆！内通者ステューシー
episode.summary: A recap special covering the character Trafalgar Law.

episode.title: A Project to Fully Enjoy! "Surgeon of Death" Trafalgar Law
episode.english: A Project to Fully Enjoy! "Surgeon of Death" Trafalgar Law
episode.japanese: Dai Tan'nō Kikaku!〝Shi no Gekai〟Torafarugā・Rō
episode.transliteration: 大堪能企画！〝死の外科医〟トラファルガー・ロー
episode.summary: A recap special covering the battle history between the Straw Hats and CP9.

episode.title: The Log of the Rivalry! The Straw Hats vs. Cipher Pol
episode.english: The Log of the Rivalry! The Straw Hats vs. Cipher Pol
episode.japanese: In'nen no Rogu! Mugiwara no Ichimi to Saifā Pōru
episode.transliteration: 因縁の記録（ログ）！麦わらの一味とCP（サイファーポール）
